src: Ponorky sú lode určené na plavbu pod vodou a zostávajú tam dlhšiu dobu. Ponorky sa používali v 1. a 2. svetovej vojne. Boli v tej dobe veľmi pomalé a mali značne obmedzený strelecký dosah. Na začiatku vojny sa plavili väčšinou po hľadine mora, ale s neustálym vývojom a spresňovaním radaru boli ponorky nútené ustúpiť pod vodu, aby ich nebolo možné spozorovať. Nemecké ponorky sa volali U-Boot. Nemci boli veľmi dobrí v navigácii a obsluhe svojich ponoriek. Pre ich úspech s ponorkami sa Nemcom po vojne neverilo, že ich majú veľa.
mt: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater and stay there for a long time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. They were very slow and had a very limited firing range at the beginning of the war. At the beginning of the war, they mostly traveled on the surface of the sea, but with the constant development and refinement of radar, submarines were forced to submerge, so they could not be spotted. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigation and handling their submarines. For their success with submarines, the Germans did not believe that they had many.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Ponorky sú lode určené na plavbu pod vodou a zostávajú tam dlhšiu dobu. Ponorky sa používali v 1. a 2. svetovej vojne. Boli v tej dobe veľmi pomalé a mali značne obmedzený strelecký dosah. Na začiatku vojny sa plavili väčšinou po hľadine mora, ale s neustálym vývojom a spresňovaním radaru boli ponorky nútené ustúpiť pod vodu, aby ich nebolo možné spozorovať. Nemecké ponorky sa volali U-Boot. Nemci boli veľmi dobrí v navigácii a obsluhe svojich ponoriek. Pre ich úspech s ponorkami sa Nemcom po vojne neverilo, že ich majú veľa.
mt: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater and stay there for a long time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. They were very slow and had a very limited firing range at the beginning of the war. At the beginning of the war, they mostly traveled on the surface of the sea, but with the constant development and refinement of radar, submarines were forced to submerge, so they could not be spotted. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigation and handling their submarines. For their success with submarines, the Germans did not believe that they had many.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Do 17. septembra 1939 už bol poľský obranný val zlomený a jedinou nádejou preň bol ústup a zmena usporiadania pozdĺž rumunského predmostia. Tieto plány sa však stali takmer za jednu noc neaktuálne, keď viac ako 800 000 vojakov Červenej armády Sovietskeho zväzu porušilo Rižskú zmluvu, poľsko-sovietsku zmluvu o neútočení a ďalšie medzinárodné zmluvy, dvojstranné aj mnohostranné, a vstúpilo do východných oblastí Poľska a vytvorilo tak bieloruský a ukrajinský front.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defensive line was broken and the only hope for it was retreat and reorganization along the Romanian bridgehead. These plans became almost obsolete in one night when more than 800,000 soldiers of the Red Army of the Soviet Union violated the Riga Treaty, the Polish-Soviet non-aggression treaty, and other bilateral and multilateral treaties, and entered the eastern regions of Poland, creating the Belarusian and Ukrainian fronts.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Talianom v severnej Afrike už skoro od začiatku nevychádzali veci podľa predstáv. Do týždňa od vyhlásenia vojny Talianskom 10. júna 1940 dobyli britskí 11. husári pevnosť Capuzzo v Líbyi. Pri prepade východne od Bardie Briti zajali hlavného inžiniera talianskej desiatej armády generála Lastucciho. 28. júna bol maršal Italo Balbo, generálny guvernér Líbye a zjavný Mussoliniho následník, zabitý priateľskou paľbou pri pristávaní v Tobruku.
mt: Things did not go according to plan for the Italians in North Africa from the start. By the end of the week after the declaration of war on June 10, 1940, British 11th Hussars had captured the fortress of Capuzzo in Libya. In the raid east of Bardia, the British captured the main engineer of the Italian Tenth Army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor-General of Libya and an obvious successor to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tibetský budhizmus je založený na Budhovom učení, ale rozšíril sa mahajánovou cestou lásky a mnohými technikami z indickej jogy. Tibetský budhizmus je v podstate veľmi jednoduchý a zahŕňa kundaliní jogu, meditáciu a cestu všeobjímajúcej lásky. V kundaliní joge je energia kundaliní (energia osvietenia) prebudená prostredníctvom jogínskych pozícií, aeróbnych cvičení, mantier a vizualizácií. Základom tibetskej meditácie je Božská joga. Vizualizáciou rôznych božstiev sa čistia energetické kanály, aktivujú sa čakry a vytvára sa vedomie osvietenia.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but expanded through the Mahayana path of love and many techniques of Indian yoga. Tibetan Buddhism is essentially very simple and includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and the path of all-encompassing love. In Kundalini yoga, the Kundalini energy (energy of enlightenment) is awakened through yogic positions, aerobic exercises, mantras and visualizations. The basis of Tibetan meditation is Divine Yoga. Visualizing various deities cleanses the energy channels, activates chakras and creates the awareness of enlightenment.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Relácia začala o 20:30 miestneho času (15:00 univerzálneho koordinovaného času). Slávni speváci po celej krajine predvádzali zbožné piesne bhadžany pri nohách Shri Shyam. Večer začal spevák Sanju Sharma, po ňom vystúpil Jai Shankar Choudhary. prezentoval tiež chhappan bhog bhajan. Sprevádzal ho spevák Raju Khandelwal. Potom sa ujal vedenia Lakkha Singh v spievaní bhadžanov. Babe Shyam obetovali 108 tanierov Chhappan Bhog (56 rôznych pochutín, ako sú sladkosti, ovocie, orechy, jedlá atď., obetovaných božstvu v hinduizme). Lakkha Singh predstavil aj chhappan bhog bhajan. Sprevádzal ho spevák Raju Khandelwal.
mt: 20:30 local time (15:00 UTC) the event began. Famous singers from all over the country sang bhajans at the feet of Shri Shyam. The evening began with Sanju Sharma singing, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary, who also performed the chhappan bhog bhajan. He was accompanied by Raju Khandelwal. Lakkha Singh then took over the singing of bhajans. The Babes of Shyam offered 108 taniers of Chhappan Bhog (56 different delicacies, such as sweets, fruit, nuts, food, etc., offered to the god in Hinduism). Lakkha Singh also presented the chhappan bhog bhajan. He was accompanied by Raju Khandelwal.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Oslavy odštartovalo špeciálne predstavenie svetoznámej skupiny Cirque du Soleil. Po nej nasledoval Istanbulský štátny symfonický orchester, Janičiarska kapela a speváci Fatih Erkoç a Müslüm Gürses. Následne na pódium vyšla skupina Whirling Dervishes. Turecká diva Sezen Aksu vystúpila spoločne s talianskym tenoristom Alessandrom Safinom a gréckym spevákom Harisom Alexiouom. Na záver turecká tanečná skupina Fire of Anatolia predstavila svoju show Trója.
mt: The celebrations began with a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. This was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, the Janissary Band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Next to the stage came the Whirling Dervishes. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The show ended with the Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia presenting their show Troy.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: Cestujúci dostali vodu, keď čakali v 32-stupňovej (°C) horúčave. Kapitán hasičov Scott Kouns povedal: „V Santa Clare bol horúci deň s teplotami okolo 32 stupňov. Akokoľvek dlhé uviaznutie na horskej dráhe by vždy bolo veľmi nepríjemné a trvalo najmenej hodinu, kým bola zosadená z kolotoča prvá osoba.“
mt: Passengers were given water as they waited in 32-degree (°C) heat. Captain Kouns said: "In Santa Clara it was a hot day with temperatures around 32 degrees. However long a wait on the runway would always be very unpleasant and lasted at least an hour before the first person was offloaded from the carousel."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Podľa najnovšej správy údaje o hladine mora naznačovali, že došlo k vzniku vlny tsunami. V blízkosti Pago Pago a Niue bola zaznamenaná určitá aktivita tsunami. Na ostrove Tonga neboli hlásené žiadne väčšie škody alebo zranenia, dočasne však došlo k výpadku energie, čo údajne zabránilo tonžským úradom aby zachytili varovanie pred vlnou tsunami, ktoré vyslalo PTWC. Štrnásť škôl na Havaji, ktoré sa nachádzali na pobreží alebo v jeho blízkosti, bolo celú stredu zatvorených napriek zrušeným varovaniam.
mt: According to the latest report, the tsunami wave height data indicated that a tsunami was generated.  There was some tsunami activity near Pago Pago and Niue.  No significant damage or injuries were reported from Tonga, however, a temporary power outage prevented Tongan officials from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC.  Fourteen schools on Hawaii, which were located on or near the coast, were closed all of Wednesday despite the cancellation of the warnings.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: John Reid, spolujazdec z tímu A1GP Nový Zéland, sa dnes zapísal do histórie tým, že prešiel cez 48-ročný most Harbour Bridge v Aucklande na Novom Zélande oficiálne najvyššou rýchlosťou. Reidovi sa podarilo prejsť v novozélandskom automobile A1GP, Black Beauty rýchlosťou viac ako 160 km/h cez most sedemkrát. Novozélandská polícia mala problémy s použitím svojich rýchlostných radarových pištolí pri zisťovaní, ako rýchlo pán Reid išiel, a to pre to, že Čierna kráska je nízka. Policajtom sa to podarilo namerať jeho rýchlosť len raz, keď spomalil na 160 km/h.
mt: John Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today entered the record books by officially driving across the 48-year-old Harbour Bridge in Auckland, New Zealand at the highest speed ever. Reid was able to drive the A1GP New Zealand car, the Black Beauty, across the bridge at more than 160 km/h seven times. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to determine how fast Reid was going, because the Black Beauty is low to the ground. The police were able to get one reading when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Západnou Montanou otriaslo v pondelok o 22:08 slabé zemetrasenie. Americká geologická služba (USGS) a jej Národné informačné stredisko pre zemetrasenia nedostali žiadne bezprostredné správy o škodách. Epicentrum zemetrasenia sa nachádzalo približne 20 km na severovýchod od Dillonu a asi 65 km južne od Butte.
mt: A weak earthquake struck western Montana on Monday at 10:08 pm. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center received no immediate reports of damage. The epicenter of the earthquake was about 20 km north-east of Dillon and about 65 km south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Iracké väzenie Abu Ghraib bolo počas nepokojov podpálené. Väzenie sa stalo známym po tom, keď v ňom odhalili zneužívanie väzňov, po tom ako moc prevzali americké sily.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison was burned during the unrest. The prison became known after the abuse of prisoners was revealed after the U.S. forces took control.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Kapela zrušila predstavenie na štadióne War Memorial v meste Maui, ktorého sa malo zúčastniť 9 000 ľudí, a svojim fanúšikom sa ospravedlnila. Manažérska spoločnosť kapely, HK Management Inc., zo začiatku neuviedla žiadny dôvod, prečo zrušili 20. septembra koncert, ale na druhý deň sa vyhovorila na logistické dôvody.
mt: The band canceled a performance at the War Memorial Stadium in Maui, which was expected to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to their fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., initially did not give any reason for the September 20 concert's cancellation, but the next day apologized for logistical reasons.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Rozsiahle rabovanie údajne pokračovalo cez noc, pretože v uliciach Biškeku neboli prítomní príslušníci policajných zložiek. Jeden z pozorovateľov označil Biškek za mesto upadajúce do stavu „anarchie“, keďže po uliciach sa tam potulujú zločinecké skupiny, ktoré rabujú obchody so spotrebným tovarom. Niekoľko obyvateľov Biškeku obvinilo protestujúcich z juhu z protizákonného konania.
mt: Extensive looting is reportedly continuing overnight, as police officers were not present in the streets of Bishkek. One observer described Bishkek as a city descending into a state of "anarchy", as criminal gangs are roaming the streets, looting shops selling consumer goods. Several residents of Bishkek have accused the protesters from the south of acting illegally.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Generálny riaditeľ spoločnosti Ring, Jamie Siminoff, predtým poznamenal, že spoločnosť vznikla, keď nebolo počuť zvonček z jeho garážového obchodu. Vytvoril podľa neho WiFi zvonček na dvere. Siminoff uviedol, že predaj sa zvýšil po jeho vystúpení v roku 2013 v epizóde šou Shark Tank, kedy porota odmietla financovať startup. Koncom roku 2017 sa Siminoff objavil na teleshoppingovej stanici QVC. Ring tiež urovnal súdny spor s konkurenčnou bezpečnostnou spoločnosťou ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff previously noted that the company was founded when he couldn't hear the doorbell from his garage store. He created a WiFi doorbell for the door. Siminoff introduced the product in 2013 on the show Shark Tank, where the panel rejected funding the startup. At the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Ring also settled a lawsuit with security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Šou PBS je držiteľom viac ako dvoch tuctov ocenení Emmy a trvá kratšie iba ako Sesame Street a Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Každá epizóda seriálu sa zamerala na tému v konkrétnej knihe a potom ju preskúmala prostredníctvom viacerých príbehov. Každá epizóda tiež odporúčala knihy, ktoré by mohli deti zaujímať, keď idú do knižnice. John Grant z WNED Buffalo (domáca stanica Reading Rainbow) povedal: „Reading Rainbow naučila deti čítať... ukázala im lásku k čítaniu – [show] motivovala ich, aby si vzali do ruky knihu a začali čítať.“ Niektorí, vrátane Johna Granta, sa domnievajú, že ku koncu seriálu prispela kríza financovania a posun v nastavení programového zloženia vzdelávacích televízií.
mt: PBS is the holder of more than two dozen Emmy awards and is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the series focused on a theme in a particular book and then examined it through several stories. Each episode also recommended books that children might be interested in when they went to the library. John Grant of WNED Buffalo (the show's home station) said, "Reading Rainbow taught children to read... showed them the love of reading – [the show] motivated them to take a book in their hands and start reading." Some, including John Grant, believe that by the end of the series, the show was affected by a funding crisis and a shift in the educational programming schedule of television.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Predstavitelia Amsterdamu a múzea Anny Frankovej tvrdia, že je strom napadnutý plesňou a predstavuje ohrozenie verejného zdravia. Argumentujú tým, že hrozí bezprostredné riziko, lebo sa strom môže prevrátiť a spadnúť. Jeho zoťatie bolo naplánované na utorok, ale podarilo sa ho zachrániť po mimoriadnom rozhodnutí súdu.
mt: Representatives of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank House say the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health risk. They argue that there is an immediate risk because the tree could topple over. Its removal was scheduled for Tuesday, but it was saved by an extraordinary court decision.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Sloboda zvierat a Kráľovská spoločnosť na ochranu týraných zvierat (RSPCA) opäť volajú po povinnej inštalácii CCTV kamier na všetkých austrálskych bitúnkoch. David O'Shannessy, hlavný inšpektor RSPCA v Novom Južnom Walese, uviedol pre ABC, že v Austrálii by mali sledovanie a inšpekcie bitúnkov byť samozrejmosťou. „Kamerový systém by určite vyslal silný signál ľuďom pracujúcim so zvieratami, že blaho zvierat má najvyššiu prioritu.“
mt: The RSPCA and Animals Australia are again calling for mandatory CCTV cameras on all Australian abattoirs. David O'Shannessy, RSPCA's chief inspector in New South Wales, told ABC that in Australia, CCTV monitoring and abattoir inspections should be a given. "A camera system would certainly send a strong signal to people working with animals that animal welfare is the highest priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Počas pohrebu Jeffa Weiseho a troch z deviatich obetí sa dnes v komunite Red Lake šírili správy, že uväznili iného študenta v súvislosti so streľbou na škole z 21. marca. Okrem potvrdenia dnešného zatknutia neposkytla polícia žiadne oficiálne informácie. Zdroj oboznámený s priebehom vyšetrovania pre noviny Minneapolis Star-Tribune povedal, že zatknutým bol Louis Jourdain, 16-ročný syn Floyda Jourdaina, predsedu rady kmeňa Red Lake. V súčasnosti nie je známe, aké obvinenia budú vznesené, ani čo priviedlo úrady k chlapcovi, ale na federálnom súde sa začalo konanie s mladistvým.
mt: During the funeral of Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims today in the Red Lake community, reports spread that another student had been arrested in connection with the shooting at the school on March 21.  In addition to confirming today's arrest, police have not provided any official information.  A source familiar with the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that the arrested was Louis Jourdain, 16, son of Floyd Jourdain, chairman of the Red Lake tribe.  It is currently unknown what charges will be filed, or what led authorities to the boy, but a federal court has begun proceedings with the juvenile.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Organizátori protestu uviedli, že v nemeckých mestách ako Berlín, Kolín nad Rýnom, Hamburg a Hanover sa zhromaždilo dokopy asi 100 000 ľudí. V Berlíne odhaduje polícia účasť 6500 demonštrantov. Protesty sa uskutočnili aj v Paríži, v Sofii v Bulharsku, vo Vilniuse v Litve, vo Valette na Malte, v Talline v Estónsku a Edinburghu a Glasgowe v Škótsku. V Londýne protestovalo pred niektorými hlavnými kanceláriami držiteľov autorských práv asi 200 ľudí. Minulý mesiac došlo v Poľsku k veľkým protestom, keď krajina podpísala dohodu ACTA, preto sa poľská vláda nateraz rozhodla dohodu neratifikovať. Lotyšsko a Slovensko zdržali proces vstupu do ACTA.
mt: Organizers say that in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover, about 100,000 people have gathered. In Berlin, police estimate 6,500 demonstrators. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valletta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested in front of some of the main offices of copyright holders. Last month, there were large protests in Poland when the country signed the ACTA agreement, so the Polish government has decided not to ratify the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia have delayed the entry process into ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Bolo nahlásených asi 60 prípadov prehriatia chybných iPodov, ktoré spôsobili spolu šesť požiarov a štyri osoby pri nich utrpeli drobné popáleniny. Japonské ministerstvo hospodárstva, obchodu a priemyslu (METI) uviedlo, že si bolo vedomé 27 nehôd súvisiacich so zariadeniami. Minulý týždeň vládna agentúra METI oznámila, že Apple ju informoval o 34 ďalších prípadoch prehriatia, ktoré spoločnosť označila za „nezávažné“. Ministerstvo zareagovalo tým, že označilo odročenie správy spoločnosti Apple za „skutočne poľutovaniahodné“.
mt: 60 cases of overheating iPods have been reported, causing six fires and four people to suffer minor burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) announced that it was aware of 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, the METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company had labeled "minor." The ministry responded by calling Apple's delay in reporting the incidents "very regrettable."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Výkonný riaditeľ spoločnosti Apple Steve Jobs zariadenie predstavil tak, že si po príchode na pódium iPhone vybral z vrecka svojich džínsov. Počas svojho dvojhodinového prejavu uviedol, že „Apple ide dnes znovu vynájsť telefón. Dnes budeme tvoriť históriu“.
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs introduced the device by pulling an iPhone from his jeans pocket. During his two-hour presentation, he said, "Apple is reinventing the phone today. We're going to create history."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Výkonný riaditeľ spoločnosti Apple Steve Jobs zariadenie predstavil tak, že si po príchode na pódium iPhone vybral z vrecka svojich džínsov. Počas svojho dvojhodinového prejavu uviedol, že „Apple ide dnes znovu vynájsť telefón. Dnes budeme tvoriť históriu“.
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs introduced the device by pulling an iPhone from his jeans pocket. During his two-hour presentation, he said, "Apple is reinventing the phone today. We're going to create history."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Súčasná senátorka a prvá dáma Argentíny Cristina Fernandez de Kirchnerová včera večer oznámila svoju prezidentskú kandidatúru v meste La Plata, čo je 50 kilometrov od Buenos Aires. Kirchnerová informovala o svojom úmysle kandidovať za prezidentku v divadle Argentine Theatre, kde v roku 2005 odštartovala svoju kampaň na vstup do Senátu ako členka provinčnej delegácie Buenos Aires.
mt: Current Argentine senator and first lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in the city of La Plata, which is 50 kilometers from Buenos Aires. Kirchner informed of her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, where in 2005 she launched her campaign to enter the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires provincial delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA tiež zistila, že hoci bolo video odvysielané na internete, Big Brother neporušil zákony o cenzúre online obsahu, pretože médiá neboli uložené na jeho webovej stránke. Zákon o vysielaní a retransmisii ustanovuje reguláciu internetového obsahu. Aby bol nejaký obsah považovaný za internetový, musí sa fyzicky nachádzať na nejakom serveri.
mt: ACMA also found that although the video was broadcast on the internet, Big Brother did not break laws about censorship of online content, because the media were not stored on its website. The Broadcasting and Receiving Act regulates internet content. For any content to be considered internet, it must physically be located on some server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Peter Costello, austrálsky minister financií a človek, ktorý s najväčšou pravdepodobnosťou nahradí predsedu vlády Johna Howarda ako šéfa liberálnej strany, sa vzdal podpory jadrovoenergetického priemyslu v Austrálii. Costello vyhlásil, že keď sa výroba jadrovej energie stane ekonomicky dostupnou, tak by ju Austrália mala začať využívať. ""Ak to bude určené na priemyselné použitie, mali by sme to mať. Z toho vyplýva, že proti jadrovej energii neexistujú žiadne zásadné výhrady,"" uviedol Costello."
mt: "Peter Costello, Australia's Treasurer and the man most likely to replace Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has withdrawn support for the nuclear power industry in Australia. Costello declared that when nuclear power becomes economically viable, Australia should begin to use it. ""If it's for industrial use, we should have it. That means there are no fundamental objections to nuclear power,"" Costello said."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Nakoľko je denne k dispozícii len osemnásť medailí, mnohým krajinám sa nepodarilo dosiahnuť na medailové umiestnenie. Patrí tam Holandsko, s včerajším umiestnením Anny Jochemsenovej na deviatom mieste v triede stojacich žien v Super-G a Fínsko s Katjou Saarinenovou na desiatej priečke v rovnakom podujatí. Austrálčan Mitchell Gourley obsadil jedenáste miesto v poradí Super-G – muži. Český pretekár Oldřich Jelínek skončil na šestnástom mieste. Arly Velasquez z Mexika skončil v mužskom sediacom Super-G na pätnástom mieste. Adam Hall z Nového Zélandu skončil deviaty v mužskom stojacom Super-G. Poľský zrakovo postihnutý zjazdový lyžiar Maciej Krezel s navádzačkou Annou Ogarzynskou obsadili v Super-G trináste miesto. Juhokórejčan Jong Seork Park skončil v Super-G sediacich mužov dvadsiaty štvrtý.
mt: Because there are only eighteen medals available daily, many countries have not been able to achieve a medal position. This includes the Netherlands, with yesterday's position of Anna Jochemsen in the ninth place in the standing women's Super-G and Finland with Katja Saarinen in the tenth place in the same event. Australian Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's Super-G. Czech skier Oldřich Jelínek finished sixteenth. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's seated Super-G. Adam Hall of New Zealand finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Polish visually impaired alpine skier Maciej Krezel with guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korean Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's seated Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Súd sa konal na Birminghamskom korunnom súde a skončil sa 3. augusta. Moderátor zadržaný na mieste, útok poprel a tvrdil, že sa pomocou palice bránil pred fľašami, ktoré na neho hádzalo až tridsať ľudí. Blake bol taktiež usvedčený z pokusu o narušenie riadneho výkonu spravodlivosti. Sudca povedal Blakeovi, že je „prakticky neodvratné“, že pôjde do väzenia.
mt: The trial was held at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The moderator was held in place, denied the attack and claimed he was defending himself with a baton against bottles thrown at him by thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to interfere with the regular operation of justice. The judge told Blake that it was "virtually inevitable" that he would go to prison.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Medzi ďalšie témy programu konferecie na Bali patrí záchrana zostávajúcich svetových lesov a zdieľanie technológií, ktoré pomáhajú rozvojovým krajinám napredovať menej znečisťujúcimi spôsobmi. OSN tiež dúfa, že dokončí fond, ktorý pomôže krajinám postihnutým globálnym otepľovaním vyrovnať sa s jeho dopadmi. Peniaze mohli ísť na protipovodňové domy, lepšie hospodárenie s vodou a diverzifikáciu plodín.
mt: Other topics of the conference on Bali include saving remaining global forests and sharing technologies that help developing countries advance less polluting ways. The UN also hopes to complete a fund that will help countries affected by global warming adapt to its effects. The money could go to flood-proof homes, better water management and crop diversification.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Nigéria predtým oznámila, že plánuje vstúpiť do AfCFTA v týždni pred summitom. Komisár Africkej únie pre obchod a priemysel Albert Muchanga oznámil, že k únii sa má pridať Benin. Komisár povedal: „Ešte sme sa nedohodli na pravidlách pôvodu a colných podmienkach, ale stanovený rámec je postačujúci k tomu, aby sme 1. júla 2020 začali obchodovať“.
mt: Nigeria previously announced it would join the AfCFTA in the week before the summit. African Union Commissioner for Trade and Industry Albert Muchanga announced that Benin would join the union. The commissioner said, "We have not agreed on the rules of origin and customs conditions, but the framework is sufficient for us to start trading on July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Počas svojho pôsobenia v Atlante vzbudila kritický ohlas a bola uznávaná za svoj novátorský prístup k mestskému vzdelávaniu. V roku 2009 jej bol udelený titul národnej dozorkyne roka. V čase udeľovania cien bolo na školách v Atlante zaznamenané podstatné zlepšenie výsledkov testov. Po krátkom čase The Atlanta Journal-Constitution publikoval správu, ktorá poukazuje na problémy s výsledkami testov. V správe sa uvádza, že výsledky testov sa nepravdepodobne rýchlo zlepšili, a tvrdí, že škola interne problémy zistila, ale na základe týchto zistení nekonala. Dôkazy potom naznačovali, že Hall testovacie hárky manipuloval a spolu s 34 ďalšími výchovnými pracovníkmi bol v roku 2013 obvinený.
mt: During her tenure in Atlanta, she drew criticism and was praised for her innovative approach to urban education. In 2009 she was named National Principal of the Year. At the time of the award, test scores in Atlanta schools had improved significantly. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that questioned the test scores. The report stated that the test scores had improbably improved quickly, and that the school had internally identified problems with the scores, but did not act on them. Evidence then suggested that Hall had tampered with test scores and was charged along with 34 other educators in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Jedna bomba vybuchla pred kanceláriou generálneho guvernéra. Tri ďalšie bomby explodovali v blízkosti vládnych budov v priebehu dvoch hodín. Niektoré správy uvádzajú oficiálny počet obetí na osem a oficiálne správy potvrdzujú, že až 30 bolo zranených; konečné čísla však zatiaľ nie sú známe
mt: 1 bomb exploded in front of the governor-general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings over a two-hour period. Some reports give the official death toll as eight and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; final numbers are not yet known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21-ročný Jesus prestúpil do Manchester City v januári 2017 z brazílskeho klubu Palmeiras údajne za poplatok 27 miliónov libier. Odvtedy Brazílčan hral za klub v 53 zápasoch vo všetkých súťažiach a strelil 24 gólov.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus moved to Manchester City in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: V Mekke, ktorá je posvätným mestom islamu, dnes ráno okolo 10. hodiny miestneho času došlo k zrúteniu ubytovne. V budove bolo zhromaždených veľa pútnikov, ktorí prišli navštíviť sväté mesto v predvečer púte hadž. V hosteli boli ubytovaní prevažne občania Spojených arabských emirátov. Počet obetí je najmenej 15, avšak odhaduje sa, že toto číslo stúpne.
mt: In Mecca, a holy city of Islam, a hotel collapsed early this morning at around 10 am local time. The building was filled with pilgrims who had come to visit the holy city in the lead up to the Hajj. The hotel was mostly occupied by citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, but is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Satelity, oba vážiace viac ako 450 kg a pohybujúce sa rýchlosťou približne 28 200 km/h, sa zrazili 790 km nad Zemou. Vedci vravia, že kolízia spôsobila mohutnú explóziu. Stále sa pokúšajú zistiť, aká silná bola zrážka a aký to bude mať vplyv na Zem. Strategické velenie USA amerického ministerstva obrany trosky sleduje. Výsledok grafickej analýzy bude zverejnený na verejnej webovej stránke.
mt: 2 satellites, both weighing more than 450 kg and moving at about 28,200 km/h, collided 790 km above the Earth. Scientists say the collision caused a massive explosion. They are still trying to determine how strong the collision was and what effect it will have on Earth. The U.S. Department of Defense is tracking the debris. The results of the graphic analysis will be posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten sa v zozname najbohatších Američanov v roku 2008 umiestnil na 190. mieste s majetkom odhadovaným na 2,3 miliardy dolárov. V roku 1950 absolvoval Vysokú školu umenia a vied na Virgínskej univerzite a stal sa významným darcom tejto inštitúcie.
mt: 2008 Forbes 400 list ranked him 190th with an estimated net worth of $2.3 billion. In 1950 he graduated from the University of Virginia's School of Arts and Sciences and became a major donor to this institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Guvernér štátu Kalifornia Arnold Schwarzenegger podpísal zákon zakazujúci predaj alebo požičiavanie násilných videohier neplnoletým osobám. Podľa návrhu zákona sa vyžaduje, aby v štáte Kalifornia boli všetky predávané násilné videohry označené etiketou s nápisom „18“ a aby sa ich predaj maloletým osobám trestal pokutou 1 000 dolárov za každý jednotlivý priestupok.
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill banning the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that all violent video games sold in California be labeled with an "18" rating and that the sale of violent video games to minors be punished with a $1,000 fine for each offense.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Duvall, ktorý je ženatý a má dve dospelé deti, nezanechal veľký dojem na Millera, s ktorým príbeh súvisel. Keď chceli, aby sa k tomu vyjadril, Miller povedal: „Mike rozpráva počas vypočúvania veľa...chystal som sa, takže som veľmi nepočul, čo rozprával.“
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not make much of an impression on Miller, with whom the story was related. When asked to comment, Miller said, "Mike was talking during the interrogation a lot...I was ready, so I didn't really hear what he was talking about."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Predseda vlády Stephen Harper súhlasil s tým, že po utorňajšom 25-minútovom stretnutí s vodcom NDP Jackom Laytonom v kancelárii predsedu vlády ešte pred druhým čítaním predloží výboru vládny návrh „zákona o čistom ovzduší“ na preskúmanie. Výbor je zložený zo zástupcov všetkých strán. Layton požiadal o zmeny v environmentálnom zákone konzervatívcov počas stretnutia s predsedom vlády a požiadal o „dôkladné a úplné prepísanie“ environmentálneho zákona konzervatívnej strany. Odkedy federálna zasiahla s cieľom prevziať kontrolu nad financovaním nemocnice Mersey v tasmánskom meste Devonport, tasmánska vláda a niektorí federálni poslanci tento čin kritizovali ako predvolebné divadlo pred federálnymi voľbami, ktoré sa majú vyhlásiť najneskôr v novembri. Predseda vlády John Howard však uviedol, že nariadenie malo iba ochrániť nemocničné objekty pred znehodnotením zo strany tasmánskej vlády a poskytnúť im ďalších 45 miliónov AUD.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to put forward the government's "clean air" bill for review by a committee of all parties after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in the prime minister's office. Layton asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental bill during the meeting with the prime minister and asked for a "thorough and complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill. Since the federal government intervened to take control of the Mersey Hospital in the Tasmanian city of Devonport, the Tasmanian government and some federal MPs have criticized the move as pre-election theatre before the federal election, which is to be held by November at the latest. Prime Minister John Howard, however, said the order was only to protect the hospital facilities from the Tasmanian government and to provide them with an additional $45 million AUD.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Vo vzorkách moču domácich miláčikov, ktorí uhynuli po konzumácii kontaminovaného krmiva boli nájdenné kyselina kyanurová a melamín. Vedci z univerzity informovali, že tieto dve zlúčeniny navzájom reagujú a tvoria kryštály, ktoré môžu blokovať funkciu obličiek. Vedci pozorovali kryštály vytvorené v moči mačiek adíciou melamínu a kyseliny kyanúrovej. Zloženie týchto kryštálov sa zhoduje s tými, ktoré sa nachádzajú v moči postihnutých domácich zvierat, keď sa urobí porovnanie pomocou infračervenej spektroskopie (FTIR).
mt: In the urine of domestic pets that died after consuming contaminated food, cyanide acid and melamine were found. Scientists from the university reported that these two compounds react with each other and form crystals that can block kidney function. Scientists observed crystals formed in the urine of cats with the addition of melamine and cyanide acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected domestic animals when compared using infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua uviedol, že vládni vyšetrovatelia v stredu našli dva letové záznamníky, tzv.„čierne skrinky“. Spolubojovníci taktiež vzdali úctu Lune. Tommy Dreamer uviedol: ""Luna bola tou prvou kráľovnou extrému. Bola to moja prvá manažérka. Zomrela v noci dvoch mesiacov, čo bolo tak ako ona pomerne originálne. Bola to silná žena."" Dustin „Goldust“ Runnels to okomentoval slovami: „Luna bola rovnako šialená ako ja... možno ešte viac... milujem ju a bude mi chýbať... dúfam, že sa tam hore má dobre.“"
mt: "Xinhua reported that government investigators found two flight recorders, known as "black boxes" on Wednesday. Colleagues also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said: ""Luna was the first queen of the extreme. It was my first manager. She died two nights ago, which was pretty original. She was a strong woman."" Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented: "Luna was just as crazy as I... maybe even more... I love her and will miss her... I hope she's doing well up there.""
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Hoci v dome boli v momente nárazu auta traja ľudia, nikto z nich nebol zranený. Vodič však utrpel vážne zranenia hlavy. Kým pohotovostná služba vyslobodila vodiča z červeného Audi TT, bola cesta, na ktorej došlo k zrážke, dočasne uzatvorená. Spočiatku bol hospitalizovaný v Nemocnici Jamesa Pageta v Great Yarmouth. Následne bol presunutý do Addenbrookeovej nemocnice v Cambridge.
mt: 3 people were in the house at the time of the crash, but none were injured. The driver however suffered serious head injuries. While the emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT, the road on which the crash occurred was temporarily closed. Initially he was hospitalized at the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Hry začali o 10:00 hod za výborného počasia. A až na dopoludňajšie mrholenie, ktoré rýchlo utíchlo, to bol pre rugby 7's ideálny deň. Jednička v turnaji Južná Afrika začala správne a v pohode zvíťazila 26:00 nad Zambiou, 5-tou v poradí. Aj keď Juhoafrická republika vyzerala v zápase so svojimi južnými sestrami kŕčovito, postupne sa však s postupujúcim turnajom zlepšovala. Vynikli vďaka ich disciplinovanej obrane, schopnosti dobre ovládať loptu a vynikajúcej tímovej práci a bolo zrejmé, že to bol ten pravý súper.
mt: The games began at 10:00 am under perfect weather conditions. Except for a midday shower, which quickly dissipated, it was an ideal day for rugby 7's. South Africa, the number one team in the tournament, started well and comfortably defeated Zambia, the number five team, 26:00. Although South Africa looked nervous in the game against their southern sisters, they gradually improved as the tournament progressed. They excelled due to their disciplined defense, ability to control the ball well, and outstanding team work, and it was clear that they were the right opponent.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Počas troch posledných desaťročí si Čína vybudovala trhovú ekonomiku, hoci oficiálne je stále komunistickým štátom. Prvé hospodárske reformy sa uskutočnili pod vedením Deng Xiaopinga. Odvtedy sa hospodárska veľkosť Číny zväčšila 90-násobne. Vlani prvýkrát Čína vyviezla viac automobilov ako Nemecko a tiež Spojeným štátom americkým zobrala prvenstvo najväčšieho automobilového trhu. HDP Číny by mohol byť vyšší ako HDP USA v priebehu dvoch desaťročí.
mt: During the last three decades, China has built a market economy, although officially it is still a communist state. The first economic reforms were carried out under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has increased 90-fold. Recently, China exported more cars than Germany and also took the lead in the largest automotive market from the United States. China's GDP could be higher than the United States in the next two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: „Do roku 2020 sa pokúsime znížiť emisie oxidu uhličitého na jednotku HDP o značnú mieru v porovnaní s hladinou v roku 2005.“ Neurčil rozsah zníženia a uviedol, že bude vychádzať z výkonu čínskej ekonomiky. Hu povzbudil rozvojové krajiny k tomu, „aby sa vyhli starej ceste znečisťovania na začiatku a čistenia na konci“. Dodal, že „by sa od nich nemalo žiadať, aby prebrali záväzky, ktoré prekračujú rámec ich vývojovej fázy, zodpovednosti a schopností.“
mt: “By 2020 we will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount compared with the 2005 level.” He did not specify the extent of the reduction and said it would be based on the growth of the Chinese economy. Hu encouraged developing countries to “avoid the old path of pollution first and then cleaning up later.” He added that “they should not be asked to take on commitments that exceed their development stage, responsibilities and capabilities.”
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: „Do roku 2020 sa pokúsime znížiť emisie oxidu uhličitého na jednotku HDP o značnú mieru v porovnaní s hladinou v roku 2005.“ Neurčil rozsah zníženia a uviedol, že bude vychádzať z výkonu čínskej ekonomiky. Hu povzbudil rozvojové krajiny k tomu, „aby sa vyhli starej ceste znečisťovania na začiatku a čistenia na konci“. Dodal, že „by sa od nich nemalo žiadať, aby prebrali záväzky, ktoré prekračujú rámec ich vývojovej fázy, zodpovednosti a schopností.“
mt: “By 2020 we will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount compared with the 2005 level.” He did not specify the extent of the reduction and said it would be based on the growth of the Chinese economy. Hu encouraged developing countries to “avoid the old path of pollution first and then cleaning up later.” He added that “they should not be asked to take on commitments that exceed their development stage, responsibilities and capabilities.”
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Lekárska charita Mangola, Lekári bez hraníc a Svetová zdravotnícka organizácia tvrdia, že je to najväčšie ohnisko nákazy, aké v krajine zaznamenali. Hovorca organizácie Lekári bez hraníc Richard Veerman povedal: „Angola smeruje k najvážnejšiemu prepuknutiu choroby a situácia je tam naďalej veľmi zlá.“
mt: The Medical Charity Mangola, Médecins Sans Frontières and the World Health Organization say it is the largest outbreak the country has seen.  The organization's spokesman Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading towards the most serious outbreak of the disease and the situation is still very bad."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Riaditeľ prokuratúry Keir Starmer QC dnes ráno vydal vyhlásenie, v ktorom oznámil stíhanie Huhnea aj Pryceovej. Huhne rezignoval a vo vláde ho nahradí poslanec Ed Davey. Očakáva sa, že poslanec Norman Lamb nastúpi na miesto ministra obchodu, ktoré opúšťa Davey. Huhne a Pryce sa majú dostaviť na Westminsterský magistrátny súd 16. februára.
mt: Prosecuting counsel Keir Starmer QC announced this morning that Huhne and Pryce would be charged. Huhne resigned and was replaced in the cabinet by Ed Davey. It is expected that Norman Lamb will replace Davey as Business Secretary. Huhne and Pryce are expected to appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Príbeh skladateľa Camille Saint-Saens, ktorý uviedla francúzska opera, je o umelcovi, „ktorého život je diktovaný láskou k drogám a Japonsku.“ V dôsledku toho účinkujúci fajčia na pódiu marihuanovú cigaretu a samotné divadlo povzbudzuje publikum k tomu, aby sa pridalo.
mt: The story of composer Camille Saint-Saens, who premiered a French opera, is of an artist whose life is dictated by love of drugs and Japan. As a result, performers smoke marijuana cigarettes on stage and the theater itself encourages the audience to join in.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Leonov, tiež známy ako „kozmonaut č. 11“, bol súčasťou pôvodného tímu kozmonautov Sovietskeho zväzu. 18. marca 1965 ako prvý človek vykonával činnosť počas pobytu mimo kozmickú loď (EVA), inak povedané „výstup do vesmíru“, pri ktorej zostal osamotený mimo vesmírnej lode len niečo vyše dvanásť minút. Za svoju prácu dostal ocenenie „Hrdina Sovietskeho zväzu“, najvyššie vyznamenanie Sovietskeho zväzu. O desať rokov neskôr velil sovietskej časti misie Apollo-Sojuz symbolizujúcej koniec vesmírnych pretekov.
mt: 18 March 1965, Leonov, also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11", was the first human to perform an extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", outside a spacecraft, remaining alone outside the spacecraft for over 12 minutes. He was awarded the title of "Hero of the Soviet Union", the highest honor of the Soviet Union, for his work. Ten years later, he commanded the Soviet portion of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, symbolizing the end of the space race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Gibson bol po nehode prevezený do nemocnice, krátko nato však zomrel. 64-ročný vodič nákladného vozidla sa pri zrážke nezranil. Samotné vozidlo bolo v ten istý deň odvezené z miesta nehody približne o 12:00 GMT. Osoba, ktorá pracuje v garáži neďaleko od miesta nehody, povedala: „Boli tam deti, ktoré chceli prejsť cez cestu a všetky kričali a nariekali.“ Všetci bežali späť od miesta, kde sa stala nehoda.
mt: 64-year-old truck driver was not injured in the crash. The truck was removed from the scene of the crash around 12:00 GMT. A person who works in a nearby garage said: "There were children who wanted to cross the road and all were screaming and crying." Everyone ran back from the scene of the accident.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Práca, ktorú vykonali, bola zväčša teoretická, ale program bol napísaný tak, aby simuloval pozorovania o galaxii Strelec. Úkaz, ktorý tím očakával, by spôsobili prílivové sily medzi tmavou hmotou galaxie a tmavou hmotou Mliečnej dráhy. Práve tak ako Mesiac pôsobí príťažlivou silou na Zem a spôsobuje príliv a odliv, tak pôsobí aj Mliečna dráha na galaxiu Strelec. Vedci dospeli k tomu, že pôsobenie jednej tmavej hmoty na inú tmavú hmotu je rovnaké, ako je to u bežnej hmoty. Táto teória hovorí, že väčšina temnej hmoty okolo galaxie sa nachádza okolo galaxie v akejsi svätožiare a tvorí ju množstvo malých častíc.
mt: The team's work was mostly theoretical, but the program was designed to simulate observations of the Milky Way galaxy.  The phenomenon they expected would be tidal forces between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.  Just as the Moon exerts a gravitational pull on Earth and causes tides, so does the Milky Way on the Andromeda galaxy.  The team concluded that the effect of one dark matter on another dark matter is the same as it is for normal matter.  This theory says that most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in a halo around the galaxy and is made up of a large number of small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Debatu vyvolala polemika o výdavkoch na pomoc a obnovu po hurikáne Katrina, ktorú niektorí fiškálni konzervatívci vtipne označili za „Bushovu dohodu o New Orleans“. Liberálna kritika snahy o obnovu bola zameraná na na udeľovanie s obnovou súvisiacich zmlúv insiderom z Washingtonu.
mt: The debate was sparked by a controversy over spending on aid and reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina, which some fiscal conservative commentators jokingly referred to as "Bush's deal on New Orleans". Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort was focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to insiders from Washington.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Debatu vyvolala polemika o výdavkoch na pomoc a obnovu po hurikáne Katrina, ktorú niektorí fiškálni konzervatívci vtipne označili za „Bushovu dohodu o New Orleans“. Liberálna kritika snahy o obnovu bola zameraná na na udeľovanie s obnovou súvisiacich zmlúv insiderom z Washingtonu.

src: "Keď sa kapsula dostane na Zem a vstúpi do atmosféry, zhruba o piatej ráno (východného času), očakáva sa jej veľká svetelná šou pre ľudí v severnej Kalifornii, Oregone, Nevade a Utahu. Kapsula bude pripomínať padajúcu hviezdu letiacu po oblohe. Kapsula bude letieť rýchlosťou asi 12,8 km alebo 8 míľ za sekundu, pri tejto rýchlosti by to zo San Francisca do Los Angeles trvalo jednu minútu. Stardust vytvorí nový svetový rekord najrýchlejšieho návratu kozmickej lode na Zem, čím prekoná doterajší rekord dosiahnutý v máji 1969 pri návrate veliteľského modulu Apollo X. ""Bude sa presúvať cez západné pobrežie severnej Kalifornie a bude osvecovať oblohu od Kalifornie cez stredný Oregon, ďalej cez Nevadu, Idaho až do Utahu,"" uviedol Tom Duxbury, projektový manažér spoločnosti Stardust."
mt: "When the capsule enters the Earth's atmosphere, around 5 a.m. Eastern time, it is expected to put on a big light show for people in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will resemble a falling star flying across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 kilometers or 8 miles per second, at this speed it would take one minute to travel from San Francisco to Los Angeles. Stardust will set a new world record for the fastest return of a spacecraft to Earth, surpassing the previous record set in May 1969 for the return of the Apollo X command module. ""It will be moving across the western coast of Northern California and will light up the sky from California through central Oregon, further through Nevada, Idaho and into Utah,"" said Tom Duxbury, Stardust project manager.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Úrady v Ohiu informovali, že lekárka z Detskej nemocnice v Pittsburghu v Pensylvánii, bude obvinená z obzvlášť závažnej vraždy, pretože v stredu našli v kufri jej auta jej mŕtvu matku. Doktorku Malar Balasubramanianovú (29) našli na predmestí Blue Ash v Ohiu približne 25 kilometrov severne od Cincinnati. Ležala na zemi vedľa cesty v tričku a spodnej bielizni zjavne silne pod vplyvom liekov. Nasmerovala dôstojníkov k svojmu čiernemu Oldsmobile Intrigue, ktorý bol vzdialený 150 metrov. Tam našli telo Saroja Balasubramaniana (53) zakryté zakrvavenými pokrývkami. Polícia uviedla, že telo sa tam nachádzalo asi jeden deň.
mt: Authorities in Ohio announced that a doctor from the Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh in Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after police found her dead mother in her car's trunk on Wednesday. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian (29) was found on the side of the road in Blue Ash, Ohio, about 25 miles north of Cincinnati, lying on the ground in a t-shirt and underwear apparently under the influence of drugs. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was 150 yards away. There they found the body of Saroj Balasubramanian (53) covered in bloody blankets. Police said the body had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Je to najväčšia akvizícia v histórii eBay. Spoločnosť dúfa, že sa jej podarí diverzifikovať svoje zdroje zisku a tiež získa popularitu v oblastiach, ako je Čína, východná Európa a Brazília, kde má Skype silnú pozíciu.
mt: It is the largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue sources and also gain popularity in areas such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil, where Skype has a strong position.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Keď po prevoze zranených do nemocnice boje skončili, asi 40 ďalších väzňov zostalo na dvore a odmietali sa vrátiť do svojich ciel. Vyjednávači sa pokúsili situáciu napraviť, požiadavky väzňov však nie sú jasné. Chovanci na dvore založili oheň medzi 22:00 - 23:00 Horského letného času. Strážnici vybavení výstrojm pre boj s výtržníkmi čoskoro vstúpili do dvora a väzňov zahnali do rohu pomocou slzného plynu. Hasičské záchranné tímy oheň napokon do 23:35 hod uhasili.
mt: 40 inmates refused to return to their cells after the wounded were transported to the hospital. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the inmates' demands were unclear. Inmates on the yard started a fire between 22:00 and 23:00 Mountain Daylight Time. Guards equipped with riot gear soon entered the yard and drove the inmates into a corner with tear gas. Firefighters extinguished the fire by 23:35.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: Komentáre zverejnené v televízii boli prvým momentom, kedy popredné iránske zdroje pripustili, že sankcie majú nejaký účinok. Zahŕňajú finančné obmedzenia a zákaz vývozu ropy do Európskej únie, z ktorej získava iránska ekonomika 80 % svojich príjmov zo zahraničia. Vo svojej najnovšej mesačnej správe OPEC uviedol, že vývoz ropy na úrovni 2,8 milióna barelov denne klesol na najnižšiu úroveň za posledné dve desaťročia. Najvyšší vodca krajiny ajatolláh Alí Chomejní označil závislosť na rope za „pascu“, ktorá pochádza ešte z obdobia pred iránskou islamskou revolúciou v roku 1979 a od ktorej by sa mala krajina oslobodiť.
mt: Comments published in the television were the first moment when prominent Iranian sources admitted that sanctions have some effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban on oil exports to the European Union, from which the Iranian economy receives 80 percent of its foreign income. In its latest monthly report, OPEC reported that oil exports at 2.8 million barrels per day fell to the lowest level in the last two decades. Supreme leader of the country Ayatollah Ali Khamenei called the dependence on oil "trap" that comes from the era before the Iranian Islamic Revolution in 1979 and from which the country should be freed.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."
