As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Na štvrtom, piatom a šiestom mieste skončili v tomto poradí bývalý predseda snemovne Newt Gingrich, guvernér Texasu Rick Perry a kongresmanka Michele Bachmannová. Keď prišli výsledky, Gingrich chválil Santorum, no na adresu Romneyho mal tvrdé slová. V jeho mene sa totiž v Iowe vysielala negatívna reklamná kampaň proti Gingrichovi. Perry uviedol: „Vrátim sa do Texasu, aby som vyhodnotil výsledky dnešného správneho výboru a zistil, či pre mňa v týchto pretekoch existuje nejaké východisko,“ neskôr však uviedol, že vo voľbách zostane a bude sa uchádzať v primárkach Južnej Karolíny 21. januára. Bachmannová, ktorá v auguste vyhrala neoficiálne hlasovanie v štáte Iowa, sa rozhodla ukončiť svoju kampaň.
mt: 4th, 5th and 6th place went to former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann. When the results came in, Gingrich praised Santorum, but had harsh words for Romney. In his name, a negative ad campaign was aired against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said, "I'll return to Texas to evaluate the results of today's caucus and determine if there is a path forward for me in this race," later saying he would stay in the race and compete in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won an unofficial straw poll in Iowa in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Stanica na svojich webových stránkach uvádza túto šou ako „rozhlasové divadlo starej školy s vynovenou nehoráznou zápletkou!“ Na začiatku bola táto šou uvedená iba na dlhotrvajúcej internetovej rozhlasovej stránke TogiNet Radio, ktorá bola zameraná na hovorené slovo. Koncom roku 2015 založil TogiNet dcérsku stanicu AstroNet Radio. V šou pôvodne účinkovali amatérski hlasoví herci pochádzajúci z východného Texasu.
mt: The show is described as "radio drama of the old school with a risqué plot!" The show was originally aired only on the long-running internet radio station TogiNet Radio, which was focused on spoken word. At the end of 2015, TogiNet launched a sister station AstroNet Radio. The show originally featured amateur voice actors from East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Útočníci do Bombaja pricestovali 26. novembra 2008 loďou s granátmi a automatickým zbraňami a zaútočili na niekoľko cieľov vrátane preplnenej železničnej stanice Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus a slávneho hotela Taj Mahal. Skauting a zber informácií v podaní Davida Headleyho pomohlo zrealizovať operáciu 10 ozbrojencom z pakistanskej militantnej skupiny Laskhar-e-Taiba. Útok vytvoril vo vzťahoch medzi Indiou a Pakistanom obrovské napätie.
mt: 26 November 2008, terrorists arrived in Mumbai by boat with grenades and automatic weapons and attacked several targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. Scouting and information gathering by David Headley helped to realize the operation by 10 armed members of the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack created enormous tension between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Nadalova rekordná bilancia proti Kanaďanovi je 7:2. Nedávno podľahol Raonicovi na Brisbane Open. Nadal v zápase získal 88 % čistých bodov pričom po prvom podaní získal 76 bodov. Po zápase Kráľ antuky povedal: „Som veľmi nadšený, že som späť vo finálových kolách najdôležitejších turnajov. Som tu, aby som sa to tu pokúsil vyhrať.“
mt: 7:2 Nadal's record against Raonic is still intact. Recently Nadal lost to Raonic at the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of the points in the match, and won 76 points on his first serve. After the match King of Clay said: "I'm very happy to be back in the finals of the most important tournaments. I'm here to try to win it."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Minulý týždeň spoločnosť Naked News oznámila, že dramaticky zvýši medzinárodné jazykové pôsobenie v spravodajstve, a to tromi novými vysielaniami. Táto globálna organizácia, ktorá už vysiela správy v angličtine a japončine, spúšťa vysielanie programov pre televíziu, web a mobilné zariadenia v španielčine, taliančine a kórejčine.
mt: Last week, the Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language reach in news coverage with three new broadcasts. This global organization, which already broadcasts news in English and Japanese, is launching programs for television, web and mobile devices in Spanish, Italian and Korean.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Carpanedo sa okrem stredajšieho podujatia predstavil na majstrovstvách ešte na dvoch individuálnych pretekoch. Jej prvým závodom bol slalom, kde svoju jazdu nedokončila. Rovnako skončilo v týchto pretekoch 36 zo 116 súťažiacich. Vo svojom druhom závode, obrovskom slalome, skončila ako desiata v ženskej skupine s kombinovaným časom 4:41.30. O 2:11.60 minúty tak zaostala za víťazkou prvého miesta, Rakúšankou Claudiou Loeschovou a o 1:09.02 minúty za deviatou Gyöngyi Daniovou z Maďarska. Štyrom sediacim lyžiarkam v ženskej skupine sa nepodarilo dokončiť preteky a 45 z celkových 117 lyžiarov v obrovskom slalome sa v pretekoch neumiestnilo.
mt: Carpanedo competed in the slalom and the giant slalom. In the slalom, she did not finish. 36 of 116 competitors did not finish the slalom. In the giant slalom, she finished tenth in the women's group with a combined time of 4:41.30. She was 2:11.60 minutes behind the first-place finisher, Claudia Loesch of Austria, and 1:09.02 minutes behind ninth-place finisher Gyöngyi Daniová of Hungary. Four of the 117 women's competitors did not finish the giant slalom, and 45 did not finish the giant slalom.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Carpanedo sa okrem stredajšieho podujatia predstavil na majstrovstvách ešte na dvoch individuálnych pretekoch. Jej prvým závodom bol slalom, kde svoju jazdu nedokončila. Rovnako skončilo v týchto pretekoch 36 zo 116 súťažiacich. Vo svojom druhom závode, obrovskom slalome, skončila ako desiata v ženskej skupine s kombinovaným časom 4:41.30. O 2:11.60 minúty tak zaostala za víťazkou prvého miesta, Rakúšankou Claudiou Loeschovou a o 1:09.02 minúty za deviatou Gyöngyi Daniovou z Maďarska. Štyrom sediacim lyžiarkam v ženskej skupine sa nepodarilo dokončiť preteky a 45 z celkových 117 lyžiarov v obrovskom slalome sa v pretekoch neumiestnilo.
mt: Carpanedo competed in the slalom and the giant slalom. In the slalom, she did not finish. 36 of 116 competitors did not finish the slalom. In the giant slalom, she finished tenth in the women's group with a combined time of 4:41.30. She was 2:11.60 minutes behind the first-place finisher, Claudia Loesch of Austria, and 1:09.02 minutes behind ninth-place finisher Gyöngyi Daniová of Hungary. Four of the 117 women's competitors did not finish the giant slalom, and 45 did not finish the giant slalom.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Americká basketbalová asociácia (NBA) v stredu prerušila profesionálnu basketbalovú sezónu pre obavy z COVID-19. Rozhodnutie NBA nasledovalo po tom, čo mal hráč Utahu Jazz pozitívny test na vírus COVID-19.
mt: The National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season on Wednesday over concerns of the COVID-19 virus. The NBA's decision followed after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Dnešným hráčom dňa je Alex Ovečkin z Washington Capitals. Pri výhre 5:3 Washingtonu nad Atlantou Thrashers si pripísal 2 góly a 2 asistencie. Ovečkinovou prvou asistenciou večera bola tá pri víťaznom góle, ktorý vsietil nováčik Nicklas Backstrom; Jeho druhý gól večera bol zároveň jeho 60. gólom v sezóne a stal sa tak prvým hráčom od roku 1995/96, ktorý strelil 60 a viac gólov v sezóne. Vtedy tento míľnik dosiahli Jaromír Jágr a Mario Lemieux.
mt: Today's player of the day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. In a 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers, Ovechkin scored two goals and two assists. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal, scored by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; His second goal of the night was also his 60th goal of the season, making him the first player since 1995/96 to score 60 or more goals in a season. In that season, Jaromír Jágr and Mario Lemieux both accomplished this feat.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Banka Northern Rock bola znárodnená v roku 2008 po odhalení, že vláda Spojeného kráľovstva poskytla spoločnosti mimoriadnu podporu. Spoločnosť Northern Rock potrebovala podporu kvôli svojej finančnej angažovanosti počas hypotekárnej krízy v roku 2007. Predtým ako banku znárodnili, ponuka spoločnosti Virgin Group sira Richarda Bransona na ňu bola zamietnutá. V roku 2010, pri znárodnení, sa hlavná banka Northern Rock plc oddelila od „zlej banky“ Northern Rock (Asset Management). Spoločnosť Virgin kúpila iba tú „zdravú banku“ od Northern Rock, ale banku pre správu aktív neprevzala.
mt: Northern Rock was nationalised in 2008 after the British government provided the company with exceptional support. Northern Rock needed support due to its financial involvement during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. Before the bank was nationalised, the offer from the Virgin Group, Sir Richard Branson, was rejected. In 2010, when the bank was nationalised, the main bank Northern Rock plc separated from the "bad bank" Northern Rock (Asset Management). The Virgin Group only bought the "healthy bank" from Northern Rock, but the bank for asset management was not acquired.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Ruddovo rozhodnutie podpísať Kjótsky protokol znamená, že Spojené štáty americké zostávajú jedinou vyspelou krajinou, ktorá tento dohovor nepodpísala. Bývalá austrálska konzervatívna vláda odmietla ratifikovať Kjóto s tým, že by to poškodilo ekonomiku kvôli silnej závislosti na vývoze uhlia, zatiaľ čo krajiny ako India a Čína neboli viazané emisnými cieľmi.
mt: Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto Protocol means that the United States remains the only developed country not to have signed the treaty. The former conservative Australian government refused to ratify Kyoto on the grounds that it would harm the economy due to its strong dependence on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Strelci v doplnkovej skúške proti škodcom mali byť pod prísnym dohľadom lesníkov, pretože skúška bola sledovaná a bola hodnotená jej účinnosť. V partnerstve medzi NPWS a Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc. boli prijatí kvalifikovaní dobrovoľníci v rámci loveckého programu asociácie Sporting Shooters Association. Podľa Micka O'Flynna, úradujúceho riaditeľa parku pre ochranu a dedičstvo pri NPWS, dostali štyria strelci vybraní pre prvú streleckú operáciu komplexné bezpečnostné a výcvikové pokyny.
mt: The shooters in the cull were to be under strict supervision of the foresters, as the cull was being monitored and its effectiveness was being evaluated. In a partnership between NPWS and Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc., qualified volunteers were accepted as part of the shooting program of the Sporting Shooters Association. According to Mick O'Flynn, NPWS acting director of conservation and heritage, four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: Na základe tejto fosílie sa zistilo, že k rozdeleniu došlo oveľa skôr, ako sa podľa molekulárnych dôkazov predpokladalo. „To znamená, že treba všetko vrátiť späť,“ uviedol výskumný pracovník Rift Valley Research Service v Etiópii a spoluautor štúdie Berhane Asfaw.
mt: Based on this fossil, it was found that the split occurred much earlier than previously thought, according to molecular evidence. "That means everything has to be turned back," said Rift Valley Research Service researcher in Ethiopia and co-author Berhane Asfaw.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Vo štvrtok predstavil dizajn ovládača pre novú konzolu Nintendo Revolution prezident spoločnosti Nintendo Satoru Iwata na hlavnej prezentácii tokijskej hernej show. Ovládač, ktorý je podobný diaľkovému ovládaniu televízie, využíva dva senzory umiestnené v blízkosti televízora používateľa na trianguláciu jeho polohy v trojrozmernom priestore. To umožní hráčom ovládať akcie a pohyby vo videohrách pohybom zariadenia vzduchom.
mt: On Thursday, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller for the new Nintendo Revolution console at the main Tokyo Game Show presentation. The controller, which is similar to a television remote control, uses two sensors placed near the player's television to triangulate his position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Čínska tlačová agentúra Xinhua predtým informovala o únose lietadla. Neskoršie správy potom uvádzali, že v lietadle bola ohlásená bomba a bolo presmerované späť do Afganistanu, pričom pristálo v Kandaháre. Prvé správy hovoria o tom, že lietadlo bolo presmerované naspäť do Afganistanu po tom, čo mu bolo zamietnuté núdzové pristátie v Ürümqi.
mt: The Chinese news agency Xinhua previously reported the plane was hijacked. Later reports said a bomb was reported on board and the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The first reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: V pondelok Sara Danius, stála tajomníčka Nobelovho výboru pre literatúru na Švédskej akadémii, počas rozhlasového programu vo švédskom rozhlase Sveriges verejne oznámila, že výbor sa nedokázal priamo spojiť s Bobom Dylanom v súvislosti so získaním Nobelovej ceny za literatúru za rok 2016. Danius povedal: „Momentálne nerobíme nič. Telefonoval som a poslal som e-maily jeho najbližšiemu spolupracovníkovi a dostal som veľmi priateľské odpovede. Nateraz to určite stačí.“
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, during a radio program in Swedish Radio Sveriges, announced that the committee was unable to directly contact Bob Dylan in connection with the award of the Nobel Prize in Literature for 2016. Danius said: "We are doing nothing right now. I called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and got very friendly responses. It certainly suffices for now."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: Americký prezident George W. Bush toto oznámenie privítal. Bushov hovorca Gordon Johndroe označil prísľub Severnej Kórey za „hlavný krok k dosiahnutiu overiteľnej denuklearizácie Kórejského polostrova“.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the North Korean pledge "a major step toward verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: V roku 1956 sa Słania presťahoval do Švédska, kde o tri roky neskôr začal pracovať pre švédsku poštu a stal sa ich hlavným rytcom. Pre Švédsko a 28 ďalších krajín vyrobil viac ako 1000 známok. Jeho práca má takú uznávanú kvalitu a detaily, že jeho meno je jedným z mála „domácich mien“ filatelistov. Niektorí sa špecializujú výhradne na zber jeho prác. Jeho tisícou známkou v poradí bol veľkolepý kúsok „Veľké skutky švédskych kráľov“ od Davida Klöckera Ehrenstrahla z roku 2000, ktorý sa dostal aj do Guinnessovej knihy svetových rekordov. Taktiež gravíroval mnohým krajinám bankovky. Medzi jeho posledné diela patria portréty predsedov vlády na prednej strane nových kanadských 5 a 100-dolárových bankoviek.
mt: 1956, Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began working for the Swedish Post Office and became their main engraver. For Sweden and 28 other countries he designed more than 1000 stamps. His work has such a recognized quality and details that his name is one of the few "home names" of philatelists. Some specialize exclusively in collecting his work. His thousandth stamp in order was the magnificent piece "Great deeds of Swedish kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl from 2000, which also got into the Guinness Book of World Records. He also engraved many countries banknotes. Among his last works are portraits of prime ministers on the front of new Canadian 5 and 100-dollar banknotes.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 1280 km transaljašského potrubného systému zatvorili po úniku stotisícov litrov nespracovanej ropy južne od Fairbanks na Aljaške. Výpadok prúdu po pravidelnej skúške požiarneho bezpečnostného systému zapríčinil otvorenie poistných klapiek a rozliatie surovej ropy neďaleko čerpacej stanice Fort Greely 9. Otvorením ventilov sa uvoľnil tlak v systéme a olej vytekal na podklad nádrže, ktorá pojme 55 000 barelov (8,7 miliónov litrov). V stredu popoludní otvory nádrže ešte stále prepúšťali, pravdepodobne následkom tepelnej rozťažnosti vo vnútri nádrže. Ďalšia sekundárna zadržiavacia oblasť pod nádržami, ktorá je schopná obsiahnuť 104 500 barelov, zatiaľ nebola využitá do svojej maximálnej kapacity.
mt: 1280 km long pipeline was closed after a spill of hundreds of thousands of barrels of unprocessed crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A pressure relief valve was opened during a routine fire safety system test, causing the opening of relief valves and the release of crude oil near the Fort Greely pumping station 9. Opening the valves relieved the pressure in the system and the oil leaked onto the bottom of the tank, which can hold 55,000 barrels (8.7 million liters). The tank openings were still releasing on Wednesday afternoon, likely due to thermal expansion within the tank. A secondary containment area under the tanks, which can hold 104,500 barrels, has not yet been used to its full capacity.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Podľa odhadov Armádneho zboru inžinierov Spojených štátov by 15 centimetrov zrážok mohlo prelomiť už predtým poškodené hrádze. Región Ninth Ward, ktorý bol počas hurikánu Katrina zaplavený až do výšky 6 metrov, je v súčasnosti vo vode až po pás, keďže bola neďaleká hrádza prekonaná. Voda sa po hrádzi rozlieva cez úsek, ktorý má šírku 30 metrov.
mt: 15 centimeters of rain could have breached the already damaged levees, according to estimates by the United States Army Corps of Engineers. The Ninth Ward, which was flooded up to 6 meters during Hurricane Katrina, is now flooded up to the waist, as a nearby levee was breached. The water is flowing through a 30-meter wide gap in the levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton potvrdil, že Howardská univerzitná nemocnica prijala pacienta a je v stabilizovanom stave. Pacient bol v Nigérii, kde sa vyskytlo niekoľko prípadov Eboly. Nemocnica sa riadila protokolom o kontrole infekcie obsahujúcom aj oddelenie pacienta od ostatných, aby sa zabránilo možnému šíreniu infekcie.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that Howard University Hospital accepted a patient and he is in stable condition. The patient was in Nigeria, where there have been several cases of Ebola. The hospital followed an infection control protocol that included isolating the patient from others to prevent possible spread of infection.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Kométy mohli byť pravdepodobne zdrojom dodania vody na zem, zároveň s organickými látkami, ktoré vedia vytvárať bielkoviny a podporovať život. Vedci dúfajú, že porozumejú tomu, ako vznikajú planéty, zvlášť tomu, ako sa formovala Zem, pretože kométy sa so Zemou dostali do kolízie už dávno.
mt: Comets may have been the source of water and organic materials that could have formed proteins and supported life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, because comets collided with the Earth long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Zatiaľ čo si úrady nie sú isté dôveryhodnosťou hrozby, Marylandský dopravný úrad došiel na naliehanie FBI k záveru. Sklápacie autá boli použité pri blokovaní vchodov do tunela. Pomoc poskytlo aj 80 policajtov, ktorí motoristov nasmerovávali na obchádzky. Na obchvate, alternatívnej trase mestom, neboli hlásené žiadne veľké dopravné obmedzenia.
mt: While officials are not sure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Department of Transportation has come to the conclusion that the threat is credible.  Rolling roadblocks were used to block entrances to the tunnel.  80 police officers were also used to direct motorists to detours.  There were no major traffic delays reported on the detour, an alternate route through the city.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Fotograf bol prevezený do medicínskeho strediska Ronalda Reagana UCLA, kde neskôr zomrel. Údajne mal 20 rokov. Vo svojom vyhlásení Bieber uviedol: „Aj napriek tomu, že som nebol prítomný ani sa priamo nezúčastnil na tejto tragickej nehode, moje myšlienky a modlitby smerujú k rodine obete.“ Zábavný spravodajský web TMZ vyjadril pochopenie, že fotograf zastavil svoje vozidlo na druhej strane bulváru Sepulveda a pokúsil sa odfotiť policajný zásah. Potom prešiel cez cestu a pokračoval, pobádajúc policajta Kalifornskej diaľničnej hliadky, ktorý riadil policajný zásah, aby mu umožnil vrátiť sa, a to dvakrát. Podľa polície je nepravdepodobné, že vodič vozidla, ktoré zrazilo fotografa, bude čeliť trestnému stíhaniu.
mt: The photographer was taken to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was reportedly 20 years old. In a statement, Bieber said, "Although I was not present nor did I attend any of the reckless and destructive behavior involved, I am aware of the events and outraged by the results. I just spoke with the photographer's family and expressed my condolences and grief for this terrible news. I am also very sorry for any pain I may have caused." Entertainment news website TMZ expressed sympathy for the photographer, who stopped his car on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and tried to take pictures of the police response. He then crossed the street and continued, prompting a California Highway Patrol officer, who was directing the police response, to allow him to return, twice. It is unlikely that the driver of the vehicle that struck the photographer will face criminal charges.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: Ministerský predseda Rodrigo Arias uviedol, že Arias mal pozitívny test na miernu verziu vírusu. Stav prezidenta je stabilizovaný, no aj napriek tomu zostane niekoľko dní v domácej izolácii. Okrem horúčky a bolesti v krku sa cítim dobre a v dobrej kondícii na výkon svojej práce prostredníctvom homeoffice-u. „Očakávam, že sa v pondelok vrátim k všetkým svojim povinnostiam“, uviedol Arias vo vyhlásení.
mt: Minister Rodrigo Arias announced that Arias had tested positive for a mild strain of the virus. The president's condition is stable, but despite this, he will remain in home isolation for several days. In addition to fever and sore throat, I feel well and in good condition to perform my duties through home office. "I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: V čase svojho vrcholu dosiahol tropický cyklón Gonu, pomenovaný podľa vreca z palmových listov v jazyku Maldív, ustálený vietor s rýchlosťou 240 kilometrov za hodinu (149 míľ za hodinu) . Na začiatku dnešného dňa bola rýchlosť vetra okolo 83 km/h a očakávalo sa, že bude slabnúť.
mt: At its peak, the tropical cyclone Gonu, named after the frond of a palm tree in the Maldivian language, reached a sustained wind speed of 240 kilometres per hour (149 mph).  As of the beginning of today, the wind speed was around 83 km/h and was expected to decrease.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Červený príliv je spôsobený zvýšenou koncentráciou Karenia brevis, prirodzene sa vyskytujúceho jednobunkového morského organizmu. Prírodné faktory sa môžu dopĺňať, aby vytvorili ideálne podmienky, čo umožňuje dramatický nárast počtu týchto rias. Riasy produkujú neurotoxín, ktorý môže poškodiť nervy u ľudí aj u rýb. Ryby často hynú v dôsledku vysokej koncentrácie toxických látok vo vodách. Na človeka môže pôsobiť dýchanie zasiahnutej vody, ktorú do vzduchu prináša vietor a vlny.
mt: The red tide is caused by an increased concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can be added to create ideal conditions, which allows for dramatic increases in the number of these algae. Algae produce neurotoxins that can damage nerves in humans and fish. Fish often die due to high concentrations of toxic substances in the water. Humans can be affected by breathing in contaminated water, which is carried by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felícia, kedysi búrka 4. kategórie na stupnici hurikánu Saffir-Simpson, zoslabla na tropickú tlakovú níž a v utorok sa rozplynula. Jeho zvyšky spôsobili prehánky na väčšine ostrovov, ale aspoň doteraz neboli hlásené žiadne škody alebo povodne. Zrážky s úhrnom 16,1 cm, ktorý bol dosiahnutý na Oahu, boli popísané ako „užitočné“. Niektoré dažďové zrážky sprevádzali búrky a časté blesky.
mt: Felicia, once a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane scale, weakened to a tropical depression on Monday and dissipated. Its remnants caused flooding on most of the islands, but at least no damage or flooding has been reported. Rainfall totals of 16.1 cm, which was recorded on Oahu, were described as "beneficial". Some rain showers were accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. havaroval na Grand Prix Singapuru v roku 2008, tesne po predčasnej zastávke Fernanda Alonsa v boxoch, a na pomoc mu išlo aj bezpečnostné vozidlo. Keď autá pred Alonsom išli pre palivo v sprievode Safety car, presunul sa na horné priečky, aby získal víťazstvo. Piquet Jr. bol prepustený po Veľkej cene Maďarskav roku 2009.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix crash: Piquet Jr. crashed into the back of Fernando Alonso's car, which had stopped on the track, and a safety car was sent to help. When the cars ahead of Alonso went to refuel, he moved up to the front to win. Piquet Jr. was released after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Vo štvrtok bola v časopise Science zverejnená štúdia, ktorá informovala o vzniku nového druhu vtákov na Galapágskych ostrovoch v Ekvádore. Vedci z Princetonskej univerzity v Spojených štátoch a Uppsalskej univerzity vo Švédsku informovali, že nový živočíšny druh sa dokázal vyvinúť už v priebehu dvoch generácií, aj keď sa verilo, že tento proces bude trvať oveľa dlhšiu dobu. Podarilo sa to vďaka zkríženiu endemickej Darwinovej pinky Geospiza fortes a prisťahovaleckej kaktusovej pinky Geospiza conirostris.
mt: On Thursday, a study was published in the journal Science, which reported the creation of a new bird species on the Galapagos Islands in Ecuador. Scientists from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that a new animal species was able to evolve in just two generations, although it was believed that this process would take much longer. This was achieved by crossbreeding the endemic Darwin's finch Geospiza fortes and the immigrant cactus finch Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Vo štvrtok bola v časopise Science zverejnená štúdia, ktorá informovala o vzniku nového druhu vtákov na Galapágskych ostrovoch v Ekvádore. Vedci z Princetonskej univerzity v Spojených štátoch a Uppsalskej univerzity vo Švédsku informovali, že nový živočíšny druh sa dokázal vyvinúť už v priebehu dvoch generácií, aj keď sa verilo, že tento proces bude trvať oveľa dlhšiu dobu. Podarilo sa to vďaka zkríženiu endemickej Darwinovej pinky Geospiza fortes a prisťahovaleckej kaktusovej pinky Geospiza conirostris.
mt: On Thursday, a study was published in the journal Science, which reported the creation of a new bird species on the Galapagos Islands in Ecuador. Scientists from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that a new animal species was able to evolve in just two generations, although it was believed that this process would take much longer. This was achieved by crossbreeding the endemic Darwin's finch Geospiza fortes and the immigrant cactus finch Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Toto umelecké podujatie je súčasťou kampane bukureštskej radnice, ktorej cieľom je oživiť obraz rumunského hlavného mesta ako kreatívnej metropoly plnej farieb. Stane sa prvým mestom v juhovýchodnej Európe, ktoré bude hostiteľom najväčšej verejnej umeleckej akcie CowParade, a to od júna do augusta tohto roku.
mt: This artistic event is part of a campaign by the Bucharest city council, whose aim is to revitalize the image of the Romanian capital as a creative metropolis full of colors. It will be the first city in Southeast Europe to host the largest public art event CowParade, from June to August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Lietadlo smerovalo do Irkutsku a prevádzkovali ho vnútorné oddiely. Za účelom prešetrenia bolo začaté vyšetrovanie. Od 70. rokov patril Il-76 k pilierom ruskej aj sovietskej armády a už minulý mesiac mal v Rusku vážnu nehodu. 7. októbra sa pri štarte oddelil motor, nedošlo k zraneniam. Rusko po tejto nehode na krátke obdobie uzemnilo lietadlá typu Il-76.
mt: The plane was heading to Irkutsk and was operated by the Russian Ministry of Defense. An investigation was launched to determine the cause of the crash. Since the 1970s, the Il-76 has been a mainstay of the Russian and Soviet air forces, and just last month, an Il-76 had a serious accident in Russia. On October 7, a motor fell off during takeoff, causing no injuries. Russia temporarily grounded Il-76s after this accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Pred Simpsonovcami spolupracoval Simon na niekoľkých show a v rôznych pozíciách. V 1980-tych rokoch pracoval na show ako sú Taxi, Cheers a The Tracy Ullman Show. V roku 1989 pomohol vytvoriť seriál Simpsonovci spolu s Brooksom a Groeningom a bol zodpovedný za nábor prvého autorského tímu tohto seriálu. Hoci v roku 1993 zo šou odišiel, titul výkonného producenta si ponechal a aj naďalej dostával každú sezónu honoráre v hodnote desiatok miliónov dolárov.
mt: Simpson worked with the show's producers on several shows and in various capacities. In the 1980s, he worked on Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing staff. Although he left the show in 1993, he retained the title of executive producer and continued to receive royalties of tens of millions of dollars per season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke napísal, že snahy niektorých prehlušiť ženy, keď hovorili o ženskom zdraví, boli neúspešné. K tomuto záveru dospela vďaka množstvu pozitívnych komentárov a povzbudení, ktoré jej poslali tak ženy, ako aj muži, ktorí trvali na tom, aby sa antikoncepcia považovala za lekársku nevyhnutnosť.
mt: Fluke wrote that attempts by some to ignore women when they spoke about women's health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion thanks to the large number of positive comments and encouragement she received from both women and men who insisted that contraception be considered a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: Bude sa správať ako voda. Je to transparentné práve tak ako voda. Takže ak by ste stáli na pobreží, dovideli by ste dole na akékoľvek okruhliaky alebo svinstvá, ktoré sú na dne. „Pokiaľ vieme, je len jedno planetárne teleso, ktoré preukazuje viac dynamickosti ako Titan, a jeho meno je Zem“, doplnil Stofan.
mt: It will be handled like water. It's transparent just like water. So if you were standing on the shore, you would see down to any craters or junk that are on the bottom. "As far as we know, there's only one planetary body that shows more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Nielenže to potvrdzuje už veľmi rozšírenú teóriu, že aspoň niektoré dinosaury boli operené, ale poskytuje aj podrobnosti o tom, ktoré fosílie všeobecne nemohli byť, medzi nimi farba a trojrozmerné usporiadanie. . Vedci tvrdia, že operenie tohto zvieraťa bolo zvrchu gaštanovohnedé, naspodu bledej alebo karotenoidovej farby. Nález takisto poskytuje detailný pohľad na vývoj peria vtákov. Keďže perie dinosaura nemá dobre vyvinutú kostrnku nazývanú rachis, ale má iné znaky peria – ostne a lúče – vedci usúdili, že rachis sa pravdepodobne vyvinula evolučne neskôr než tieto ďalšie znaky. Štruktúra peria naznačuje, že neboli používané za letu, ale skôr na reguláciu teploty alebo na dvorenie. Podľa tvrdenia vedcov, aj keď tu ide o chvost mladého dinosaura, na vzorke je zobrazené perie dospelého jedinca a nie páperie mláďaťa. Aj keď ide o chvost mladého dinosaura, na vzorke je podľa vedcov perie dospelého jedinca a nie páperie mláďaťa.
mt: Not only does it confirm the very widely accepted theory that at least some dinosaurs were feathered, but it also provides details about what fossils generally could not, including color and three-dimensional arrangement.. Scientists say the dinosaur's feathers were reddish-brown on top, yellowish or carotenoid-colored on the bottom. The find also provides a detailed look at the evolution of bird feathers. Because the dinosaur's tail feathers lack a well-developed structure called a rachis, but have other feather characteristics – barbs and barbules – scientists concluded that the rachis probably evolved later than these other features. The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or display. According to the researchers, although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the feathers on the specimen are those of an adult, not juvenile down.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Aj keď sa zdá, že jedna experimentálna vakcína dokáže znížiť úmrtnosť na ebolu, doteraz sa jednoznačne nepreukázalo, že by nejaké lieky boli vhodné na liečbu už existujúcej infekcie. Protilátkový koktail ZMapp spočiatku vyzeral v tejto oblasti sľubne, ale oficiálne štúdie uvádzajú, že pri prevencii smrti mal menší úžitok, ako sa dúfalo. V triale PALM, ZMapp slúžila ako kontrola, čo znamená, že ju vedci použili ako základ, s ktorým porovnali ostatné tri liečby.
mt: Although one experimental vaccine appears to reduce mortality from Ebola, it has not yet been definitively proven that any drugs are effective in treating an existing infection. The ZMapp antibody cocktail initially looked promising in this area, but official studies indicate that it had a smaller benefit in preventing death than was hoped. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning that it was used as a baseline with which other three treatments were compared.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: V pondelok vedci z lekárskej fakulty Stanfordskej univerzity informovali o objavení nového diagnostického prístroja, ktorý je schopný triediť bunky podľa druhu: malý čip, ktorý sa dá vytlačiť a je možné vyrobiť ho použitím štandardných atramentových tlačiarní, z ktorých každý môže mať hodnotu zhruba jeden cent. Poprední vedci tvrdia, že to môže uľahčiť včasné odhalenie rakoviny, tuberkulózy, HIV a malárie u pacientov v krajinách s nízkym príjmom, kde je miera prežitia pri chorobách, ako je napríklad rakovina prsníka, v porovnaní s bohatšími krajinami takmer polovičná.
mt: On Monday, scientists from the medical school of Stanford University announced the discovery of a new diagnostic device that can classify cells according to type: a small chip that can be printed and can be made using standard inkjet printers, each of which can be worth about one cent. Leading scientists say it can make early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria easier for patients in low-income countries, where the survival rate for diseases such as breast cancer is almost half that of richer countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Vedci objavili útvary vyvrhnuté na povrchu mesiaca nazývané laločnaté jazvy, pričom je zjavné, že tieto boli výsledkom veľmi pomalého zmršťovania mesiaca. Tieto zrázy sa našli po celom mesiaci a zdá sa, že sú iba minimálne zvetrané, čo naznačuje, že geologické udalosti pri ktorých vznikli, sa udiali pomerne nedávno. Táto teória je v rozpore s tvrdením, že Mesiac je úplne bez geologickej činnosti.
mt: Scientists have found features extruded on the surface of the moon called wrinkle ridges, which are clearly the result of very slow contraction of the moon. These ridges were found all over the moon and appear to be only minimally deformed, indicating that the geological events that created them were relatively recent. This theory is in conflict with the claim that the moon is completely without geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Potom Adekoyu šerifský súd v Edinburgu obvinil z vraždy svojho syna. Je vo väzbe a čaká na obžalobu a súdny proces, avšak akékoľvek dôkazy očitých svedkov môžu byť zmarené, pretože jej podoba bola uverejnená vo veľkom meradle. Toto je bežnou praxou inde vo Veľkej Británii, ale škótske súdnictvo funguje inak a súdy považujú zverejňovanie fotografií za potenciálne zaujaté. Profesorka Pamela Ferguson z Univerzity v Dundee tvrdí, že „novinári sa vydávajú nebezpečným smerom, ak uverejňujú fotografie podozrivých osôb.“ Korunný úrad, ktorý je vo všeobecnosti zodpovedný za trestné stíhanie, naznačil novinárom, že minimálne do vznesenia obvinenia sa k prípadu nebude ďalej vyjadrovať.
mt: Sheriff's court in Edinburgh charged Adekoye with murder of her son. She is in custody awaiting indictment and trial, however any evidence of eyewitnesses may be compromised, as her likeness was widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the United Kingdom, but Scottish courts operate differently and consider the publication of photographs as potentially biased. Crown Office, which is generally responsible for criminal prosecution, indicated to journalists that at least until the indictment is filed, it will not comment further on the case.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Okrem nehostinného ľadu brzdia úsielie záchranárov aj extrémne poveternostné podmienky. Pittman predpokladal, že sa podmienky zlepšia až niekedy počas budúceho týždňa. Množstvo a hrúbka ľadovej vrstvy sú podľa Pittmana najhoršie, aké zvárači za posledných 15 rokov zažili.
mt: In addition to the inhospitable ice, the rescue efforts are hampered by extreme weather conditions. Pittman predicted that the weather would improve sometime during the next week. The amount and thickness of the ice are the worst that the salvagers have seen in the last 15 years, according to Pittman.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts rázne odmietol povedať, kedy podľa neho začína život, čo je dôležitou otázkou pri zvažovaní etiky potratov, a uviedol, že by bolo neetické komentovať konkrétnosti možných prípadov. Zopakoval však svoje predchádzajúce vyhlásenie, že Roe proti Wadeovi bol „ustáleným zákonom krajiny“ a zdôraznil dôležitosť konzistencie rozhodnutí Najvyššieho súdu. Zároveň potvrdil, že verí v implikované právo na súkromie, z ktorého Roeho rozhodnutie vychádzalo.
mt: Roberts quickly rejected saying when life begins, an important question in considering the ethics of abortion, and introduced that it would be unwise to comment on specifics of possible cases. He however reiterated his previous statement that Roe v. Wade was "settled law of the country" and emphasized the importance of consistency in Supreme Court decisions. He also confirmed that he believes in the implied right to privacy, from which Roe's decision was derived.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Presne o 8:46 ráno padlo na mesto ticho, ktoré označovalo presne ten okamih, kedy prvé lietadlo zasiahlo svoj cieľ. Dva svetelné lúče boli nainštalované tak, aby počas noci mierili na oblohu. Na mieste prebieha výstavba piatich nových mrakodrapov s dopravným centrom a pamätným parkom v strede.
mt: 8:46 am was the exact moment of silence that marked the first plane hitting its target. Two light beams were installed to point at the sky during the night. The site is under construction of five new skyscrapers with a transportation center and a memorial park in the center.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: Všetky vchody do jaskyne s názvom Sedem sestier, majú priemer najmenej 100 až 250 metrov (328 až 820 stôp). Infračervené snímky zachytili teplotné zmeny v noci a cez deň a teda dokazujú, že ide pravdepodobne o jaskyne. Cez deň sú chladnejšie než okolitý povrch a cez noc teplejšie. „Ich tepelné správanie nie je také stabilné ako v prípade veľkých jaskýň na Zemi, ktoré často udržiavajú pomerne stálu teplotu, no je v súlade s faktom, že ide o hlboké diery v zemi,“ uviedol Glen Cushing z astrogeologického tímu Geologickej služby Spojených štátov (USGS), pôsobiaci aj na Univerzite v severnej Arizone vo Flagstaffe v Arizone.
mt: All entrances to the cave named Seven Sisters, have a diameter of at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet). Infrared images captured temperature changes during the day and night, and thus prove that it is probably a cave. During the day they are cooler than the surrounding surface and during the night warmer. "Their thermal behavior is not so stable as in the case of large caves on Earth, which often maintain a relatively stable temperature, but is in line with the fact that it is deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the astrogeological team of the Geological Survey of the United States (USGS), also at the University of Northern Arizona in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Muž údajne vrazil do davu trojkolesové vozidlo vybavené výbušninami. Muž podozrivý z výbuchu bomby bol zadržaný potom, ako utrpel zranenia v následku tohto výbuchu. Jeho meno nie je vyšetrovateľom stále známe, hoci vedia, že je členom ujgurskej etnickej skupiny.
mt: A man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle loaded with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of bombing was detained after suffering injuries in the aftermath of this explosion. His name is not yet known to investigators, although they know he is a member of the Uyghur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Juhoafrická republika porazila All Blacks z Nového Zélandu v zápase rugbyovej ligy Tri Nations. ktorá sa konala na štadióne Royal Bafokeng v juhoafrickom Rustenburgu. Konečné skóre 21 k 20 znamená jednobodové víťazstvo All Blacks, ktorým dovŕšili svoju sériu 15 víťazných zápasov. Pre tím Springboks to ukončilo päťzápasovú sériu prehier. Bol to záverečný zápas pre All Blacks, ktorí už dva týždňe dozadu získali trofej. Finálový zápas série medzi hráčmi Springboks a Austrálie sa bude konať budúci týždeň v Ellis Parku v Johannesburgu.
mt: South Africa defeated the All Blacks of New Zealand in a rugby union Tri Nations match that took place at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was 21 to 20, meaning a one-point victory for the All Blacks, who completed their streak of 15 consecutive victories. The Springboks ended their streak of five consecutive losses. It was the last match for the All Blacks, who won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series between the Springboks and Australia will take place next week in Ellis Park, Johannesburg.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Stanica si udržala svoju polohu až do konca výstupu do vesmíru, a to aj napriek strate gyroskopu skôr počas misie vesmírnej stanice. Chiao a Sharipov podali správu, že sa nachádzajú v bezpečnej vzdialenosti od pomocných trysiek na regulovanie polohy. Ruské pozemné riadenie aktivovalo prúdové motory a stanica sa vrátila do normálnej výšky.
mt: The station maintained its position until the end of the space station's ascent, despite the loss of its gyroscope earlier in the mission. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were in a safe distance from the auxiliary thrusters used to control the station's position. Russian ground control activated the station's plasma engines and the station returned to its normal altitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Prípad bol prejednávaný vo Virgínii, pretože je sídlom popredného poskytovateľa internetových služieb AOL, spoločnosti, ktorá navrhla obvinenia. Toto je prvýkrát, čo dospeli k rozsudku pomocou legislatívy prijatej v roku 2003, ktorá má obmedziť nevyžiadané rozosielanie hromadného e-mailu, tzv. spamu, do schránok používateľov.
mt: The case was heard in Virginia, home of leading Internet service provider AOL, a company that proposed the charges. This is the first time a verdict has been reached using legislation passed in 2003 that limits unsolicited bulk e-mail, known as spam, to user inboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 28-ročný Vidal prestúpil do Barça zo Sevilly pred tromi sezónami. Od svojho pôsobenia v katalánskom hlavnom meste odohral Vidal za klub 49 zápasov.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal moved to Barcelona from Sevilla three seasons ago. Since his arrival in the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 games for the club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Varovanie pred vlnou tsunami nebolo vydané a podľa geofyzikálnej agentúry v Jakarte vydané ani nebude, pretože zemetrasenie nepresiahlo hranicu magnitúdy v hodnote 6,5. Hoci neexistovala žiadna hrozba tsunami, obyvatelia začali panikáriť a opúšťať svoje zamestnania a domovy.
mt: A tsunami warning was not issued and according to the Jakarta-based geophysical agency, it will not be issued, as the earthquake did not exceed a magnitude of 6.5.  Although there was no tsunami threat, residents began panicking and leaving their jobs and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Zistili, že Slnko funguje na rovnakých základných princípoch ako iné hviezdy: Aktivita všetkých hviezd v systéme sa riadi ich svietivosťou, rotáciou a ničím iným. Svietivosť a rotácia spoločne pomáhajú stanoviť Rossbyho číslo hviezdy, ktoré súvisí s plazmatickým tokom. Čím je hodnota Rossbyho čísla menšia, tým je hviezda menej aktívna vo vzťahu k magnetickej rotácii.
mt: They found that the Sun works on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system is governed by their brightness, rotation, and nothing else. Brightness and rotation together help to determine the star's Rossby number, which is related to the plasma flow. The lower the Rossby number, the less active the star is in relation to magnetic rotation.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Z 1400 ľudí, ktorí sa zúčastnili prieskumu pred federálnymi voľbami v roku 2010, počet ľudí, ktorí sú proti tomu, aby sa Austrália stala republikou vzrásol od roku 2008 o 8 percent. Dočasná predsedníčka vlády Julia Gillardová v priebehu kampane pred federálnymi voľbami v roku 2010 komunikovala svoje presvedčenie, že Austrália by sa po konci vládnutia kráľovnej Alžbety II. mala stať republikou. 34 percent respondentov zdieľa názor, že by kráľovná Alžbeta II. mala byť poslednou austrálskou panovníčkou. V extrémoch prieskumu sa 29 percent opýtaných domnieva, že Austrália by sa mala stať republikou čo najskôr, zatiaľ čo 31 percent opýtaných si myslí, že Austrália by sa nikdy nemala stať republikou.
mt: 1400 people participated in a survey before the 2010 federal election, the number of people who are against Australia becoming a republic increased by 8 percent from 2008. During the campaign for the 2010 federal election, interim Prime Minister Julia Gillard communicated her belief that Australia should become a republic after the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. 34 percent of respondents share the opinion that Queen Elizabeth II should be the last Australian monarch. In the extreme of the survey, 29 percent of respondents believe that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent of respondents believe that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Z 1400 ľudí, ktorí sa zúčastnili prieskumu pred federálnymi voľbami v roku 2010, počet ľudí, ktorí sú proti tomu, aby sa Austrália stala republikou vzrásol od roku 2008 o 8 percent. Dočasná predsedníčka vlády Julia Gillardová v priebehu kampane pred federálnymi voľbami v roku 2010 komunikovala svoje presvedčenie, že Austrália by sa po konci vládnutia kráľovnej Alžbety II. mala stať republikou. 34 percent respondentov zdieľa názor, že by kráľovná Alžbeta II. mala byť poslednou austrálskou panovníčkou. V extrémoch prieskumu sa 29 percent opýtaných domnieva, že Austrália by sa mala stať republikou čo najskôr, zatiaľ čo 31 percent opýtaných si myslí, že Austrália by sa nikdy nemala stať republikou.
mt: 1400 people participated in a survey before the 2010 federal election, the number of people who are against Australia becoming a republic increased by 8 percent from 2008. During the campaign for the 2010 federal election, interim Prime Minister Julia Gillard communicated her belief that Australia should become a republic after the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. 34 percent of respondents share the opinion that Queen Elizabeth II should be the last Australian monarch. In the extreme of the survey, 29 percent of respondents believe that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent of respondents believe that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, hovorca nadácie Komen, uviedol, že prijali nové pravidlo, ktoré bráni udeľovaniu grantov alebo finančných prostriedkov organizáciám, ktoré sú predmetom súdneho vyšetrovania. Komenovej zásady diskvalifikovali organizáciu Planned Parenthood kvôli prebiehajúcemu vyšetrovaniu, ktoré vedie zástupca Cliff Stearns o tom ako Planned Parenthood utráca a nahlasuje svoje peňažné operácie. Stearns skúma, či sa dane používajú na financovanie potratov cez organizáciu plánovaného rodičovstva Planned Parenthood pričom je v úlohe predsedu Podvýboru pre dohľad a vyšetrovanie, ktorý zastrešuje Výbor pre energetiku a obchod.
mt: Leslie Aun, spokeswoman for the Susan G. Komen Foundation, said the organization has adopted a new rule that bars it from giving grants or financial support to organizations that are under criminal investigation. Komen's new policy disqualified Planned Parenthood because of an ongoing investigation by Rep. Cliff Stearns into how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its financial operations. Stearns is investigating whether the money is used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood, a role he has in his position as chairman of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations, which oversees the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: Polícii z Madhjapradéša sa podarilo získať ukradnutý notebook a mobilný telefón naspäť. D. K. Arya, zástupkyňa generálneho inšpektora, povedala: „Zatkli sme päť osôb, ktoré znásilnili švajčiarsku občianku a získali jej mobilný telefón a notebook.“ Obvinení sú menovaní ako Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar a Vishnu Kanjar. Policajný superintendant Chandra Shekhar Solanki uviedol, že obvinení sa pred súd dostavili so zakrytými tvárami.
mt: Police in Madhya Pradesh have recovered a stolen laptop and mobile phone. D. K. Arya, deputy inspector general, said: "We arrested five people who raped a Swiss national and took her mobile phone and laptop." The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with their faces covered.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: Počítač ASUS Eee, už predtým celosvetovo uvedený so zámerom úspory nákladov a kvôli faktorom funkčnosti, sa stal horúcou témou výstavy 2007 Taipei IT Month. Po tom, ako spoločnosť ASUS získala v roku 2007 cenu Taiwan Sustainable Award od Executive Yuan z Čínskej republiky, sa spotrebiteľský trh s prenosnými počítačmi radikálne rozšíril a zmenil.
mt: 2007 Taipei IT Month, the ASUS Eee PC, which was previously introduced worldwide with the intention of saving costs and for factors of functionality, has become a hot topic of the exhibition. After ASUS received the Taiwan Sustainable Award from the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China in 2007, the consumer market for portable computers has been radically expanded and changed.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Problémy nastali 1. januára, keď sa desiatky miestnych obyvateľov začali sťažovať na pošte v Obanazawa, že nedostali svoje tradičné novoročné blahoželania. Pošta sa včera ospravedlnila občanom a médiám po tom, ako zistila, že chlapec skryl viac ako 600 poštových dokumentov vrátane 429 novoročných pohľadníc, ktoré neboli doručené ich určeným príjemcom.
mt: Problems began on January 1, when dozens of local residents complained to the post office in Obanazawa that they had not received their traditional New Year's greetings. The post office apologized to citizens and the media yesterday after finding out that a boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents including 429 New Year's postcards that had not been delivered to their intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray prehral prvý set v tiebrejku po tom, čo obaja hráči zvládli každé podanie v sete. V druhom sete mal Del Potro predčasnú výhodu, no aj toto si za stavu 6-6 vyžiadalo tajbrejk. V tejto situácii Potro podstúpil ošetrenie ramena, ale do zápasu sa mu podarilo vrátiť.
mt: Murray lost the first set in a tiebreaker after both players held serve in the set. In the second set, Del Potro had a break point early, but that was also taken to a tiebreaker. In that situation, Del Potro received treatment for his right shoulder, but was able to return to the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: V sprievode týchto úradníkov ubezpečil občanov Texasu, že boli podniknuté kroky na ochranu verejnej bezpečnosti. Perry osobitne zdôraznil: „Na svete je len málo miest, ktoré sú lepšie pripravené na to, aby zvládli výzvu, ktorej v tomto prípade čelíme.“ Guvernér sa tiež vyjadril: „Dnes sme sa dozvedeli, že sa zistilo, že niektoré deti školského veku boli v kontakte s pacientom.“ Ďalej povedal: „Tento prípad je vážny. Môžete si byť istí, že náš systém funguje tak, ako má.“
mt: In the company of these officials, Texans were assured that steps had been taken to protect public safety. Perry specifically emphasized, "There are few places in the world better prepared to meet the challenge we face today." The governor also stated, "Today we learned that some school-aged children were in contact with the patient." He further said, "This is serious. You can be assured that our system is working as it should."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""
