src: Najčastejšou príčinou nehôd v zime sú klzké cesty, dlažby (chodníky) a najmä schody. Minimálne potrebujete obuv s vhodnou podrážkou. Letné topánky sú zvyčajne na ľade a snehu veľmi klzké, dokonca aj niektoré zimné topánky majú tento nedostatok. Šablóna by mala byť dostatočne hlboká, 5 mm prípadne viac, a hmota by mala byť pri nízkych teplotách dostatočne mäkká. Niektoré trekové majú cvočky, a taktiež je k dispozícii vybíjané doplnkové vybavenie do klzkých podmienok. To pasuje na väčšinu topánok a trekových topánok a je možné ho upevniť len na podpätky alebo na podpätky aj podrážku. Podpätky by mali byť nízke a široké. Piesok, štrk alebo soľ (chlorid vápenatý) sa často sypú po cestách alebo chodníkoch, aby sa zlepšila trakcia.
mt: The most common cause of winter accidents are slippery roads, sidewalks (walkways) and especially stairs. You need at least footwear with suitable soles. Summer sandals are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter sandals have this flaw. The sole should be deep enough, 5 mm or more, and the material should be soft enough at low temperatures. Some trekking sandals have studs, and there is also a separate equipment for slippery conditions. This fits most shoes and trekking shoes and can be attached only to the insoles or to the insoles and sole. Insoles should be low and wide. Sand, mud or salt (calcium chloride) is often sprinkled on roads or sidewalks to improve traction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Cookove ostrovy sú ostrovným štátom, ktorý je vo voľnom zväzku s Novým Zélandom a nachádza sa v Polynézii uprostred južného Tichého oceánu. Je to súostrovie s 15 ostrovmi rozprestierajúcimi sa na 2,2 miliónoch kilometroch štvorcových oceánu. Keďže sa ostrovy nachádzajú v rovnakom časovom pásme ako Havaj, niekedy sa označujú ako „Havaj tam dole“. Aj keď sú menšie, niektorým starším návštevníkom pripomínajú Havaj. aký bol pred štátnosťou, bez všetkých tých veľkých turistických hotelov a ďalšieho rozvoja. Cookove ostrovy nemajú žiadne mestá, ale sú zložené z 15 rôznych ostrovov. Hlavné sú Rarotonga a Aitutaki.
mt: Cook Islands are an island country in the South Pacific, in free association with New Zealand. It is a member of the Commonwealth of Nations. The Cook Islands' fifteen islands have a total land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). The nation has been autonomous for some decades, and in 1990 entered into a constitutional relationship with New Zealand as the Cook Islands National Party. Although not part of the state, the Cook Islands maintains close economic and political ties with New Zealand.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Povolenia musia byť rezervované vopred. Musíte mať povolenie na to, aby ste mohli stráviť noc v Sirene. Sirena je jediná rangerská stanica, v ktorej okrem kempovania nájdete aj nocľaháreň a ponuku teplých jedál. La Leona, San Pedrillo a Los Patos ponúkajú iba kemping bez možnosti stravovania. Zabezpečenie parkovacích povolení je možné priamo z rangerskej stanice v Puerto Jiménez, platba kreditnou kartou však nie je možná. Parkovacia služba (MINAE) nevystavuje parkovacie preukazy skôr ako mesiac pred očakávaným príjazdom. CafeNet El Sol ponúka rezervačnú službu za poplatok 30 USD alebo jednodňové vstupenky za 10 USD; podrobnosti sú na ich stránke Corcovado.
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to spend the night in Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station where, in addition to camping, you will find a bunkhouse and a hot meal menu. La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos offer only camping without the option of dining. Park permit reservations can be made directly from the ranger station in Puerto Jiménez, but credit card payment is not possible. The park service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than a month before the expected arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of 30 USD or daily tickets for 10 USD; details are on their site Corcovado.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

The park service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than a month before the expected arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of 30 USD or daily tickets for 10 USD; details are on their site Corcovado.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: S batohom na lyžiach: Táto aktivita sa nazýva aj bežkovanie s batohom, skialpinizmus alebo lyžiarska turistika. Súvisí (no zvyčajne ich nezahŕňa) s alpskými lyžiarskými túrami a horolezectvom, ktoré je praktizované v strmom teréne a vyžaduje oveľa tvrdšie lyže a obutie. Lyžiarsku trasu považujte za podobnú turistickú trasu. Za dobrých podmienok budete schopní prekonať o niečo väčšie vzdialenosti, než keby ste kráčali – ale len veľmi zriedka dosiahnete rýchlosť ako pri bežkovaní bez ťažkého batohu na upravených tratiach.
mt: With a backpack: This activity is also known as backpacking, skialpinism or ski touring. It is related (but usually not included) to alpine ski touring and mountaineering, which is practiced in steep terrain and requires much stiffer skis and boots. A ski route should be considered similar to a hiking route. For good conditions you will be able to cover slightly greater distances than if you were walking – but only very rarely will you achieve the speed of running without a heavy backpack.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Návratový šok nastupuje rýchlejšie ako ten kultúrny (fáza počiatočnej idylky je kratšia), trvá dlhšiu dobu a môže byť závažnejší. Pre cestovateľov, ktorí si dokázali ľahko zvyknúť na novú kultúru, je niekedy obzvlášť náročné sa opätovne prispôsobiť svojej pôvodnej kultúre. Po návrate domov po pobyte v zahraničí ste sa prispôsobili novej kultúre a stratili ste niektoré zo svojich zvykov z domácej kultúry. Keď ste išli do zahraničia po prvý raz, ľudia boli pravdepodobne trpezliví a chápaví, pretože vedeli, že cestujúci sa v novej krajine potrebujú prispôsobiť. Ľudia nemusia predvídať, že cestujúci, ktorí sa vracajú domov potrebujú trpezlivosť a porozumenie.
mt: The return shock occurs faster than the cultural shock (the initial idyllic phase is shorter), lasts longer and can be more severe. For travelers who have easily adapted to the new culture, it is sometimes particularly difficult to re-adapt to their original culture. Upon returning home after a stay abroad, you have adapted to the new culture and lost some of your customs from your home culture. When you went abroad for the first time, people were probably patient and understanding, because they knew that travelers needed to adapt in the new country. People do not predict that travelers who are returning home need patience and understanding.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Losy (známe tiež ako jelene) nie sú vo svojej podstate agresívne, ale budú sa brániť, ak pocítia hrozbu. Pokiaľ ľudia nevidia v losovi potenciálne nebezpečenstvo, mohli by sa priblížiť príliš blízko a vystaviť sa riziku.
mt: Deer (also known as elk) are not inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they feel threatened. If people do not see the potential danger in a deer, they could get too close and expose themselves to risk.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: V horúčavách môžu cestujúci zažiť fatamorgány, ktoré vytvárajú ilúziu vody (alebo iných vecí). Môžu byť nebezpečné pre cestovateľov, ktorí sa za fatamorgánou vydajú a strácajú tak drahocennú energiu a tekutiny. Aj tie najhorúcejšie púšte môžu byť v noci extrémne chladné. Bez teplého oblečenia skutočne hrozí riziko podchladenia.
mt: In the heat, travelers may experience mirages, which create the illusion of water (or other things). They can be dangerous to travelers who venture out for a mirage and lose precious energy and fluids. Even the hottest deserts can be extremely cold at night. Without warm clothing, hypothermia is a real risk.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Dominikánska republika (španielsky: República Dominicana) je karibská krajina, ktorá zaberá východnú polovicu ostrova Hispaniola, ktorý zdieľa spolu s Haiti V tomto štáte okrem pláží s bielym pieskom a horskej krajiny nájdete aj najstaršie americké mesto európskeho pôvodu, pričom dnes je súčasťou Santo Domingo. Ostrov ako prví osídlili Taínoovia a Karibania. Karibania hovorili arawakánsky a prišli na územie okolo roku 10 000 pred n.l. Do niekoľkých rokov po príchode európskych bádateľov bol počet obyvateľov Tainosu výrazne zredukovaný pôsobením španielskych dobyvateľov Podľa Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) v rokoch 1492 až 1498 španielski dobyvatelia zabili okolo 100 000 Taínosov.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. In this state, in addition to beaches with white sand and mountainous terrain, you will find the oldest American city of European origin, which is now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first settled by the Taíno and Carib people. Caribians spoke Arawakan and came to the area around the year 10,000 BC. In a few years after the arrival of European explorers, the number of Taínos was significantly reduced by the Spanish conquerors. According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) in the years 1492 to 1498, the Spanish conquerors killed about 100,000 Taínos.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Populárne zjazdové zimné športy ako lyžovanie a snowboarding spočívajú v zosúvaní sa po zasneženom teréne s lyžami alebo snowboardom pripevneným k nohám. Lyžovanie je hlavná cestovateľská aktivita, ktorá má mnoho nadšencov, príležitostne známych aj ako „lyžiarski fanatici“, ktorí plánujú celú dovolenku okolo lyžovania na danom mieste. Myšlienka lyžovania je veľmi stará — jaskynné maľby zobrazujúce lyžiarov sa datujú až do roku 5000 pred n. l.! Zjazdové lyžovanie ako šport siaha prinajmenšom do 17. storočia a v roku 1861 otvorili Nóri prvý rekreačný lyžiarsky klub v Austrálii.
mt: Popular downhill winter sports such as skiing and snowboarding involve sliding down a snow-covered slope on skis or a snowboard attached to the feet. Skiing is the main recreational activity that has many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski fanatics", who plan their entire vacation around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back to 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport dates back at least to the 17th century and in 1861 the Norwegians opened the first recreational ski club in Australia.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Východoafrické ostrovy sa nachádzajú v Indickom oceáne pri východnom pobreží Afriky. Madagaskar je zďaleka tým najväčším a je sám o sebe kontinentom, keď ide o divokú prírodu. Väčsina menších ostrovov sú nezávislé štáty alebo majú väzby s Francúzskom a sú známe ako luxusné plážové letoviská. Arabi priniesli do krajín aj islam a na Komorách a ostrove Mayotte ho prijali vo veľkom štýle. Obdobie európskeho vplyvu a kolonializmu sa začalo v 15. storočí, keď portugalský prieskumník Vasco da Gama objavil cestu okolo Mysu dobrej nádeje z Európy do Indie.
mt: The East African islands are located in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is far the largest and is itself a continent when it comes to wild nature. Most of the smaller islands are independent states or have ties with France and are known as luxury beach resorts. Arabs brought Islam to the countries and on the Comoros and Mayotte islands it was adopted in a big way. The era of European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama discovered the route around the Cape of Good Hope from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Podľa tradície prebdiete Veľkú noc pod holým nebom, aby ste mohli pozorovať východ slnka. Existujú samozrejme kresťanské teologické vysvetlenia tejto tradície, ale pokojne to môže byť predkresťanský rituál jari a plodnosti. Tradičnejšie kostoly často konajú veľkonočnú omšu v sobotu večer počas veľkonočného víkendu, pričom zhromaždenia sa často slávia úderom polnoci, aby oslávili Kristovo vzkriesenie.
mt: According to tradition, you should spend Easter Sunday under the open sky, to be able to observe the sunrise.  There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it can be a pre-Christian ritual of spring and fertility.  More traditional churches often hold Easter mass on Saturday evening during the Easter weekend, and gatherings are often celebrated with a midnight blow, to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ekvádor vyžaduje, aby kubánski občania pred vstupom do krajiny cez medzinárodné letiská a hraničné priechody obdržali pozývací list. Tento list musí byť legalizovaný ekvádorským ministerstvom zahraničných vecí a musí spĺňať určité požiadavky. Tieto požiadavky sú navrhnuté tak, aby poskytovali organizovaný migračný tok medzi oboma krajinami. Kubánski občania, ktorí sú držiteľmi zelenej karty v USA, by mali navštíviť ekvádorský konzulát, aby získali výnimku z tejto požiadavky. Váš pas musí byť platný minimálne 6 mesiacov po termíne, kedy cestujete. Na preukázanie dĺžky pobytu je potrebný spiatočný/nasledujúci cestovný lístok.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens entering the country through international airports and border crossings to receive an invitation letter. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and must meet certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide organized migration between the two countries. Cuban citizens who are holders of a green card in the US should visit the Ecuadorian consulate to obtain an exemption from this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after the date you travel. A return/next ticket is required to prove the length of stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: V zahraničí môžu byť okuliare lacnejšie, najmä v krajinách s nízkym príjmom, kde sú nižšie náklady na pracovnú silu. Zvážte, či by ste si nemali dať urobiť kontrolu zraku doma, hlavne vtedy, ak vám ju kryje poistenie, a priniesť si so sebou lekársky predpis, ktorý má byť podaný inde. Špičkové značkové rámy dostupné v týchto oblastiach môžu mať dva problémy. Niektoré môžu byť falzifikáty a tie skutočné dovezené môžu byť drahšie ako na domácom trhu.
mt: In other countries, glasses may be cheaper, especially in low-income countries, where labor costs are lower. Consider having your eyes checked at home, especially if your insurance covers it, and bring your doctor's prescription with you. Top-brand frames available in these areas may have two problems. Some may be fakes, and those that are real may be more expensive than at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Oficiálna mena na Falklandoch je falklandská libra (FKP), ktorej hodnota je nastavená ako ekvivalent jednej britskej libry (GBP). Peniaze je možné zameniť v jedinej banke na ostrovoch, ktorá sa nachádza v Stanley oproti obchodu FIC West. Britské libry budú spravidla akceptované kdekoľvek na ostrovoch a v rámci kreditných kariet Stanley a taktiež sú často akceptované aj americké doláre. Kreditné karty na odľahlých ostrovoch pravdepodobne nebudú akceptovať, hoci britskú aj americkú menu možno zoberú; v predstihu si túto skutočnosť overte u majiteľov, aby ste zistili, aký je prípustný platobný postup. Zamenenie falklandskej meny mimo ostrovov je takmer nemožné, preto si peniaze zameňte ešte pred opustením ostrovov.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), whose value is set as equivalent to one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank on the islands, which is located in Stanley opposite the FIC West store. British pounds will usually be accepted anywhere on the islands and in credit cards in Stanley and are often accepted in American dollars. Credit cards on remote islands are unlikely to be accepted, although British and American currency may be taken; check with owners beforehand to determine what payment method is acceptable. Exchanging Falkland money off the islands is almost impossible, so exchange money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Väčšina chrámov usporadúva každoročný festival v období od konca novembra do polovice mája – v závislosti od ročného kalendára jednotlivých chrámov. Väčšina chrámových festivalov prebieha kvôli výročiu chrámu alebo narodenín hlavného božstva či inej významnej udalosti spojenej s chrámom. Je naozaj zaujímavé vidieť chrámové festivaly v Kérale s pravidelným sprievodom ozdobených slonov, chrámového orchestra a iných slávností.
mt: Most temples organize an annual festival during the period from late November to mid-May – depending on the lunar calendar of each temple. Most temple festivals are held to commemorate the temple or the birthday of the main deity or other significant event associated with the temple. It is indeed interesting to see temple festivals in Kerala with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Zrejmým spôsobom lietania v prvej triede alebo obchodnej triede je vyčleniť na túto výsadu veľké množstvo finančných prostriedkov (alebo ideálne prinútiť vašu spoločnosť, aby tak urobila namiesto vás). Lacné to však nebude: môžete očakávať, že za business triedu zaplatíte odhadom až štvornásobok bežného cestovného a za prvú triedu až jedenásťnásobok! Vo všeobecnosti sa neoplatí ani hľadať zľavy na business letenky alebo prvú triedu na priame lety z bodu A do B. Letecké spoločnosti dobre vedia, že existuje určitá základná skupina pasažierov, ktorí sú ochotní zaplatiť vysokú cenu za privilégium dostať sa niekam rýchlo a pohodlne, a podľa toho účtujú poplatky.
mt: 1. The most obvious way to fly in business or first class is to set aside a large amount of financial resources (or ideally force your company to do so instead of you). It won't be cheap: you can expect to pay about ten times the normal fare for business class and about twelve times for first class! In general, it's not worth looking for discounts on business class or first class tickets on direct flights from point A to point B. Airlines know that there is a certain group of passengers who are willing to pay a high price for the privilege of getting somewhere quickly and comfortably, and they charge accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Letecké spoločnosti ako Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways a Turkish Airlines výrazne rozšírili svoje služby do Afriky a ponúkajú spojenie do mnohých veľkých afrických miest za konkurencieschopné ceny na rozdiel od iných európskych leteckých spoločností. Od roku 2014 lieta letecká spoločnosť Turkish Airlines do 39 destinácií v 30 afrických krajinách. Ak máte viac času na cestovanie, porovnajte vašu celkovú cenu cestovného do Afriky s cenami cesty okolo celého sveta. Pre všetky miesta mimo Afriky si nezabudnite pripočítať dodatočné náklady na ďalšie víza, dane z odletu, pozemnú dopravu atď.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have significantly expanded their services to Africa and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive prices compared to other European airlines. Since 2014, Turkish Airlines has flown to 39 destinations in 30 African countries. If you have more time to travel, compare your total travel costs to Africa with the cost of travel around the world. Don't forget to add additional costs for further visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all other places outside Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Nákup potravín v supermarketoch je zvyčajne ten najlacnejší spôsob stravovania. Ak však nemáte možnosť variť, váš výber je obmedzený iba na hotové jedlo. V supermarketoch sa čoraz častejšie stretávame s rozmanitejším výberom hotových jedál. Niektoré dokonca poskytujú mikrovlnnú rúru alebo iné pomôcky na ich ohrev. V niektorých krajinách alebo typoch obchodov sa zvykne nachádzať aspoň jedna pridružená reštaurácia – obvykle je neformálna a cenovo dostupná.
mt: Food shopping at supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to eat. However, if you don't have the option to cook, your choice is limited to prepared foods. Supermarkets are increasingly offering a wider variety of prepared foods. Some even provide a microwave oven or other heating equipment. In some countries or types of stores, there is usually at least one attached restaurant – usually informal and affordable.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Variety francúzštiny, ktorými sa hovorí v Belgicku a Švajčiarsku, sa mierne odlišujú od francúzštiny, ktorá sa používa vo Francúzsku, hoci sú si dosť podobné na to, aby boli navzájom zrozumiteľné. Hlavne ide o systém číslovania, v ktorom sa frankofónne Belgicko a Švajčiarsko mierne odlišuje od francúzštiny používanej vo Francúzsku, a aj o výslovnosť niektorých slov sa trochu líši. Všetci francúzski hovoriaci Belgičania a Švajčiari sa aj napriek tomu v škole naučili štandardnú francúzštinu, takže by vám rozumeli, aj keby ste použili štandardný francúzsky systém číslovania.
mt: Varieties of French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland are slightly different from the French spoken in France, but are still mutually intelligible. The main difference is in the system of numbering, in which the French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland slightly differs from the French used in France, and also in the pronunciation of some words. All French-speaking Belgians and Swiss people have learned standard French in school, so they would understand you even if you used the standard French system of numbering.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Iba pár leteckých spoločností stále ponúka cestovné pre pozostalých, čo mierne zľavňuje nepredvídané náklady na cestu na pohreb. Letecké spoločnosti, ktoré ich ponúkajú, zahŕňajú Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa, pre lety odlietajúce z USA alebo Kanady, a WestJet. Vo všetkých prípadoch musíte rezerváciu spraviť telefonicky priamo u leteckej spoločnosti.
mt: Only a few airlines still offer travel for the bereaved, which slightly eases the unexpected costs of a trip to the funeral. Airlines offering this include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa, for flights departing from the United States or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must make a reservation by phone directly with the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Používanie navigačných aplikácií GPS na smartfóne môže byť najjednoduchším a najpohodlnejším spôsobom navigácie, keď sa nachádzate mimo vašej domovskej krajiny. Môže vám ušetriť peniaze tým, že nemusíte kupovať nové mapy pre GPS, alebo samostatný GPS prístroj, alebo si nejaký požičiavať z autopožičovne. Ak vo svojom telefóne nemáte dátové pripojenie alebo ak je mimo dosahu siete, ich výkon môže byť nedostatočný alebo úplne obmedzený.
mt: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when you are outside your home country. It can save you money by not having to buy new maps for GPS, or a separate GPS device, or renting one from an auto-rental. If you don't have data connectivity or if you are out of range of a network, their performance may be insufficient or completely limited.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Spoznávanie miest a divokej zveri na Galapágoch je najlepšie z paluby lode, presne tak, ako to spravil Charles Darwin v roku 1835. Vo vodách Galapág sa plaví viac ako 60 výletných lodí s kapacitou od 8 do 100 cestujúcich. Väčšina návštevníkov si zarezervuje miesto v značnom predstihu (nakoľko v hlavnej sezóne sú lode zvyčajne obsadené). Uistite sa, že sprostredkovateľ, cez ktorého si robíte rezerváciu, je odborník na Galapágy s dobrou znalosťou širokého výberu lodí. Zabezpečí sa, že vaše konkrétne záujmy alebo obmedzenia budú zladené s loďou, ktorá je pre ne najvhodnejšia.
mt: The best way to see and learn about the Galapagos is from the deck of a ship, just as Charles Darwin did in 1835. There are more than 60 cruise ships in the Galapagos waters, ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most visitors book their cruise well in advance (as the main season ships are usually fully booked). Make sure that your agent is an expert on the Galapagos and has a good knowledge of the wide range of ships. He will ensure that your specific interests or limitations are matched with the ship that is most suitable for them.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Kasína sa zvyčajne veľmi snažia o to, aby u nich hostia strávili maximum času a minuli čo najviac peňazí. Poväčšine v nich chýbajú okná či hodiny a východy sa dajú nájsť len s ťažkosťami. Zvyčajne majú jedinečné ponuky jedál, nápojov a zábavy, aby sa hostia bavili a zostali čo najdlhšie. Na niektorých miestach ponúkajú alkoholické nápoje. Keďže opilosť zhoršuje úsudok, sú si všetci dobrí hráči vedomí toho, že je dôležité zostať triezvy.
mt: Casinos are usually very eager to have their guests spend as much time and as little money as possible. They usually lack windows or clocks and exits are hard to find. They usually have unique food, drink and entertainment offers to keep their guests entertained and stay as long as possible. Some places offer alcoholic drinks. Since intoxication impairs judgment, everyone is aware that it is important to stay sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Všetky podstatné mená a osobné zámeno Sie (Vy) vždy začínajú veľkým písmenom, aj keby boli uprostred vety. Toto je dôležitá cesta, pomocou ktorej sa dá rozlišovať medzi slovesami a predmetmi. Taktiež preukázateľne pomáha zjednodušiť čítanie, ale písanie je o niečo komplikovanejšie kvôli potrebe rozlišovať, či je sloveso alebo prídavné meno použité v spodstatnenom tvare.
mt: All important nouns and personal pronoun Sie (You) always begin with a capital letter, even if they are in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between verbs and objects. It also clearly helps to simplify reading, but writing is a little more complicated due to the need to distinguish whether a verb or adjective is used in the infinitive form.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: Mávanie je priateľské gesto na vyjadrenie pozdravu „ahoj“ v mnohých častiach sveta. Avšak v Malajzii, aspoň medzi Malajcami vo vidieckych oblastiach, to znamená „príď“, podobne ako gesto ukazováku ohnutého smerom k telu, ktoré sa používa v niektorých západných krajinách a malo by sa používať iba na tento účel. Britský cestovateľ v Španielsku si rovnako môže pomýliť gesto rozlúčky pomocou dlane otočenej k mávajúcemu (teda nie smerom k osobe, na ktorú mávame) ako gesto, aby sa vrátil.
mt: Waving is a friendly gesture to express a greeting of "hello" in many parts of the world. However, in Malaysia, at least among Malays in rural areas, it means "come", similar to the gesture of a bent index finger, which is used in some Western countries and should be used only for this purpose. A British traveler in Spain may also mistake the goodbye gesture using a palm turned towards the waver (that is, not towards the person being waved at) as a gesture to return.
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Ľadovce nie sú stabilné, ale stekajú z hôr. To spôsobuje praskliny a trhliny, ktoré môžu byť zakryté snehovými mostami. Steny a stropy ľadových jaskýň sa môžu zrútiť a praskliny sa môžu uzavrieť. Na okraji ľadovcov dochádza k uvoľňovaniu obrovských blokov ľadu, ktoré potom padajú, poskakujú alebo sa kotúľajú smerom dole a ďalej od okraja.
mt: Icebergs are not stable, but calve from mountains. This causes cracks and fissures, which may be covered by snow bridges. Walls and ceilings of ice caves may collapse and cracks may close. At the edge of icebergs, huge blocks of ice are released, which then fall, bounce or roll downhill and further away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma je turistické mesto Konžskej demokratickej republiky na krajnom východe neďaleko Rwandy. V roku 2002 bola Goma zničená lávou zo sopky Nyiragongo, ktorá pochovala väčšinu ulíc mesta, najmä jej centrum. Aj keď je Goma primerane bezpečná, pred výletmi mimo Gomy by ste si mali spraviť prieskum, aby ste porozumeli pretrvávajúcej situácii bojov v provincii Nord-Kivu. Mesto je taktiež východiskom pre výstup na sopku Nyiragongo a jedným z najlacnejších miest na sledovanie horských goríl v Afrike. Na cestovanie po meste Goma môžete použiť boda-boda (motorková taxi). Bežná (miestna) cena je ~500 konžských frankov za krátku jazdu.
mt: Goma is a tourist town in the Democratic Republic of the Congo on the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002, Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano, which buried most of the city's streets, especially its center. Although Goma is relatively safe, you should do a risk assessment before traveling outside of Goma to understand the ongoing situation of the conflict in the province of Nord-Kivu. The city is also the starting point for climbing the Nyiragongo volcano and one of the cheapest places to see mountain gorillas in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) for travel in the city of Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese francs for a short ride.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: Akékoľvek kempovanie pod okrajom Grand Canyonu vyžaduje povolenie od zodpovedných orgánov. Povolenia sú obmedzené kvôli ochrane kaňonu a sú sprístupnené prvý deň v mesiaci, štyri mesiace pred počiatočným mesiacom. Povolenie backcountry pre všetky dátumy začínajúce v máji bude k dispozícii od 1. januára. Miesta v najobľúbenejších oblastiach, ako je napríklad kemp Bright Angel, susediaci s rančom Phantom Ranch, sa zvyčajne zaplnia rezerváciami prijatými už v prvý deň od ich spustenia. Na žiadosti o vstup je k dispozícii obmedzené množstvo povolení, ktoré sú dostupné v súlade so zásadou „kto prv príde, ten prv melie“.
mt: Any camping near the rim of the Grand Canyon requires a permit from the appropriate authorities. Permits are limited due to canyon protection and are available the first day of the month, four months prior to the starting month. A backcountry permit for all dates starting in May will be available January 1. The most popular areas, such as Bright Angel Campground, adjacent to Phantom Ranch, a ranch, are usually filled with reservations taken as early as the first day of their release. Applications for entry are limited, available on a first-come, first-served basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Niektoré hotely obsahujú dedičstvo z čias zlatej éry parných železníc a zaoceánskych parníkov, t. j. spred druhej svetovej vojny – z obdobia 19. a začiatku 20. storočia. Tieto hotely boli miestom, kde by sa ubytovali bohatí a slávni vtedajšej doby a často ponúkali vynikajúcu kuchyňu a nočný život. Súčasťou ich podstaty je aj staromódne vybavenie, nedostatok najnovšieho vybavenia a určitý starobilý punc. Aj napriek tomu, že sú často v súkromnom vlastníctve, niekedy sú v nich ubytované hlavy štátov a iní hodnostári, ktorí sú na návšteve. Cestovateľ s dostatkom financií by sa mohol zamyslieť nad letom okolo sveta a cestou sa zastaviť v niektorých z týchto hotelov.
mt: Some hotels contain the legacy of the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners, i.e. before World War II – the era of the 19th and early 20th centuries. These hotels were the place where the rich and famous of the time would stay and often offered excellent cuisine and nightlife. Part of their essence is also old-fashioned equipment, lack of the latest equipment and a certain old-fashioned charm. Despite being often privately owned, sometimes heads of state and other dignitaries are staying there on visits. A traveler with sufficient funds could consider a flight around the world and stop at some of these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: Vďaka spojeniu s Európou podmorskými optickými káblami a širokopásmovému satelitu má Grónsko dobré pokrytie a prístup na internet má 93 % populácie. Váš hotel alebo hostitelia (ak ste ubytovaní v penzióne alebo v súkromnom dome) budú mať pravdepodobne wifi alebo počítač s pripojením na internet a všetky miesta majú internetovú kaviareň alebo nejaké miesto s verejným wifi. Ako už bolo uvedené vyššie, slovo „Eskimák“ je akceptované v Spojených štátoch. A je považované za pejoratívne u mnohých arktických národov mimo USA, najmä v oblasti Kanady. Aj keď možno budete počuť, že toto slovo, používajú grónski domorodci, cudzinci by sa jeho používaniu mali vyhnúť. Domorodí obyvatelia Grónska si v Kanade hovoria Inuiti a v Grónsku sa nazývajú ako Kalaalleq (množné číslo Kalaallit), Grónčan. Zločin a odpor voči cudzincom vo všeobecnosti sú v Grónsku takmer neznámy pojem. Dokonca ani v mestách neexistujú „drsné oblasti“. Chladné počasie predstavuje možno jediné skutočné nebezpečenstvo pre nepripravených. Ak Grónsko navštívite v chladných ročných obdobiach (čím severnejšie pôjdete, tým bude chladnejšie), je nevyhnutné, aby ste si so sebou vzali dostatočne teplé oblečenie. Veľmi dlhé dni v lete môžu viesť k problémom z nedostatku spánku a súvisiacimi zdravotnými problémami. Počas leta si tiež dajte pozor na tzv. severské komáre. Aj keď neprenášajú žiadne choroby, vedia byť poriadne nepríjemné.
mt: Thanks to undersea optical cables and a broadband satellite link, Greenland has good coverage and access to the Internet has 93% of the population. Your hotel or host (if you are staying in a guesthouse or in a private home) will probably have wifi or a computer with internet access and all places have an internet café or some place with public wifi. As mentioned above, the word "Eskimo" is accepted in the United States. And is considered pejorative by many Arctic peoples outside the US, especially in the area of Canada. You may hear this word used by Greenlandic indigenous people, but foreigners should avoid its use. Indigenous inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and in Greenland they are called as Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), Greenlandic. Crime and hostility against foreigners in general are almost unknown in Greenland. Even in the cities there are no "rough areas". Cold weather may be the only real danger for the unprepared. If you visit Greenland in the cold seasons (the colder the further north you go), it is necessary to bring with you adequate warm clothing. Very long days in the summer may lead to problems of lack of sleep and related health problems. In the summer, also be careful of the so-called Arctic mosquitoes. Although they do not carry any diseases, they can be quite unpleasant.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

Aj keď možno budete počuť, že toto slovo, používajú grónski domorodci, cudzinci by sa jeho používaniu mali vyhnúť. Domorodí obyvatelia Grónska si v Kanade hovoria Inuiti a v Grónsku sa nazývajú ako Kalaalleq (množné číslo Kalaallit), Grónčan. Zločin a odpor voči cudzincom vo všeobecnosti sú v Grónsku takmer neznámy pojem. Dokonca ani v mestách neexistujú „drsné oblasti“. Chladné počasie predstavuje možno jediné skutočné nebezpečenstvo pre nepripravených. Ak Grónsko navštívite v chladných ročných obdobiach (čím severnejšie pôjdete, tým bude chladnejšie), je nevyhnutné, aby ste si so sebou vzali dostatočne teplé oblečenie. Veľmi dlhé dni v lete môžu viesť k problémom z nedostatku spánku a súvisiacimi zdravotnými problémami. Počas leta si tiež dajte pozor na tzv. severské komáre. Aj keď neprenášajú žiadne choroby, vedia byť poriadne nepríjemné.
mt: Thanks to undersea optical cables and a broadband satellite link, Greenland has good coverage and access to the Internet has 93% of the population. Your hotel or host (if you are staying in a guesthouse or in a private home) will probably have wifi or a computer with internet access and all places have an internet café or some place with public wifi. As mentioned above, the word "Eskimo" is accepted in the United States. And is considered pejorative by many Arctic peoples outside the US, especially in the area of Canada. You may hear this word used by Greenlandic indigenous people, but foreigners should avoid its use. Indigenous inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and in Greenland they are called as Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), Greenlandic. Crime and hostility against foreigners in general are almost unknown in Greenland. Even in the cities there are no "rough areas". Cold weather may be the only real danger for the unprepared. If you visit Greenland in the cold seasons (the colder the further north you go), it is necessary to bring with you adequate warm clothing. Very long days in the summer may lead to problems of lack of sleep and related health problems. In the summer, also be careful of the so-called Arctic mosquitoes. Although they do not carry any diseases, they can be quite unpleasant.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Záhrada Jardín de la Unión tvorí átrium kláštora zo 17. storočia, z ktorého sa však zachovala iba jediná stavba, kostol Templo de San Diego. Teraz slúži ako centrálne námestie a vždy sa toho na ňom toho veľa deje, vo dne aj v noci. Okolie záhrady obklopuje množstvo reštaurácií, pričom v hlavnom altánku sa často popoludní a večer konajú bezplatné koncerty. Callejon del Beso (Ulička bozku). Dva balkóny vzdialené od seba iba 69 centimetrov sú miestom, odkiaľ pochádza stará milostná legenda. Za pár drobných vám niektoré deti povedia príbeh.
mt: 17th century Jardín de la Unión garden forms the courtyard of a monastery from the 17th century, of which only one building remains, the Templo de San Diego church. It now serves as a central square and always has a lot going on, day and night. The area around the garden is surrounded by many restaurants, and in the main portico, free concerts are often held in the afternoon and evening. Callejon del Beso (Ulička of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters are the place where an old love legend originated. For a few coins, some children will tell you the story.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Turistika je outdoorová aktivita, ktorá spočíva v chôdzi v prírode, často po turistických chodníkoch. Denná turistika zahŕňa vzdialenosti kratšie ako jedna míľa až po väčšie vzdialenosti, ktoré sa dajú prejsť za jeden deň. Celodenná túra na nenáročnej turistickej cestičke si vyžaduje minimálne prípravy a môžu si ju užiť aj ľudia so strednou telesnou kondíciou. Rodiny s malými deťmi bufú možno potrebovať viac príprav, ale deň vonku je ľahko možný aj s kojencami a deťmi predškolského veku.
mt: Tourism is an outdoor activity, which consists of walking in nature, often on hiking trails. Day hiking covers distances shorter than one mile up to longer distances, which can be covered in one day. A day hike on an easy hiking trail requires minimal preparation and can be enjoyed by people with average physical condition. Families with small children may require more preparation, but a day out is easily possible with infants and preschool children.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: Pre Nórsko sú typické strmé fjordy a údolia, ktoré razom prechádzajú do vysokej, viac-menej vyrovnanej plošiny. Tieto plošiny sa často nazývajú „vidde“, čo znamená široký otvorený priestor bez stromov a s obrovskou rozlohou. V Rogalande a Agderi sa im zvyčajne hovorí „hei“, čo znamená pustá pláň bez stromov často pokrytá vresom.
mt: Norway is characterized by steep fjords and valleys, which abruptly transition to a high, relatively flat plateau. These plateaus are often called "vidde", which means a wide open area without trees and with a large area. In Rogaland and Agder, they are usually called "hei", which means a barren plain without trees often covered with heather.
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Turistická sezóna pre horské rekreačné oblasti spravidla vrcholí počas babieho leta. Cez zimu však ich krása a pôvab dostane iný nádych. Mnohé stanice na kopcoch sa tešia z poriadneho množstva snehu a ponúkajú aktivity ako lyžovanie a snowboarding.
mt: The tourist season for mountain recreational areas usually peaks during the baby's summer. However, their beauty and charm gets a different boost during the winter. Many stations on the hills are enjoying a decent amount of snow and offer activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Buďte si istí, že akonáhle narazíte na súkromné prístavy, všetko bude úplne zrejmé. Stretnete ďalších stopárov lodí, ktorí sa s vami podelia o svoje informácie. V zásade budete vylepovať oznamy s ponukou svojej pracovnej sily, prechádzať sa po dokoch, oslovovať ľudí čistiacich jachty, pokúšať sa v bare nadviazať kontakt s námorníkmi atď. Snažte sa nadviazať konverzáciu s čo najväčším množstvom ľudí. Za krátku dobu vás budú všetci poznať a poradia vám, ktoré lode hľadajú ľudí.
mt: Be sure that as soon as you hit the private docks, everything will be obvious. You will meet other yacht crew who will share their information with you. In general, you will be updating your announcements with offers of your labor, walking the docks, approaching people cleaning yachts, trying to strike up a conversation with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to strike up a conversation with as many people as possible. In a short time, everyone will know you and will tell you which yachts are looking for people.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Podľa ostrova Hongkong sa nazýva celá oblasť Hongkong a je miestom, ktoré je pre mnohých turistov hlavným stredobodom záujmu. Súbor budov, ktoré tvoria kontúry Hongkongu, by sa dal prirovnať ku žiariacemu stĺpcovému grafu, ktorý je vidno z prístavu Victoria. Ak by ste si chceli vychutnať najkrajší výhľad na Hongkong, musíte opustiť ostrov a vybrať sa oproti na pobrežie Kowloon. Prevažná väčšina mestského rozvoja na ostrove Hongkong je nahusto sústredený na rekultivovanej pôde pozdĺž severného pobrežia. Toto je miesto, ktoré si britskí kolonizátori prisvojili, a ak hľadáte dôkazy o koloniálnej minulosti územia, je dobré začať na tomto mieste.
mt: According to the island of Hong Kong, the entire area of Hong Kong is a place that is of great interest to many tourists. The set of buildings that make up the contours of Hong Kong can be likened to a glowing columnar graph, which can be seen from the port of Victoria. If you want to enjoy the best view of Hong Kong, you must leave the island and go to the coast of Kowloon. Most of the urban development on the island of Hong Kong is densely concentrated on the reclaimed land along the northern coast. This is the place that the British colonizers appropriated, and if you are looking for evidence of the colonial past of the territory, it is good to start here.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Strmene sú podpery pre jazdcove nohy, ktoré visia po oboch stranách sedla. Poskytujú jazdcovi väčšiu stabilitu, môžu však predstavovať aj bezpečnostné riziko, keďže v nich potenciálne môžu uviaznuť nohy jazdca. Ak je jazdec vyhodený z koňa, ale má nohu zachytenú v strmeni, môže by byť vlečený, ak kôň utečie. Na minimalizáciu tohto rizika je možné prijať rad bezpečnostných opatrení. Väčšina jazdcov nosí jazdecké topánky s podpätkom a dosť úzkou hladkou podrážkou. Ďalej, niektoré sedlá, najmä anglické, sú vybavené bezpečnostnými lištami, ktoré umožňujú, aby strmeň vypadol zo sedla, ak ho padajúci jazdec stiahne dozadu.
mt: Straps are supports for the rider's legs, which hang on both sides of the saddle. They provide the rider with greater stability, but can also present a safety risk, as they may potentially trap the rider's legs. If the rider is thrown from the horse, but has a leg trapped in the stirrup, they may be dragged, if the horse bolts. To minimize this risk, there are a number of safety measures that can be taken. Most riders wear riding boots with a stirrup and a fairly narrow smooth sole. Additionally, some saddles, especially English, are equipped with safety bars, which allow the stirrup to fall out of the saddle, if the falling rider pulls it backwards.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Sieť výmeny pohostinnosti je organizácia, ktorá spája cestujúcich s miestnymi obyvateľmi v mestách, ktoré sa chystajú navštíviť. Pri pripojení k takejto sieti sa väčšinou vyžaduje vyplnenie online formulára. Niektoré siete navyše ponúkajú alebo vyžadujú ešte aj ďalšie overenie. Zoznam dostupných hostiteľov sa potom poskytuje buď v tlačenej podobe alebo online, niekedy s odporúčaniami a hodnoteniami od iných cestovateľov. Spoločnosť Couchsurfing bola založená v januári 2004 po tom, čo počítačový programátor Casey Fenton našiel lacný let na Island, ale nemal kde zostať. Študentom na miestnej univerzite poslal e-mail a dostal obrovské množstvo ponúk na bezplatné ubytovanie.
mt: A hospitality exchange network is an organization that connects travelers with local residents in cities they plan to visit. To join such a network, one usually has to fill out an online form. Some networks also offer or require additional verification. A list of available hosts is then provided either in printed form or online, sometimes with recommendations and ratings from other travelers. The Couchsurfing network was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but had nowhere to stay. He sent an email to students at a local university and received a huge number of offers for free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

Pri pripojení k takejto sieti sa väčšinou vyžaduje vyplnenie online formulára. Niektoré siete navyše ponúkajú alebo vyžadujú ešte aj ďalšie overenie. Zoznam dostupných hostiteľov sa potom poskytuje buď v tlačenej podobe alebo online, niekedy s odporúčaniami a hodnoteniami od iných cestovateľov. Spoločnosť Couchsurfing bola založená v januári 2004 po tom, čo počítačový programátor Casey Fenton našiel lacný let na Island, ale nemal kde zostať. Študentom na miestnej univerzite poslal e-mail a dostal obrovské množstvo ponúk na bezplatné ubytovanie.
mt: A hospitality exchange network is an organization that connects travelers with local residents in cities they plan to visit. To join such a network, one usually has to fill out an online form. Some networks also offer or require additional verification. A list of available hosts is then provided either in printed form or online, sometimes with recommendations and ratings from other travelers. The Couchsurfing network was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but had nowhere to stay. He sent an email to students at a local university and received a huge number of offers for free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: V hosteloch sa ubytovávajú predovšetkým mladí ľudia (typickými hosťami sú dvadsiatnici), často v nich však nájdete aj starších cestovateľov. Rodiny s deťmi sú veľmi zriedkavé, ale niektoré hostely ich púšťajú do súkromných izieb.
mt: Hostels are typically frequented by young people (typical guests are in their twenties), but you can often find older travelers there as well. Families with children are very rare, but some hostels allow them into private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: V hosteloch sa ubytovávajú predovšetkým mladí ľudia (typickými hosťami sú dvadsiatnici), často v nich však nájdete aj starších cestovateľov. Rodiny s deťmi sú veľmi zriedkavé, ale niektoré hostely ich púšťajú do súkromných izieb.

src: Hádzanie bumerangov je populárna schopnosť, ktorú si chcú osvojiť mnohí turisti. Ak sa chcete naučiť hádzať bumerang, aby sa vám vrátil späť do ruky, uistite sa, že máte vhodný bumerang na návrat. Väčšina bumerangov dostupných v Austrálii sa v skutočnosti nevracia. Najlepšie je, aby ich začiatočníci neskúšali hádzať vo vetre
mt: Throwing boomerangs is a popular skill that many tourists want to learn. If you want to learn to throw a boomerang so that it comes back to you, make sure you have the right boomerang for return. Most boomerangs available in Australia do not return. It is best for beginners not to try throwing in the wind
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Vďaka 17 000 ostrovom, z ktorých si môžete vybrať, je indonézske jedlo termín, ktorý zastrešuje širokú škálu regionálnych kuchýň, ktoré môžete nájsť naprieč celou krajinou. Ak sa tento výraz použije bez ďalších kvalifikácií, má tendenciu znamenať jedlo pochádzajúce pôvodne zo strednej a východnej časti hlavného ostrova Jáva. Jávska kuchyňa, ktorá je teraz široko dostupná po celom súostroví, obsahuje množstvo jednoducho dochutených jedál. Medzi prevládajúce dochucovadlá, ktoré majú Jávčania v obľube, patria arašidy, čili, cukor (predovšetkým jávsky kokosový cukor) a rôzne aromatické koreniny.
mt: 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian cuisine is a term that encompasses a wide range of regional cuisines from across the archipelago. If this term is used without further qualification, it tends to mean food originally from the central and eastern part of the main island of Java. Javanese cuisine, which is now widely available throughout the archipelago, includes a number of simply prepared dishes. Among the most popular condiments enjoyed by the Javanese are peanuts, chilies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Pre tých, ktorí sa nevyznajú v lekárskom žargóne – slová infekčný a nákazlivý majú odlišný význam. Infekčná choroba je vyvolaná patogénom, akým je napríklad vírus, baktéria, huba alebo iné parazity. Nákazlivá choroba je taká, ktorá sa ľahko prenáša na osobu nachádzajúcu sa v blízkosti infikovanej osoby. Mnohé vláy požadujú, aby návštevníci, ktorí prichádzajú do ich krajín alebo z nich odchádzajú, boli zaočkovaní proti súboru chorôb. Tieto požiadavky neraz ovplyvňuje to, do ktorých krajín konkrétna osoba cestovala alebo ich má v pláne navštíviť.
mt: For those who are not familiar with medical jargon – the words infectious and contagious have different meanings. An infectious disease is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is one that is easily transmitted to a person who is in close proximity to an infected person. Many countries require visitors who are coming to their country or leaving it to be vaccinated against a group of diseases. These requirements are not always influenced by the countries a person has visited or plans to visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Osobné siete VPN (virtuálne privátne siete) sú vynikajúcou možnosťou, ako obísť politickú cenzúru aj komerčnú geofiltráciu IP adries. Sú nadradení webovým proxy serverom hlavne z týchto príčin: Presmerovávajú celý internetový prenos, nielen http. Spravidla ponúkajú vyššiu šírku pásma a lepšiu kvalitu služieb. Sú šifrované, a preto je ťažšie ich sledovať.
mt: Personal VPNs (Virtual Private Networks) are a great way to bypass political censorship and commercial IP address geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for the following reasons: They route all internet traffic, not just http. They usually offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted, so it is harder to track them.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Nakoľko hovory sú smerované cez internet, nemusíte používať domácu alebo lokálnu telefónnu spoločnosť. Nevyžaduje sa ani, aby ste získali miestne číslo od komunity, v ktorej žijete; môžete získať satelitné internetové pripojenie v divočine Chicken na Aljaške a zvoliť si číslo, podľa ktorého sa nachádzate v slnečnej Arizone. Často si musíte zakúpiť globálne číslo samostatne – inak sa vám z verejnej telefónnej siete nebude možné dovolať. To odkiaľ číslo pochádza, bude mať dopad na ľudí, ktorí vám volajú.
mt: Because calls are routed through the Internet, you don't need to use a local or domestic phone company. You don't need to get a local number from the community you live in; you can get satellite Internet access in Chicken, Alaska, and choose a number that says you're in sunny Arizona. Often you have to buy a global number separately — otherwise, you won't be able to call from a public pay phone. Where the number is from will affect people who call you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Výslovnosť v taliančine je celkom jednoduchá, pretože väčšina slov sa vyslovuje rovnako, ako sa píše Najdôležitejšie písmená, na ktoré si treba dávať pozor, sú c a g, pretože ich výslovnosť sa líši v závislosti od nasledujúcej samohlásky. Nezabudnite na to, že r a rr sa vyslovuje odlišne: caro znamená drahý a carro je koč.
mt: The Italian language is fairly easy to pronounce, as most words are pronounced as they are spelled. The most important letters to pay attention to are c and g, as their pronunciation changes depending on the following vowel. Don't forget that r and rr are pronounced differently: caro means "dear" and carro is "car."
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: İzmir je tretie najväčšie mesto v Turecku s približne 3,7 miliónmi obyvateľov, druhý najväčší prístav po Istanbule a veľmi dobrý dopravný uzol. Kedysi starobylé mesto Smyrna sa premenilo na moderné, rozvinuté a rušné obchodné centrum, ktoré sa rozprestiera okolo obrovského zálivu a obklopujú ho hory. Pomedzi širokými bulvármi, budovami so sklenenou fasádou a modernými nákupnými centrami sa nachádzajú domy s tradičnými strechami z červenej škridle, trh z 18. storočia a staré mešity a kostoly. V meste cítiť viac atmosféru stredomorskej Európy než súčasného Turecka.
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with about 3.7 million inhabitants, the second largest port after Istanbul and a very good transport hub. Once ancient Smyrna was transformed into a modern, developed and bustling commercial center that spreads around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. Between wide boulevards, buildings with glass facades and modern shopping centers are houses with traditional roofs of red tile, the 18th century market and old mosques and churches. In the city feels more atmosphere of the Mediterranean Europe than modern Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
