src: Prezeranie čerešňových kvetov, známe ako hanami, je súčasťou japonskej kultúry od 8. storočia. Nápad prišiel z Číny, kde slivkové kvety boli kvetom voľby. V Japonsku boli prvé večierky s čerešňovými kvetmi organizované iba pre cisára a iných členov aristokracie okolo cisárskeho dvora.
mt: The viewing of cherry blossoms, known as hanami, has been part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The idea came from China, where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first hanami parties with cherry blossoms were organized only for the emperor and other members of the aristocracy around the imperial court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Jeruzalem je hlavné a súčasne najväčšie mesto Izraela. Väčšina ostatných krajín a OSN ho však ako hlavné mesto Izraela neuznávajú. Starobylé mesto v Judských vrchoch má úchvatnú históriu, ktorá pretrváva už tisíce rokov. Mesto je posvätné pre tri monoteistické náboženstvá - judaizmus, kresťanstvo a islam a slúži ako duchovné, náboženské a kultúrne centrum. Jeruzalem je jedným z hlavných turistických cieľov v Izraeli vďaka jeho náboženskému významu a najmä kvôli mnohým pamiatkam v oblasti Starého mesta. V Jeruzaleme sa nachádza množstvo historických, archeologických a kultúrnych pamiatok, a popri nich aj rušné a životom pulzujúce nákupné centrá, kaviarne a reštaurácie plné ľudí.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and the largest city of Israel. Most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as the capital of Israel. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a long history that has lasted for thousands of years. The city is sacred to three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel due to its religious significance and especially due to many monuments in the Old City. In Jerusalem there are a lot of historical, archaeological and cultural monuments, and along with them busy and pulsating shopping centers, coffee shops and restaurants full of people.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Krugerov národný park (KNP) na severovýchode Južnej Afriky sa rozprestiera pozdĺž hranice s Mozambikom na východe, so Zimbabwe na severe a jeho južnú hranicu tvorí Krokodília rieka. Park má rozlohu 19 500 km² a je rozdelený do 14 rôznych ekologických zón, z ktorých každá podporuje iný život vo voľnej prírode. Je jednou z hlavných atrakcií Južnej Afriky a je považovaný za vlajkovú loď Juhoafrických národných parkov (SANParks). Aj tu sa platí za dennú údržbu parku a vstupné poplatky rovnako ako je tomu vo všetkých juhoafrických národných parkoch. Najprospešnejšie môže byť zakúpiť si vstupenku Wild Card, ktorá umožňuje vstup buď do vybraného množstva parkov v Južnej Afrike alebo do všetkých juhoafrických národných parkov.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) in northeastern South Africa stretches along the border with Mozambique on the east, with Zimbabwe to the north, and the Krokodil River forms its southern border. The park has an area of 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 different ecological zones, each of which supports a different life in the wild. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and is considered the flagship of the South African National Parks (SANParks). There is a daily maintenance fee and entrance fees are paid as in all South African national parks. The most profitable can be to buy a Wild Card ticket, which allows entry either to a selected number of parks in South Africa or to all South African national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Krugerov národný park (KNP) na severovýchode Južnej Afriky sa rozprestiera pozdĺž hranice s Mozambikom na východe, so Zimbabwe na severe a jeho južnú hranicu tvorí Krokodília rieka. Park má rozlohu 19 500 km² a je rozdelený do 14 rôznych ekologických zón, z ktorých každá podporuje iný život vo voľnej prírode. Je jednou z hlavných atrakcií Južnej Afriky a je považovaný za vlajkovú loď Juhoafrických národných parkov (SANParks). Aj tu sa platí za dennú údržbu parku a vstupné poplatky rovnako ako je tomu vo všetkých juhoafrických národných parkoch. Najprospešnejšie môže byť zakúpiť si vstupenku Wild Card, ktorá umožňuje vstup buď do vybraného množstva parkov v Južnej Afrike alebo do všetkých juhoafrických národných parkov.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) in northeastern South Africa stretches along the border with Mozambique on the east, with Zimbabwe to the north, and the Krokodil River forms its southern border. The park has an area of 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 different ecological zones, each of which supports a different life in the wild. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and is considered the flagship of the South African National Parks (SANParks). There is a daily maintenance fee and entrance fees are paid as in all South African national parks. The most profitable can be to buy a Wild Card ticket, which allows entry either to a selected number of parks in South Africa or to all South African national parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Táto strmá hora, týčiaca sa nad severným koncom Machu Picchu, slúži často ako pozadie mnohých fotografií ruín. Zospodu to vyzerá trochu skľučujúco a je to strmý a ťažký výstup, ale zdatnejší jedinci by ho mali zvládnuť asi za 45 minút. Pozdĺž cesty sú poväčšine položené kamenné schody a v strmších úsekoch sa nachádzajú oceľové laná, ktoré slúžia ako oporné zábradlie. Počítajte teda s tým, že vám dôjde dych a dávajte pozor na strmšie úseky, najmä ak sú mokré, pretože sa rýchlo môžu stať nebezpečné. Tesne pod vrcholom je malá jaskyňa, cez ktorú sa musí prejsť, je pomerne nízka a poriadne tesná.
mt: This steep hill, towering over the northern end of Machu Picchu, often serves as the background for many photographs of the ruins. It looks a little bit threatening from below and is a steep and difficult climb, but the more able should be able to do it in about 45 minutes. The path is mostly paved with stone steps and in the steeper sections there are steel cables, which serve as handrails. So expect to run out of breath and be careful in the steeper sections, especially if they are wet, as they can quickly become dangerous. Just below the summit is a small cave, which must be passed through, it is fairly low and quite narrow.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Malorská kuchyňa, ako aj ostatné v podobných oblastia Stredomoria, stavia na chlebe, zelenine a mäse (predovšetkým bravčovom) a nezaobíde sa bez olivového oleja. Jednoduchou obľúbenou večerou, najmä počas leta, je Pa amb Oli: chlieb s olivovým olejom, paradajkami alebo inou prílohou, ako syr, tuniak atď.
mt: The Maltese kitchen, like other in similar areas of the Mediterranean, stands on bread, vegetables and meat (especially lamb) and is not complete without olive oil. A simple favorite dinner, especially in the summer, is Pa amb Oli: bread with olive oil, tomatoes or other garnish, such as cheese, tuna etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Jedlo hangi sa varí v horúcej jame v zemi. Šachta je buď vyhrievaná rozpálenými kameňmi z ohňa, alebo na niektorých miestach geotermálne teplo spôsobuje, že sú plochy zeme prirodzeným spôsobom horúce. Hangi sa často používa na prípravu tradičnej roastovanej večere. Niekoľko miest v Rotorua ponúka geotermálne hangi, zatiaľ čo iné hangi sa dá vyskúšať v Christchurchi, Wellingtone alebo inde.
mt: Hangi is cooked in a pit in the ground. The pit is either heated by hot stones from a fire, or in some places, geothermal heat causes the ground to be naturally hot. Hangi is often used to prepare a traditional roast dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be tried in Christchurch, Wellington or elsewhere.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Pri návšteve kláštorov majú ženy povinnosť mať oblečené sukne prekrývajúce kolená a taktiež mať zakryté plecia. Väčšina kláštorov poskytuje šatky pre ženy, ktoré prichádzajú nepripravené, ale ak si prinesiete vlastnú, najmä takú, ktorá má žiarivé farby, pri vstupe sa na vás môže mních či mníška usmiať. Podľa rovnakých predpisov sa vyžaduje, aby muži nosili nohavice, ktoré zakrývajú kolená. Aj tatýto odev si môžete zapožičať zo skladu pri vchode, ale treba si uvedomiť, žeodev sa po každom používateľovi neperie, takže sa v týchto sukniach asi nebudete cítiť pohodlne. Jedna veľkosť pre všetkých mužov!
mt: When visiting monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and also to have their shoulders covered. Most monasteries provide robes for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with flashy colors, a monk or nun may laugh at you upon entry. According to the same rules, men are required to wear pants covering the knees. You can also borrow these clothes from the storage room at the entrance, but you should be aware that the clothes are not washed after each user, so you may not feel comfortable in these robes!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Ak navštívite arktické alebo antarktické oblasti v zime, budete môcť zažiť polárnu noc, čo znamená, že slnko nevyjde nad horizont. Bude to dobrá príležitosť pozorovať polárnu žiaru, pretože obloha bude tmavá viacmenej nepretržite. A budete sa môcť tešiť aj z hviezd, pretože svetelný smog nie je problémom v málo osídlených oblastiach.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic regions in winter, you may experience polar night, which means the sun will not rise above the horizon. It will be a good opportunity to observe the polar aurora, because the sky will be dark almost continuously. And you can also enjoy the stars, because light pollution is not a problem in sparsely populated areas.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Satelitný telefón môže byť vašou jedinou možnosťou vo vzdialených miestach, kde nie je pokrytie mobilným telefónom. Satelitný telefón všeobecne nie je náhradou mobilného telefónu. Aby ste s ním mohli volať, musíte byť v exteriéri na mieste s jasnou viditeľnosťou na satelit. Túta služba sa často využíva v lodnej doprave vrátane výletných lodí, ako aj na výpravách, ktoré potrebujú dátové a hlasové spojenie na diaľku. Váš miestny poskytovateľ telefónnych služieb by mal byť schopný poskytnúť viac informácií o pripojení k tejto službe.
mt: A satellite phone can be your only option in remote areas where there is no mobile phone coverage. A satellite phone is not a replacement for a mobile phone. In order to call with it, you must be outside in an area with clear visibility to a satellite. This service is often used in maritime transport including cruise ships, as well as expeditions that require data and voice connectivity at a distance. Your local phone service provider should be able to provide more information on connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Hlavným mestom Moldavska je Kišiňov. Miestnym jazykom je rumunčina, no veľmi často sa používa ruština. Moldavsko je multietnická republika, ktorá trpela etnickým konfliktom. V roku 1994 tento konflikt viedol k vytvoreniu samozvanej Podnesterskej republiky na východe Moldavska, ktorá má svoju vlastnú vládu a menu, ale nie je uznaná žiadnou členskou krajinou OSN. Medzi týmito dvoma časťami Moldavska sa napriek neúspechu politických rokovaní obnovili hospodárske vzťahy. Hlavným náboženstvom v Moldavsku je pravoslávne kresťanstvo.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is often used. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994 this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Republic of Pridnestrovie in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency, but is not recognized by any UN member state. Between these two parts of Moldova, despite the failure of political negotiations, economic relations have been restored. The main religion in Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Keďže je Montevideo južne od rovníka, keď je na severnej pologuli zima, je tam leto, a naopak. Montevideo je v subtrópoch; v letných mesiacoch sú bežné teploty nad +30°C. Zima môže byť klamne chladná: teploty zriedka klesnú pod bod mrazu, ale kombinácia vetra a vlhkosti spôsobuje, že pocitovo je chladnejšie, ako ukazuje teplomer. Neexistujú žiadne špeciálne obdobia „dažďov“ a „sucha“: množstvo zrážok zostáva zhruba rovnaké v priebehu celého roka.
mt: Because Montevideo is south of the equator, when it is winter in the northern hemisphere, it is summer in Montevideo. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures are usually above +30°C. Winter can be deceptively cold: temperatures rarely drop below freezing, but the combination of wind and humidity makes it feel colder than the thermometer indicates. There are no special "rainy season" and "dry season": the amount of precipitation remains roughly constant throughout the year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: Nežiaduce maľby alebo nápisy na múroch sú známe ako graffiti. Aj keď vôbec nie sú moderným fenoménom, väčšina ľudí si ich pravdepodobne spája s vandalizmom verejných a súkromných majetkov sprejovými farbami, za ktorý môžu mladiství. V dnešnej dobe však existujú graffiti umelci, graffiti udalosti a „legálne“ steny. Graffiti v tejto súvislosti často pripomínajú skôr umelecké diela než nečitateľné značky.
mt: Unwanted paintings or writings on walls are known as graffiti. Although they are not a modern phenomenon, most people associate them with vandalism of public and private property with spray paint, for which juveniles are often responsible. In today's world, however, there are graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti in this context often resemble more artistic works than illegible marks.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Čo sa týka niektorých festivalov, drvivá väčšina návštevníkov hudobných festivalov sa rozhodne kempovať na mieste a väčšina účastníkov to považuje za dôležitú súčasť zážitku. Ak chcete byť blízko akcie, musíte sa tam dostať skôr, aby ste dostali kemping blízko hudby. Pamätajte, že aj keď na hlavných pódiách hudobné predstavenie skončí, v niektorých častiach festivalu môže hrať hudba až do neskorej noci. Niektoré festivaly majú špeciálne kempingové plochy pre rodiny s malými deťmi.
mt: As for some festivals, the overwhelming majority of music festival attendees decide to camp on site and most consider it an integral part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, you need to get there early to get a campsite close to the music. Remember that while the main stages' performances may end, music may play in some parts of the festival until late at night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

Niektoré festivaly majú špeciálne kempingové plochy pre rodiny s malými deťmi.
mt: As for some festivals, the overwhelming majority of music festival attendees decide to camp on site and most consider it an integral part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, you need to get there early to get a campsite close to the music. Remember that while the main stages' performances may end, music may play in some parts of the festival until late at night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Vzhľadom na veľkú vzdialenosť mnohých puebiel, rozvinutý nočný život mimo Albuquerque alebo Santa Fe nenájdete. Takmer všetky kasína uvedené vyššie však podávajú nápoje a niekoľko z nich prináša značkovú zábavu (predovšetkým tie veľké, ktoré sú v blízkosti Albuquerque a Santa Fe). Upozornenie: tunajšie malomestské bary nie sú vždy dobrým miestom na stretnutie s hosťami mimo štátu. Po prvé, severné Nové Mexiko má značné problémy s riadením pod vplyvom alkoholu a koncentrácia opitých vodičov je vysoká najmä v blízkosti barov v malých mestách.
mt: Due to the great distances between many pueblos, a developed nightlife outside of Albuquerque or Santa Fe is not found.  Almost all of the casinos listed above serve alcohol and some of them bring in name entertainment (especially the larger ones that are near Albuquerque and Santa Fe).  Warning:  The local small town bars are not always a good place to meet out-of-state guests.  Northern New Mexico has a significant problem with driving under the influence and the concentration of drunk drivers is high especially around bars in small towns.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Hlavné miestne pivo je Number One, nie je to komplexné pivo, ale príjemné a osviežujúce. Druhé miestne pivo sa volá Manta. Dajú sa zohnať mnohé francúzske vína, na druhej strane novozélandské a austrálske vína by mohli byť dostupnejšie. Miestna voda z vodovodu je úplne bezpečná na pitie. Ak však máte obavy, zohnať balenú vodu nie je problém. Pre Austrálčanov je koncept kávy „flat white“ cudzí. Malá čierna káva je „espresso“, kapučíno je podávané s vysokou vrstvou smotany (nie peny) a čaj je podávaný bez mlieka. Horúca čokoláda zodpovedá belgickým normám. Ovocné šťavy sú drahé, ale vynikajúce.
mt: The main local beer is Number One, it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The second local beer is called Manta. Many French wines can be obtained, on the other hand New Zealand and Australian wines could be more accessible. Tap water is completely safe to drink. If you have concerns, buying bottled water is not a problem. For Australians, the concept of coffee "flat white" is strange. Small black coffee is "espresso", cappuccino is served with a thick layer of cream (not whipped cream) and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate meets Belgian standards. Fruit juices are expensive, but excellent.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: Guaraníovia boli najvýznamnejšou domorodou skupinou obyvateľstva. Sídlili v oblasti súčasného východného Paraguaja. Boli to polokočovní lovci, ktorí tiež praktizovali subsistenčné poľnohospodárstvo. Región Chaco bol domovom iných skupín domorodých kmeňov, ako napríklad Guaycurú a Payaguá, ktoré sa živili lovom, zberom a rybolovom. V 16. storočí sa Paraguaj, predtým nazývaný „Obrovská provincia Indie“, zrodil v dôsledku stretu španielskych dobyvateľov s pôvodnými domorodými skupinami. Španieli začali obdobie kolonizácie, ktoré trvalo tri storočia. Od založenia Asunciónu v roku 1537 sa Paraguaju podarilo zachovať si veľa zo svojho pôvodného charakteru a identity.
mt: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group of the population. They lived in the area of present-day eastern Paraguay. They were semi-nomadic hunters who also practiced subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other indigenous groups, such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who lived by hunting, gathering, and fishing. In the 16th century, Paraguay, previously known as the "Great Province of India", was born out of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the original indigenous groups. The Spanish began a period of colonization that lasted three centuries. From the founding of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay managed to preserve much of its original character and identity.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: Parížania majú povesť egocentrických, hrubých a arogantných ľudí. Aj keď často ide o nepresný stereotyp, najlepším spôsobom, ako sa nestratiť v Paríži, je stále sa správať čo najlepšie a vystupovať ako niekto „bien élevé“ (s dobrou výchovou). Nestratiť sa bude podstatne jednoduchšie. Strohý zovňajšok Parížanov sa rýchlo vyparí, ak prejavíte základy zdvorilosti.
mt: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While often an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to avoid losing yourself in Paris is still to behave as best as you can and act like someone "bien élevé" (well brought up). Losing yourself will be much easier. The harsh exterior of Parisians will quickly disappear if you show basic politeness.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: Sieť MetroRail má v prímestských vlakoch v Kapskom Meste a okolí dve triedy: MetroPlus (prvá trieda) a Metro (tretia trieda). MetroPlus je pohodlnejšie a menej preplnené, ale o niečo drahšie, aj keď stále lacnejšie ako bežné lístky na metro v Európe. Každý vlak má vozne triedy MetroPlus aj Metro. Vozne MetroPlus sú vždy na tom konci vlaku, ktorý je bližšie ku Kapskému Mestu.
mt: MetroRail has two classes in its suburban trains in Cape Town and its surrounding area: MetroPlus (first class) and Metro (third class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded, but a bit more expensive, although still cheaper than regular tickets on the metro in Europe. Each train has MetroPlus and Metro cars. MetroPlus cars are always at the end of the train that is closer to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Cestovatelia môžu prísť do kontaktu so živočíšnymi škodcami, ktorí sa v ich domovských regiónoch nevyskytujú. Škodci môžu znehodnotiť jedlo, spôsobiť podráždenie, alebo v najhoršom prípade spôsobiť alergické reakcie, šíriť jed, alebo prenášať infekcie. Samotné infekčné choroby alebo nebezpečné zvieratá, ktoré môžu ľudí zraniť alebo násilne zabiť, sa obvykle nekvalifikujú ako škodcovia.
mt: Travelers may come into contact with animal pests that are not found in their home regions. Pests can contaminate food, cause irritation, or in the worst case cause allergic reactions, spread disease, or carry infection. The infectious diseases or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people are usually not considered pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Každý obchod na rohu je plný neprehľadného množstva predplatených telefónnych kariet, ktoré je možné použiť v platených alebo bežných telefónoch. Zatiaľ čo si s väčšinou kariet môžete zavolať kamkoľvek, niektoré sa špecializujú na poskytovanie výhodných sadzieb hovorov pre konkrétne skupiny krajín. Prístup k týmto službám je často prostredníctvom bezplatného telefónneho čísla, na ktoré je možné volať bez poplatkov z väčšiny telefónov.
mt: Every corner store is full of a bewildering array of prepaid phone cards, which can be used in pay or regular phones. While most of the cards allow you to call anywhere, some specialize in providing cheap calling rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free phone number, which can be called from most phones without charge.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Národný park Plitvické jazerá je husto pokrytý lesmi, najmä bukovými, smrekovými a jedľovými, pričom sa vyznačuje zmesou alpského a stredomorského rastlinstva. Má pozoruhodne širokú škálu rastlinných spoločenstiev vďaka svojmu rozsahu mikroklím, rozdielnym pôdam a rozličným nadmorským výškam. Táto oblasť je tiež domovom najrôznejších druhov zvierat a vtákov. Vyskytuje sa tu vzácna fauna, ako medveď hnedý európsky, vlk, orol, sova, rys, divá mačka a tetrov, spolu s množstvom ďalších častých druhov.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is densely forested, mainly with beech, spruce and fir trees, and is notable for its mix of alpine and Mediterranean flora. It has a wide range of plant communities due to its range of microclimates, different soils and varying altitudes. This area is also home to the most diverse range of animals and birds. It is home to rare fauna such as the brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wildcat and otter, along with a multitude of other common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Mediálne spoločnosti zvyčajne klamú o dôvode, prečo to robia. Tvrdia, že to slúži na „zamedzenie pirátstva“. Regionálne kódy v skutočnosti nemajú absolútne žiadny vplyv na nelegálne kopírovanie. Kópia disku s presnosťou na bit pôjde prehrať bez problémov na akomkoľvek zariadení, kde by sa dal prehrať aj originál. Skutočným účelom je poskytnúť týmto spoločnostiam väčšiu kontrolu nad ich trhmi; všetko je to o točení peňazí.
mt: Media companies usually lie about why they do this. They claim it is to "thwart piracy". Regional codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying. A copy of a disc with bit-perfect accuracy can be played back without problems on any device that can play back the original. The real purpose is to give these companies greater control over their markets; it's all about turning a profit.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Aj keď je po príchode do vlasti imigračná kontrola zvyčajne buď absentujúca alebo formálna, colná kontrola môže byť otravná. Určite si dávajte pozor na to, čo môžete a nemôžete priniesť so sebou a nahláste čokoľvek, čo prekračuje právne obmedzenia.
mt: Even though immigration control is usually absent or formal, customs control can be annoying. Be sure to pay attention to what you can and cannot bring with you and declare anything that exceeds legal restrictions.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Údolie Cochamó je obľúbený horolezecký cieľ v Čile. Pre svoje rozmanité obrovské žulové steny a skalné previsy je označovaný ako Yosemity Južnej Ameriky. Výhľady z vrcholkov štítov sú dychvyrážajúce. Horolezci zo všetkých kútov sveta neustále objavujú nové trasy medzi nekonečným potenciálom stien.
mt: Cochamó Valley is a popular climbing destination in Chile. For its diverse huge granite walls and overhangs it is known as the Yosemites of South America. Views from the summits are breathtaking. Climbers from all corners of the world are constantly discovering new routes among the endless potential of the walls.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Ak chcete lietať po celom svete na južnej pologuli, výber letov a destinácií je obmedzený kvôli nedostatku zaoceánskych trás. Ani jedna z aliancií leteckých spoločností nepokrýva všetky tri možnosti preletu oceánmi na južnej pologuli (a SkyTeam nepokrýva ani jeden z možných preletov). Skupina Star Alliance však obhospodaruje všetko s výnimkou východného Južného Pacifiku od Santiaga de Chile po Tahiti, čo je let, ktorý ponúka LATAM Oneworld. Tento let nie je jedinou možnosťou, ak chcete preskočiť južný Pacifik a západné pobrežie Južnej Ameriky. (pozri nižšie)
mt: If you want to fly around the world on the southern hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. None of the airline alliances covers all three options for ocean crossings on the southern hemisphere (and SkyTeam doesn't cover any of the possible crossings). The Star Alliance group, however, covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a flight offered by LATAM Oneworld. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: V medzinárodnom meradle existuje takmer 200 organizácií zameraných na bežecké výlety. Väčšina z nich funguje nezávisle. Organizácia Go Running Tours, ktorá je nasledovníkom Global Running Tours, združuje desiatky organizátorov bežeckých prehliadok na štyroch kontinentoch. Korene má v barcelonských Running Tours Barcelona a kodanskej Running Copenhagen a rýchlo sa k nej pridali aj pražské Running Tours Prague a ďalšie mestá.
mt: There are almost 200 organizations focused on running tours worldwide. Most of them operate independently. The Go Running Tours organization, which is a successor to the Global Running Tours, brings together dozens of running tour organizers on four continents. It has its roots in the Barcelona Running Tours and Running Copenhagen in Copenhagen, and quickly added Prague Running Tours and other cities.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: Safari je asi najväčším lákadlom cestovného ruchu v Afrike a veľkým zážitkom pre mnohých návštevníkov. Výraz safari sa bežne používa na označenie pozemného cestovania s cieľom prehliadky veľkolepej africkej divočiny, najmä na savane. Niektoré zvieratá, ako napríklad slony a žirafy, sa zvyknú priblížiť k autám a štandardné vybavenie umožní dobré pozorovanie. Levy, gepardy a leopardy sú niekedy plaché a lepšie ich uvidíte z diaľky pomocou ďalekohľadu. Pešie safari (nazývané tiež prechádzka po buši alebo turistické safari alebo len pešie) je niekoľkohodinová alebo niekoľkodňová turistka.
mt: Safari is probably the biggest attraction of tourism in Africa and a great experience for many visitors. The term safari is commonly used to describe land travel with the purpose of viewing the magnificent African wilderness, especially on the savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, are used to approaching cars and standard equipment allows good viewing. Leopards and cheetahs are sometimes shy and you will see them better at a distance with a telescope. Walking safari (also called bush walk or tourist safari or just walking) is a few-hour or multi-day trekking.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Pre väčšie skupiny sú prehliadky lacnejšie. Ak ste sami alebo len dvaja a chceli by ste získať lepšiu cenu, skúste sa dohodnúť s ďalšími návštevníkmi a vytvoriť skupinu štyroch až šiestich. Ale nemusíte sa tým zase až tak znepokojovať, pretože turistov zvyknú pomiešať, aby naplnili autá. Zdá sa, že to je skôr spôsob, ako presvedčiť ľudí, aby verili, že musia platiť viac.
mt: Tours are cheaper for larger groups. If you are alone or just two and want to get a better price, try to agree with other visitors and create a group of four to six. But you do not have to worry too much about it, because tourists are used to mix, to fill the cars. It seems to be a way to convince people that they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Zatiaľ čo ekonomika San Francisca je spájaná s tým, že je svetovou turistickou atrakciou, má diverzifikovanú ekonomiku. Najväčšie odvetvia zamestnanosti predstavujú profesionálne služby, štátna správa, financie, obchod a cestovný ruch. Časté zobrazenia v hudbe, filmoch, literatúre a populárnej kultúre pomohlo, aby sa mesto a jeho významné body stali známymi po celom svete. San Francisco vybudovalo veľkú turistickú infraštruktúru s mnohými hotelmi, reštauráciami a špičkovými konferenčnými zariadeniami. San Francisco je tiež jedným z najlepších miest v krajine na vychutnanie si ázijskej kuchyne: kórejskej, thajskej, indickej a japonskej.
mt: While the economy of San Francisco is tied to its status as a tourist destination, it has a diversified economy. The largest sectors of employment are professional services, government, finance, business and tourism. Frequent depictions in music, film, literature and popular culture helped to make the city and its landmarks known worldwide. San Francisco built a large tourist infrastructure with many hotels, restaurants and top-notch conference facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country to enjoy Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Rezervácia s časovým predstihom dáva cestujúcemu istotu, že po príchode svojho do cieľa bude mať kde spať. Cestovné kancelárie zvyčajne majú dohodu s konkrétnymi hotelmi. Ponúkajú však aj možnosť rezervovať si aj iné formy ubytovania, ako napríklad kemping. Cestovné kancelárie zvyčajne ponúkajú balíčky, ktoré zahŕňajú raňajky, dopravu na letisko/z letiska alebo dokonca kombinované letové a hotelové balíčky. Taktiež vám môžu podržať rezerváciu, ak budete potrebovať viac času na premyslenie ponuky alebo na zaobstaranie ďalších dokladov do vašej destinácie (napr. víza). Akékoľvek návrhy na zmenu alebo požiadavky by mali byť smerované v prvom rade na cestovnú kanceláriu, nie priamo na hotel.
mt: A reservation with a time buffer gives a traveler assurance that upon arrival at their destination, they will have a place to stay. Travel agencies usually have an agreement with specific hotels. They also offer the possibility of reserving other forms of accommodation, such as camping. Travel agencies usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold a reservation if you need more time to consider the offer or to obtain additional documents for your destination (e.g. visas). Any proposals for change or requests should be directed primarily to the travel agency, not directly to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Aplikácie na preklad textu v reálnom čase – aplikácie, ktoré sú schopné automaticky prekladať celé segmenty textu z jedného jazyka do druhého. Niektoré aplikácie v tejto kategórii dokážu preložiť cudzojazyčné nápisy na značkách či iných predmetoch. Stačí, aby používateľ namieril na tieto objekty svoj smartfón. Prekladateľské nástroje sa dramaticky zlepšili a teraz často poskytujú viac či menej správne preklady (a zriedkavejšie nezmysly), je ale potrebné pristupovať k nim obozretne, pretože sa stále môžu mýliť. Jednou z najvýznamnejších aplikácií v tejto kategórii je Google Translate, ktorý umožňuje offline preklad po stiahnutí požadovaných jazykových dát.
mt: Real-time translation applications – applications that are able to automatically translate entire segments of text from one language to another. Some applications in this category are able to translate foreign-language labels on objects. All the user has to do is point their smartphone at these objects. Translation tools have dramatically improved and now often provide more or less accurate translations (and less frequently nonsense), but it is important to approach them with caution, as they can still be mistaken. One of the most significant applications in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the required language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Lavíny nie sú ničím neobvyklým; strmé svahy môžu udržať len určité množstvo snehu a nadbytočné množstvo sa zosunie dole ako lavína. Problém je v tom, že sneh je lepkavý, preto je potrebný nejaký spúšťač, ktorý spôsobí, že sa zosunie, a ten, ktorý sa zosunie, môže následne spôsobiť zosunutie zvyšku. Niekedy je pôvodnou spúšťacou udalosťou to, že slnko ohrieva sneh, niekedy viac nasneží, inokedy sú to iné prírodné udalosti, častokrát je to človek.
mt: Avalanches are not uncommon; steep slopes can only hold a certain amount of snow, and excess will slide down as an avalanche. The problem is that snow is sticky, so some trigger is needed to cause it to slide, and once it slides, it can cause the rest to slide. Sometimes the original trigger is an event such as the sun heating the snow, sometimes it snows more, sometimes it is other natural events, often it is man-made.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: Kari je jedlo na báze byliniek a korenín, spolu s mäsom alebo so zeleninou. Poznáme kari „suché“ alebo „mokré“ a to v závislosti od množstva použitej tekutiny. Vo vnútrozemských oblastiach severnej Indie a Pakistanu sa jogurt bežne používa v kari; v južnej Indii a niektorých ďalších pobrežných oblastiach subkontinentu sa bežne používa kokosové mlieko.
mt: Kari is a dish based on herbs and roots, with meat or vegetables. We know "dry" or "wet" kari, depending on the amount of liquid used. In the interior regions of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in kari; in southern India and some other coastal areas of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Kari je jedlo na báze byliniek a korenín, spolu s mäsom alebo so zeleninou. Poznáme kari „suché“ alebo „mokré“ a to v závislosti od množstva použitej tekutiny. Vo vnútrozemských oblastiach severnej Indie a Pakistanu sa jogurt bežne používa v kari; v južnej Indii a niektorých ďalších pobrežných oblastiach subkontinentu sa bežne používa kokosové mlieko.
mt: Kari is a dish based on herbs and roots, with meat or vegetables. We know "dry" or "wet" kari, depending on the amount of liquid used. In the interior regions of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in kari; in southern India and some other coastal areas of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Diaľnica Traverz južného pólu vedie od stanice McMurdo pri Rossovom mori až k pólu. Trasa má dĺžku 1 600 km. Je to utlačený sneh s vyplnenými štrbinami a označený vlajkami. Cestovať po ňom môžu iba špecializované traktory, ktoré ťahajú sane s palivom a zásobami. Nie sú veľmi obratné, takže musia ísť cestou, ktorá sa tiahne naokolo Transantarktických hôr a ústi na rovnej plošine.
mt: The South Pole Traverse is a 1,600-kilometre (990 mi) route from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the South Pole. It is a compacted snow surface with drilled holes and flagged. Only specialized tractors, which pull sleds with fuel and supplies, can travel on it. They are not very maneuverable, so they must go along a route that runs around the Transantarctic Mountains and ends on a flat plain.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Prísť autom do Južnej Afriky je úžasný spôsob, ako sa oboznámiť so všetkými krásami regiónu a zároveň sa dostať na miesta, ležiace mimo turistických trás. Po dôkladnom plánovaní je to možné prejsť aj bežným autom, ale pohon 4x4 sa odporúča viac, pretože mnohé miesta sú prístupné iba pre autá s vysokým rázvorom náprav a s pohonom 4x4. Pri plánovaní majte na pamäti, že hoci je Južná Afrika stabilnou krajinou, nie všetky susedné krajiny sú na tom rovnako. Požiadavky a náklady na víza sa líšia podľa krajiny. Tiež závisia od toho, z ktorej krajiny pochádzate. Každá krajina má tiež jedinečné zákony, ktoré stanovujú povinnú výbavu vo vozidle.
mt: 4x4 is a great way to get to know all the beauty of the region and at the same time get to places off the beaten track. After careful planning, it is possible to pass through the country by a regular car, but the 4x4 drive is recommended more, because many places are accessible only for vehicles with high ground clearance and 4x4 drive. When planning, remember that although South Africa is a stable country, not all neighboring countries are the same. Visa requirements and costs vary depending on the country. They also depend on where you come from. Each country also has unique laws that set the mandatory equipment in the vehicle.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Starostlivosť o ostatných - Nikdy nenechávajte svoje tašky mimo svoj dohľad, najmä pri prekračovaní medzinárodných hraníc. Bez vášho vedomia by ste sa mohli ocitnúť v situácii, že vás zneužijú na pašovanie drog, čím by ste sa dostali do veľkých problémov. Zahŕňa to aj čakanie v rade, pretože psy na vyhľadávanie drog by mohli byť využité bez upozornenia. Niektoré krajiny ukladajú mimoriadne drakonické tresty, aj keď ide o prvý priestupok; môžu sem patriť tresty odňatia slobody vo výške 10 a viac rokov. Tašky bez dozoru sú terčom krádeží. Môžu tiež prilákať pozornosť orgánov dohliadajúcich na bombové hrozby.
mt: Care for others - Never leave your bags unattended, especially when crossing international borders. Without your knowledge, you could find yourself in a situation where you are being used to smuggle drugs, which could land you in serious trouble. This includes waiting in line, because dogs used to detect drugs may be used without your knowledge. Some countries impose draconian penalties, even for a first offense; these may include sentences of up to 10 years or more in prison. Bags left unattended are also targets for theft. They may also attract the attention of bomb-sniffing authorities.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Naplňte svoj domov ráno silnou kávou a v noci upokojujúcim kamilkovým čajom. Keď ste zavretý doma, máte čas na to, aby ste sa hýčkali a venovali pár minút navyše na prípavu niečoho špeciálneho. Ak chcete viac dobrodružstva, využite možnosť a odšťavte si alebo namiešajte si smoothie: možno nájdete nejaký nie príliš komplikovaný nápoj, ktorý si budete môcť miešať na raňajky, keď už budete späť doma v bežnej rutine. Ak žijete v meste s pestrou kultúrou pitia, choďte do barov alebo podnikov v štvrtiach, ktoré často nenavštevujete.
mt: Fill your home with a strong cup of coffee in the morning and a soothing camomile tea at night. When you're home, you have time to pamper yourself and spend a few minutes on the off chance of something special. If you want more adventure, take advantage of the opportunity and juice or mix a smoothie: maybe you'll find some not too complicated drink that you can mix for breakfast when you're back home in the usual routine. If you live in a city with a diverse culture of drinking, go to bars or businesses in neighborhoods that you often don't visit.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Dedina Haldarsvík ponúka výhľad na neďaleký ostrov Eysturoy a nachádza sa v nej nezvyčajný oktagonálny kostol. Na cintoríne sú nad niektorými hrobkami zaujímavé mramorové sochy holubíc. Oplatí sa urobiť si polhodinovú prechádzku okolo zaujímavej dediny.
mt: The village of Haldarsvík offers a view of nearby Eysturoy island and features an unusual octagonal church. The cemetery has interesting marble dove sculptures over some of the graves. A 30-minute walk around the interesting village is worthwhile.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Aj keď ako turista alebo ako obchodný cestujúci na služobnej ceste možno na krátkodobé návštevy určitých krajín nebudete potrebovať vízum, pobyt v roli medzinárodného študenta si vyžaduje dlhší pobyt ako v prípade bežného turistu. Všeobecne platí, že pri dlhodobom pobyte v ktorejkoľvek cudzej krajine sa vyžaduje vopred vybavené vízum. Narozdiel od bežných turistických či obchodných víz majú študentské víza zvyčajne odlišné podmienky a postupy podávania žiadostí. Vo väčšine krajín budete potrebovať ponuku od inštitúcie, na ktorej chcete študovať, a taktiež preukázať podklady o finančných prostriedkoch, vďaka ktorým sa môžete finančne uživiť minimálne v prvom roku štúdia. Podrobnejšie informácie si zistite v inštitúcii a na imigračnom oddelení tej krajiny, v ktorej si želáte študovať.
mt: Even though as a tourist or as a business traveler on official business you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries, a stay as an international student requires a longer stay than in the case of a regular tourist. Generally speaking, when staying in any foreign country for a longer period of time, you will need a pre-approved visa. Unlike regular tourist or business visas, student visas usually have different requirements and application procedures. In most countries, you will need an offer from an institution where you want to study, and also to prove your financial resources, by which you can support yourself at least in the first year of study. More detailed information can be obtained from the institution and the immigration department of the country in which you want to study.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Ak sa rozhodnete ísť na túru do dažďového pralesa, mali by ste sa mať na pozore pred komármi, a to najmä počas leta. Keď prechádzate subtropickým dažďovým pralesom na aute, aj pár sekúnd s otvorenými dverami pri nastupovaní do vozidla stačí na to, aby doňho spolu s vami vleteli aj komáre.
mt: If you decide to go on a hike through the rainforest, you should be aware of mosquitoes, especially during the summer. When you are driving through a subtropical rainforest, even a few seconds with the doors open when getting into the vehicle is enough for them to fly in with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Ak sa rozhodnete ísť na túru do dažďového pralesa, mali by ste sa mať na pozore pred komármi, a to najmä počas leta. Keď prechádzate subtropickým dažďovým pralesom na aute, aj pár sekúnd s otvorenými dverami pri nastupovaní do vozidla stačí na to, aby doňho spolu s vami vleteli aj komáre.

Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarban je najväčším pobrežným mangrovníkovým pásom na svete, ktorý sa tiahne v dĺžke 80 km (50 míľ) od pobrežia do bangladéšskeho a indického vnútrozemia. Sundarban bol vyhlásený za súčasť svetového dedičstva UNESCO. Časť lesa na indickom území sa označuje ako Národný park Sundarban. Medzi lesy nepatria len mangrovníkové mokrade — patria sem aj niektoré z posledných zvyškov mohutných džunglí, ktoré kedysi pokrývali Gangskú nížinu. Sundarban sa rozprestiera na ploche 3 850 km², pričom asi jednu tretinu zaberajú vodné/močaristé oblasti. Od roku 1966 sú Sundarbany kráľovstvom divočiny a odhaduje sa, že v súčasnosti sa v tejto oblasti nachádza 400 tigrov indických a asi 30 000 jeleňov axis.
mt: Sundarban is the largest mangrove forest belt in the world, which stretches 80 km (50 miles) from the coast inland into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland. Sundarban was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Part of the forest on the Indian side is designated as Sundarban National Park. The mangrove swamps are not the only forests in the area — some of the last remnants of the once vast jungles that covered the Ganges Delta are also included. Sundarban covers an area of 3,850 km², of which about one third is waterlogged areas. Since 1966 Sundarbans are a wildlife sanctuary and it is estimated that there are about 400 Indian tigers and about 30,000 axis deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Na svete existuje viac ako 5 000 rôznych jazykov, z toho viac ako dvadsatimi hovorí 50 alebo viac miliónov ľudí. Písaným slovám je často aj ľahšie rozumieť ako hovorenému slovu. Platí to najmä pre adresy, ktoré je často ťažké vysloviť zrozumiteľne. V mnohých národov hovoria plynule anglicky všetci a je omnoho viac takých, v ktorých sa dá rátať s obmedzenými znalosťami –najmä medzi mladšími ľuďmi. Ak chcete, predstavte si ako Manchesterčan, Bostončan, Jamajčan a Sydneyčan sedia pri jednom stole a večerajú v reštaurácii v Toronte. Režírujú sa navzájom príbehmi z ich domovských miest, ktoré podávajú s výraznými akcentmi a miestnym argotom.
mt: There are more than 5,000 different languages in the world, of which more than twenty are spoken by 50 million or more people. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words. This is especially true for addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. In many nations everyone speaks English fluently, and there are many more who can be counted on for limited knowledge – especially among younger people. Imagine a Manchesterian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting at the same table and dining in a restaurant in Toronto. They are directing each other's stories from their home towns, which are delivered with strong accents and local argot.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Na svete existuje viac ako 5 000 rôznych jazykov, z toho viac ako dvadsatimi hovorí 50 alebo viac miliónov ľudí. Písaným slovám je často aj ľahšie rozumieť ako hovorenému slovu. Platí to najmä pre adresy, ktoré je často ťažké vysloviť zrozumiteľne. V mnohých národov hovoria plynule anglicky všetci a je omnoho viac takých, v ktorých sa dá rátať s obmedzenými znalosťami –najmä medzi mladšími ľuďmi. Ak chcete, predstavte si ako Manchesterčan, Bostončan, Jamajčan a Sydneyčan sedia pri jednom stole a večerajú v reštaurácii v Toronte. src: Autobusy odchádzajú z medzimestskej autobusovej stanice (na druhej strane rieky) počas celého dňa, aj keď väčšina, najmä tá, ktorá smeruje na východ a na Jakar/Bumthang, odchádza medzi 06:30 a 07:30. Odporúča sa zakúpiť si lístok niekoľko dní v predstihu, pretože medzimestské autobusy bývajú často plné. Väčšinu okresov obsluhujú malé japonské autobusy Coaster, ktoré sú pohodlné a robustné. Zdieľané taxíky sú rýchlym a pohodlným spôsobom dopravy do okolitých miest, akými sú napríklad Paro (Nu 150) a Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: Buses leave the city bus station (on the other side of the river) all day, although most, especially those heading east and to Jakar/Bumthang, leave between 06:30 and 07:30. It is recommended to buy a ticket a few days in advance, as the city buses are often full. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable way to get around to nearby towns, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: „Timbuktu“ sa ako metafora začala používať na označenie relatívne nedostupných, exotických a vzdialených krajín. V súčasnosti je Timbuktu zbedačeným mestom, hoci svojou reputáciou patrí k turistickým atrakciám. Tiež sa tam nachádza letisko. V roku 1990 bolo mesto z dôvodu ohrozenia púštnym pieskom pridané na zoznam svetových pamiatok v ohrození. Bola to jedna z hlavných zastávok Henryho Louisa Gatesa počas špeciálneho programu Zvláštne divy afrického sveta PBS. Mesto je v ostrom protiklade s ostatnými mestami v krajine, pretože jeho vzhľad je viac arabský ako africký.
mt: "Timbuktu" began to be used as a metaphor to describe relatively inaccessible, exotic and remote countries. Today, Timbuktu is a decrepit town, although its reputation is one of the tourist attractions. It is also home to an airport. In 1990, the town was added to the World Heritage List in danger due to the threat of desertification. It was one of the main stops of Henry Louis Gates during the special program Special Divas of the African World PBS. The town is in sharp contrast with other towns in the country, because its appearance is more Arab than African.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Paralympijské hry sa budú konať od 24. augusta do 5. septembra 2021. Niektoré podujatia sa uskutočnia na rôznych miestach po celom Japonsku. Tokio bude jediným ázijským mestom, ktoré usporiadalo dvoje letné olympijské hry, kde sa hry konali v roku 1964. Ak ste si rezervovali lety a ubytovanie na rok 2020 pred oznámením odkladu, mohli ste sa dostať do nepríjemnej situácie. Storno podmienky sa líšia, ale na konci marca väčšina storno podmienok, ktorých pôvod je v koronavíruse, nepresahuje do júla 2020, kedy bola olympiáda naplánovaná. Dá sa očakávať, že väčšina lístkov bude stáť 2 500 až 130 000 jenov, pričom cena jedného bežného lístka bude stáť okolo 7 000 jenov.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Some events will be held at various locations across Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympics, where the games were held in 1964. If you have booked flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement, you may have found yourself in an unpleasant situation. Cancellation terms vary, but at the end of March, most cancellation terms whose origin is in the coronavirus do not exceed July 2020, when the Olympics was scheduled. It is expected that most tickets will cost 2,500 to 130,000 yen, while the price of a regular ticket will be around 7,000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Tornádo je rotujúci stĺp vzduchu veľmi nízkeho tlaku, ktorý nasáva okolitý vzduch smerom dovnútra a nahor. Generujú silný vietor (často 160 – 320 km/h) a môžu do vzduchu zdvihnúť aj ťažké predmety a unášať ich ako tornádo postupuje. Začínajú sa formovať do tvaru lievika, ktorý potom zostupuje dole z búrkových mračien, a keď sa dotkne zeme, stane sa z neho „tornádo“.
mt: A tornado is a rotating column of air of very low pressure that sucks in surrounding air towards its center and upwards. They generate strong winds (often 160–320 km/h) and can lift heavy objects into the air as they move. They begin to form in the shape of a funnel, which then descends from cumulonimbus clouds, and when they touch the ground, they become "tornadoes".
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Ak krajina, ktorú sa chystáte navštíviť, je predmetom cestovného poradenstva, môže to mať vplyv na vaše cestovné zdravotné poistenie alebo poistenie storna zájazdu. Okrem svojej vlády budete možno chcieť tiež konzultovať rady iných vlád, ale ich rady sú navrhnuté pre ich občanov. Ako príklad, americkí občania na Blízkom východe môžu čeliť odlišným situáciám ako Európania alebo Arabi. Informačné spravodajstvo poskytuje iba stručné zhrnutie politickej situácie v jednej krajine. Uvedené názory sú často len zbežné, všeobecné a príliš zjednodušené v porovnaní s detailnejšími informáciami, ktoré sú dostupné niekde inde.
mt: If the country you are planning to visit is the subject of a travel advisory, this may affect your travel health insurance or trip cancellation insurance. In addition to your government, you may also wish to consult the advice of other governments, but their advice is intended for their citizens. For example, American citizens in the Middle East may face different situations than Europeans or Arabs. News reporting provides only a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The opinions expressed are often only superficial, general, and overly simplified in comparison to more detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Cestovné kancelárie tu existujú už od 19. storočia. Sú zvyčajne dobrou voľbou vtedy, keď sa cestujúci chystá navštíviť miesta, ktoré presahujú jeho doterajšie skúsenosti s prírodou, kultúrou, jazykom, alebo keď ide o cestu do krajín s nízkym príjmom. Aj keď väčšina cestovných kancelárií prijíma väčšinu bežných rezervácií, veľa z nich sa špecializuje na konkrétny typ cesty, rozpočet alebo destináciu. Môže byť lepšie si najať agenta, ktorý často objednáva výlety podobné vášmu. Pozrite sa, aké zájazdy agentúra ponúka, či už na jej webe alebo vo výklade.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. They are usually a good choice when a traveler is planning to visit places that exceed his or her previous experience with nature, culture, language, or when traveling to low-income countries. Although most travel agencies accept most common reservations, many specialize in a particular type of trip, budget, or destination. It may be better to hire an agent who often books trips similar to yours. Look at what trips the agency offers, whether on its website or in the brochure.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Skôr než niekam cestujete a keď už niekam cestujete, musíte vziať do úvahy veľa vecí. Keď cestujete, nemajte očakávania, že vecí budú také isté ako sú „doma“. Spôsoby, zákony, jedlo, doprava, ubytovanie, štandardy, jazyk, a tak ďalej sa budú do istej miery líšiť od miesta, kde žijete. Toto je niečo, čo treba mať stále na pamäti, aby ste sa vyhli pocitom sklamania, alebo dokonca znechutenia voči každodenným miestnym praktikám.
mt: Before you go anywhere and when you go anywhere, you have to consider many things. When you travel, don't expect things to be the same as they are "at home". Ways, laws, food, transportation, accommodation, standards, language, and so on will differ to some extent from where you live. This is something to keep in mind to avoid feelings of disappointment, or even disgust towards local everyday practices.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."
