src: Ak prvýkrát cestujete do rozvojovej krajiny – alebo do novej časti sveta – nepodceňujte kultúrny šok, ktorý môže nastať. Mnoho pravidelných a schopných cestovateľov zaskočila novosť cestovania do rozvojových krajín, v ktorých sa môže rýchlo nakopiť veľa malých kultúrnych adaptácií. Najmä v prvých dňoch zvážte, či si radšej nezaplatíte drahšie hotely, jedlo a služby v západnom štýle a kvalite, aby ste sa aklimatizovali. Nespite na matraci alebo karimatke na zemi v oblastiach, kde nepoznáte miestnu faunu. Ak sa chystáte na táborenie, zoberte si táborové lehátko alebo hojdaciu sieť, aby sa k vám nedostali hady, škorpióny a podobne.
mt: If you are traveling to a developing country for the first time, don't underestimate the culture shock that may occur. Many regular and capable travelers are surprised by the novelty of traveling to developing countries, where many small cultural adaptations can be copied quickly. Especially in the first few days, consider paying for more expensive hotels, food and services in a Western style and quality, so that you can acclimatize. Don't expect a mattress or a carpet on the ground in areas where you don't know the local fauna. If you are camping, bring a camping mattress or a hammock, so that snakes, scorpions and the like don't get to you.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

mt: If you are traveling to a developing country for the first time, don't underestimate the culture shock that may occur. Many regular and capable travelers are surprised by the novelty of traveling to developing countries, where many small cultural adaptations can be copied quickly. Especially in the first few days, consider paying for more expensive hotels, food and services in a Western style and quality, so that you can acclimatize. Don't expect a mattress or a carpet on the ground in areas where you don't know the local fauna. If you are camping, bring a camping mattress or a hammock, so that snakes, scorpions and the like don't get to you.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Urobte si a majte pri sebe kópie svojej poistky a kontaktných údajov vášho poisťovateľa. Potrebujú uviesť e-mailovú adresu poisťovateľa a medzinárodné telefónne čísla pre pomoc/autorizácie a uplatňovanie nárokov. Jednú kópi majte pri sebe aj v batožine a v ľubovoľnom zariadení s možnosťou online pripojenia (pošlite si ho napríklad ako prílohu e-mailu alebo si ho uložte na cloude). V prípade, že cestujete s prenosným počítačom alebo tabletom, uložte si kópiu do svojej pamäte alebo na disk (dostupné bez internetu). Dajte kópiu poistky/kontaktov tiež spolucestujúcim a príbuzným alebo priateľom, ktorí zostali doma a budú ochotní pomôcť.
mt: 1. Make copies of your insurance policy and contact information for your insurer. They will need to provide the insurer's email address and international telephone numbers for assistance/authorizations and claims. Have one copy with you in your carry-on and in any device with online connectivity (send it as an attachment to an email or save it to the cloud). If you are traveling with a portable computer or tablet, save a copy to your memory or disk (available without internet). Give a copy of your insurance/contact information to fellow travelers and family or friends who are staying home and will be willing to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: V priebehu rokov sa používali rôzne rozmery filmu. Najbežnejší je štandardný 35 mm film (negatív má 36x24 mm). Dá sa opäť naplniť celkom jednoducho, keď sa vám minie a poskytuje približne porovnateľné rozlíšenie ako súčasná DSLR. Niektoré fotoaparáty na filmy strednej veľkosti používajú formát 6x6 cm, konkrétne negatív o veľkosti 56x56 mm. To poskytuje takmer štyrikrát vyššie rozlíšenie ako pri 35-milimetrovom negatíve (3136 mm2 oproti 864).
mt: 35 mm film was the most common size used. The negative is 36x24 mm. It can be reloaded easily, and provides roughly comparable resolution to modern DSLRs. Some medium-format cameras use a 6x6 cm format, specifically a negative of 56x56 mm. This provides nearly four times the resolution of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 vs. 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Najjednoduchší spôsob, ako začať podnikať v oblasti cestovania, je zdokonaliť svoje zručnosti na stránke cestovateľského blogu, ktorá je už etablovaná. Keď sa oboznámite s procesom formátovania a úpravami na webe, až následne si môžete svoj vlastný web vytvoriť.
mt: The easiest way to start a travel business is to improve your skills on a travel blog that is already established. When you become familiar with the process of formatting and editing on the web, you can then create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: V domácom prostredí je kvôli neustálemu vystavovaniu sa miestnym choroboplodným zárodkom veľmi vysoká pravdepodobnosť, že už voči nim máte imunitu. V iných častiach sveta, kde je pre vás bakteriologická fauna nová, je oveľa vyššia pravdepodobnosť, že budete mať problémy. Tiež platí, že teplejšom podnebí rastú baktérie rýchlejšie a dlhšie prežívajú mimo tela. Z toho sú potom také pliagy ako Dillíjské ťažkosti, faraónova kliatba, Montezumova pomsta a veľa podobných. Rovnako ako problémy s dýchaním v chladnejšom podnebí, aj črevné problémy v horúcom podnebí sú pomerne bežné a vo väčšine prípadov sú veľmi nepríjemné, v skutočnosti však nie sú nebezpečné.
mt: In your own environment, you are constantly exposed to local pathogens, and you are likely to have immunity to them. In other parts of the world, where the bacterial flora is new to you, the likelihood of problems is much higher. Also, the warmer the climate, the faster bacteria grow and the longer they can survive outside the body. This is why plagues like the Delhi Sickness, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and many others are so common. Similarly, breathing problems in cold climates, and intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are very unpleasant, but they are not dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Európa je relatívne malý svetadiel, nachádza sa v nej ale veľa nezávislých štátov. Za normálnych okolností by cestovanie cez viaceré krajiny znamenalo, že musíte opakovane vybavovať žiadosti o víza a absolvovať pasové kontroly. V tomto ohľade Schengenský priestor funguje do istej miery ako jedna krajina. Pokiaľ zostanete v tejto zóne, môžete obvykle prekročiť hranice bez toho, aby ste opäť prechádzali kontrolnými stanovišťami pasovej kontroly. Takisto ak máte schengenské vízum, nemusíte žiadať o víza do každej z členských krajín schengenského priestoru osobitne, čo ušetrí čas, peniaze a papierovačky.
mt: Europe is a relatively small world, and there are many independent states within it. Under normal circumstances, traveling through several countries would mean having to reapply for visas and pass through passport controls. In this regard, the Schengen Area works to some extent as one country. If you stay within this zone, you can usually cross borders without having to go through passport control again. Likewise, if you have a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for a visa to each of the Schengen member states separately, which will save time, money, and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Hrobka Tutanchamona (KV62). KV62 je azda tou najznámejšou hrobkou v údolí. Ide o takmer neporušené kráľovské hrobové miesto mladého kráľa, ktoré objavil Howard Carter v roku 1922. Sotva sa však oplatí navštíviť hrobku Tutanchamóna, ktorá je pri porovnaní s väčšinou ostatných kráľovských hrobiek oveľa menšia a má aj obmedzenú výzdobu. Každý, kto by chcel vidieť dôkazy poškodenia múmie spôsobené pokusmi o jej vybratie z rakvy, zostane sklamaný, pretože viditeľná je iba hlava a plecia. Rozprávkové bohatstvo sa v hrobke už nenachádza, pretože bolo premiestnené do Egyptského múzea v Káhire. Návštevníci, ktorí majú len obmedzené časové možnosti by mali svoj čas radšej stráviť inde.
mt: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 is perhaps the most famous tomb in the Valley. It is the almost intact royal burial place of a young king, discovered by Howard Carter in 1922. However, it is hardly worth visiting the tomb of Tutankhamun, which is much smaller than most of the other royal tombs and has limited decoration. Anyone who wants to see evidence of damage to the mummy caused by attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed, as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fairy-tale wealth is no longer in the tomb, as it was moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors who have only limited time would be better off spending their time elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Ostrov Bowen je obľúbený na celodenné výlety alebo víkendové exkurzie, ktoré ponúkajú jazdu na kajaku, pešiu turistiku, nakupovanie, reštaurácie a mnoho ďalšieho. Táto originálna komunita sídli pri jazere Howe Sound kúsok od Vancouveru a dá sa k nej ľahko dostať pravidelnými vodnými taxíkmi, ktoré odchádzajú z ostrova Granville v centre Vancouveru. Pre milovníkov outdoorových aktivít, je túra po ceste „Sea to Sky“ nevyhnutnosťou. Whistler (1,5 hodiny jazdy od Vancouveru) je pomerne drahý, ale kvôli zimným olympijským hrám v roku 2010 známy. V zime si v Severnej Amerike užívajte tie najlepšie lyžovačky, zatiaľ čo v lete si môžete vyskúšať autentickú horskú cyklistiku.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend getaway, offering canoeing, hiking, shopping, restaurants and more. This original community sits on Howe Sound, a short distance from Vancouver, and can be easily reached by regular water taxis departing from Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For outdoor enthusiasts, the Sea to Sky Highway is a must. Whistler (1.5 hours from Vancouver) is pricey, but well known for its winter Olympic games in 2010. In the winter, enjoy the best skiing in North America, while in the summer, try authentic mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls je mesto v západnej časti Zimbabwe, cez hranice od Livingstonu v Zambii a blízko Botswany. Mestečko leží hneď vedľa vodopádov a tie sú hlavnou atrakciou, ale táto obľúbená turistická destinácia ponúka hľadačom dobrodružstiev aj milovníkom prehliadok množstvo príležitostí na dlhší pobyt. V období dažďov (november až marec), hladina vody bude vyššia a Vodopády sú dramatickejšie. Zaručene premoknete, ak prejdete cez most alebo po chodníkoch ktoré sa kľukatia blízko vodopádov. Naproti tomu, práve preto, že objem vody je taký veľký, váš výhľad na aktuálny stav vodopádov bude zakrytý—iba vodou!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in western Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone in Zambia and near Botswana. The town lies just next to the falls and they are the main attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers adventure seekers and sightseers alike plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water level will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You will definitely get wet if you walk across the bridge or along the walkways that twist near the falls. On the other hand, precisely because the water volume is so great, your view of the current state of the falls will be obscured—by water only!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Pravidlá, ktoré sa týkajú bežnej fotografie platia aj pre nahrávanie videa, možno ešte viac. Ak je zakázané čokoľvek čo i len fotiť, potom by vás ani nemalo napadnúť natáčať to na video. Ak používate dron, v dostatočnom predstihu si overte, čo máte povolené natáčať a aké povolenia alebo ďalšie licencie sú potrebné. Nechať dron lietať v blízkosti letiska alebo nad davom ľudí je takmer vždy zlý nápad, hoci to vo vašej oblasti nie je protizákonné.
mt: The rules that apply to ordinary photography also apply to video recording, perhaps even more so. If anything is prohibited from being photographed, then you should not even consider recording it on video. If you use a drone, check in advance what you are allowed to record and what permissions or other licenses are required. Having a drone fly near an airport or over a crowd of people is almost always a bad idea, even if it is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Registrácia je ďalšou požiadavkou pre vízový proces. V niektorých krajinách musíte svoju prítomnosť a adresu, kde sa zdržiavate, zaregistrovať na miestnych úradoch. Môže to vyžadovať vyplnenie formulára s miestnou políciou alebo návštevu imigračných úradov. V mnohých krajinách s takýmto zákonom budú registráciu vykonávať miestne hotely (nezabudnite sa opýtať). V ostatných prípadoch sa musia zaregistrovať iba tí, ktorí nevyužívajú turistické ubytovanie. Hoci, v tomto je zákon ťažko zrozumiteľný, preto si to overte vopred.
mt: Registration is another requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with local authorities. This may require filling out a form with local police or visiting immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will register you (don't forget to ask). In other cases, only those not using tourist accommodation must register. Although, in this case, the law is hard to understand, check this in advance.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Dobrovoľníctvo počas cestovania je skvelý spôsob, ako prispieť k zmene, ale nejde však len o dávanie. Život a dobrovoľníctvo v cudzej krajine sú vynikajúcim spôsobom, ako spoznať inú kultúru, spoznať nových ľudí, spoznať seba, získať zmysel pre perspektívu a dokonca získať nové zručnosti. Môže to byť tiež dobrý spôsob, ako vám môžu úspory vystačiť aj na dlhší pobyt niekde, keďže veľa dobrovoľníckych prác poskytuje izbu, stravu a málo z nich aj malý plat.
mt: Volunteering while traveling is a great way to contribute to change, but it's not just about giving. Life and volunteering abroad are great ways to get to know another culture, get to know new people, get to know yourself, gain perspective, and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch your savings to last longer, as many volunteer jobs provide housing, food, and some even a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: Cesta do Sveta Walta Disneyho predstavuje hlavné pútnické miesto pre mnoho amerických rodín. „Typická“ návšteva zahŕňa let na medzinárodné letisko v Orlande, prepravu autobusom do miestneho hotela Disney, týždňový pobyt bez opustenia majetku spoločnosti Disney a návrat domov. Možné sú nekonečné variácie, ale toto zostáva podľa toho, čo si väčšina ľudí predstaví, keď sa hovorí o „ceste do Disney Worldu“. Mnoho lístkov, ktoré sa predávajú online prostredníctvom aukčných webov, ako sú eBay alebo Craigslist, sú len čiastočne použité viacdenné lístky na park hopper. Aj keď ide o pomerne častú činnosť, spoločnosť Disney ju nepovoľuje: vstupenky nie sú prenosné.
mt: The  main pilgrimage site for many American families is the Walt Disney World Resort.  "Typical" visit includes a flight to Orlando's international airport, bus ride to a local Disney hotel, a week-long stay without leaving Disney property, and a return home.  Possible variations are endless, but this remains the case of what most people think of when they talk about "the trip to Disney World."  Many tickets sold online through auction sites such as eBay or Craigslist are only partially used multi-day park hopper tickets.  While this is a relatively common practice, Disney does not allow it: tickets are not transferable.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Každý, kto plánuje navštíviť krajinu považovanú za vojnovú zónu, by sa mal zúčastniť na odbornom školení. Stačí vyhľadať na internete „kurz nepriateľského prostredia“ a získate pravdepodobne adresu nejakej miestnej firmy. Na kurze sa oveľa podrobnejšie preberajú všetky tu diskutované problémy spolu s praktickými skúsenosťami. Dĺžka kurzu trvá zvyčajne 2 až 5 dní a obsahuje hranie rolí, inštruktáže prvej pomoci a niekedy možno aj výcvik zbraní. Knihy a časopisy zaoberajúce sa prežitím v prírode sú bežné, ale publikácií, ktoré sa zaoberajú vojnovými zónami je málo.
mt: Anyone planning to visit a country considered a war zone should attend a training course. Just search the Internet for "enemy environment course" and you will likely find the address of some local company. The course will go into much greater detail on all the issues discussed here, as well as practical experience. The length of the course usually lasts 2 to 5 days and includes role-playing, first aid instruction, and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines on survival in the wild are common, but publications on war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Existujú rôzne spôsoby čistenia vody, niektoré sú účinnejšie proti konkrétnym hrozbám. V niektorých oblastiach stačí vodu prevariť len jednu minútu, inde treba niekoľko minút. Účinnosť filtrov sa líši a v prípade, že máte obavy, mali by ste zvážiť kúpu vody v uzavretej fľaši od firmy, ktorá má dobrú povesť.
mt: There are many ways to purify water, some are more effective against certain threats. In some areas, water can be purified in one minute, in others it takes several minutes. The effectiveness of filters varies and in the case of concern, you should consider buying water in a sealed bottle from a company with a good reputation.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Spätné prúdy sú vracajúcim sa spádom z vĺn, ktoré sa lámu na pláži, často pri útese alebo podobne. Vďaka topológii pod vodou sa spätný tok sústreďuje v niekoľkých hlbších úsekoch, kde sa môže tvoriť rýchly prúd až hlboká voda. Za väčšinu úmrtí môže vyčerpanie pri pokuse plávať späť proti prúdu, čo môže byť úplne nemožné. Len čo sa dostanete mimo prúdu, plávanie naspäť nie je o nič ťažšie ako zvyčajne. Skúste zamieriť niekam, kde vás znovu nezachytí. Prípadne, v závislosti od vašich zručností a od toho, či vás niekto zaregistroval, môžete skúsiť počkať na záchranu.
mt: Backwash is the returning swell that breaks on the beach, often at a point or similarly. Due to the underwater topography, backwash is focused in a few deeper sections, where a strong current can form even in deep water. Most deaths are due to exhaustion while trying to swim back against the current, which can be impossible. Once you get out of the current, swimming back is no harder than usual. Try to aim somewhere where you won't get caught again. Alternatively, depending on your skills and whether someone has registered you, you may try to wait for rescue.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Vnútrozemské vodné cesty môžu byť dobrým námetom na výber dovolenky. Napríklad návšteva hradov v údolí Loiry, údolí Rýna alebo plavba do zaujímavých miest na Dunaji či plavba loďou po Erijskom kanále. Okrem toho v ich okolí nájdete aj populárne turistické a cyklistické trasy.
mt: Inland waterways can be a good idea for a vacation. For example, visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley or a cruise to interesting places on the Danube or a cruise on the Erie Canal. In addition, you will find popular tourist and cycling routes in their vicinity.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Na severe je región ohraničený Sahelom a na juhu a západe ho ohraničuje Atlantický oceán. Ženy: Všetkým cestujúcim ženám sa odporúča, aby bez ohľadu na svoj skutočný rodinný stav tvrdili, že sú vydaté. Aj nosenie prsteňa je užitočné (ale iba takého, ktorý nevyzerá príliš draho). Ženy by si mali uvedomiť, že kultúrne rozdiely môžu viesť k tomu, čo by normálne považovali za obťažovanie. Nie je nezvyčajné, aby vás sledovali, chytili za rameno atď. Buďte rázne pri odmietaní mužov a nebojte sa udržať si pozíciu (kultúrne rozdiely alebo nie, nie je to ok!).
mt: In the north it is bordered by the Sahel and to the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: All female travelers are advised to claim to be married, regardless of their actual marital status. Wearing a wedding ring is helpful (but only one that doesn't look too expensive). Women should be aware that cultural differences may lead to what would normally be considered harassment. It is not unusual to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in rejecting men and do not be afraid to maintain your position (cultural differences or not, it's not OK!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Divoká príroda patrí medzi najnáročnejšie motívy pre fotografa a vyžaduje si kombináciu šťastia, trpezlivosti, skúseností a dobrého vybavenia. Fotografovanie divočiny je často považované za samozrejmosť, ale rovnako ako fotografovanie vo všeobecnosti, aj takáto fotografia má hodnotu tisícich slov. Fotografovanie divočiny si často vyžaduje dlhý teleobjektív, hoci veci ako kŕdeľ vtákov alebo malé stvorenie si vyžadujú ďalšie rozdielne objektívy. Je ťažké nájsť mnohé exotické zvieratá, pričom parky niekedy majú stanovené pravidlá týkajúce sa fotenia na komerčné účely. Divoké zvieratá môžu byť buď plaché alebo agresívne. Prostredie môže byť chladné, horúce alebo inak nebezpečné.
mt: Wild nature is one of the most challenging subjects for a photographer and requires a combination of luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often considered a no-brainer, but just like photography in general, such photography has the value of a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, although things like a flock of birds or a small creature may require a different lens. It is hard to find many exotic animals, while some parks have rules regarding commercial photography. Wild animals may be either shy or aggressive. The environment may be cold, hot or otherwise dangerous.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Každý, kto bude jazdiť vo vysokých zemepisných šírkach alebo cez horské priechody, by mal zvážiť pravdepodobnosť snehu, ľadu alebo mrazu. Na zľadovatených a zasnežených vozovkách je trenie malé a nemôžete preto jazdiť tak, akoby ste boli na čistom asfalte. Počas snehových búrok môže v priebehu veľmi krátkeho času napadnúť tak veľa snehu, že by ste v ňom mohli uviaznuť. Znížená viditeľnosť môže byť spôsobená padaním alebo nafúkaním snehu, kondenzáciou vody na okne alebo tiež ľadom, ktorý sa tvorí na okne vozidla. Naproti tomu v mnohých krajinách je bežný ľad a sneh a premávka pokračuje takmer bez prerušenia počas celého roka.
mt: Everyone who is driving in high latitudes or through mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice or frost. Traction on icy and snow-covered roads is small and you cannot drive as if you were on a clean asphalt. During snowstorms, a lot of snow can fall in a very short time and you could get stuck in it. Reduced visibility can be caused by falling or blowing snow, condensation of water on the window or even ice that is formed on the window of the vehicle. On the other hand, in many countries, ice and snow are common and traffic continues almost without interruption throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Ak nie ste diplomat, práca v zámorí vo všeobecnosti znamená, že si budete musieť podať daň z príjmu v krajine, v ktorej máte sídlo. Daň z príjmu je v rôznych krajinách štruktúrovaná odlišne a daňové sadzby a pásma sa v jednotlivých krajinách veľmi líšia. V niektorých federálnych krajinách, ako sú Spojené štáty a Kanada, sa daň z príjmu odvádza nielen na federálnej, ale aj lokálnej úrovni. Z tohto dôvodu sa môžu sadzby a skupiny medzi regiónmi líšiť.
mt: If you are not a diplomat, working abroad in general means that you will have to file an income tax return in the country where you are based. Income tax is structured differently in different countries and tax rates and brackets vary widely between countries. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is paid not only at the federal level, but also at the local level. As a result, rates and brackets may differ between regions.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Svetová výstava, hovorovo nazývaná ako Svetová expozícia alebo len Expo, je veľký medzinárodný festival umenia a vedy. Zúčastnené krajiny prezentujú umelecké a vzdelávacie vystúpenia v národných pavilónoch s cieľom predstaviť svetové problémy alebo kultúru a históriu svojej krajiny. Medzinárodné záhradnícke expozície sú špecializované podujatia, ktoré sa zameriavajú na kvetinové displeje, botanické záhrady a všetko ostatné zo sveta rastlín. Teoreticky sa môže konať každoročne (vždy v inej krajine), ale v skutočnosti to tak nie je. Takéto podujatia zvyčajne trvajú od troch do šiestich mesiacov a konajú sa na miestach s rozlohou najmenej 50 hektárov.
mt: A World's Fair, or World Expo, is a large international exhibition designed to celebrate cultural progress and technological achievement. Countries participate in the event by building their own pavilions and exhibiting their achievements in the fields of technology, culture, science, and art. The event is usually held once every five years and lasts for six months. The first World's Fair was held in London in 1851.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Napriek tomu, že sú mnohé zvieratá v parku zvyknuté na prítomnosť ľudí, divoká zver zostáva naďalej divokou a nemali by sme ju kŕmiť ani vyrušovať. Podľa orgánov parku sa máte zdržiavať najmenej 100 yardov/metrov od medveďov a vlkov a 25 yardov/metrov od všetkých ostatných divokých zvierat! Bez ohľadu na to, ako pokojne vyzerajú, môžu bizóny, losy, jelene, medvede a takmer všetky veľké zvieratá zaútočiť. Každý rok sa desiatky návštevníkov zrania, pretože nedodržia dostatočný odstup. Tieto zvieratá sú veľké, divoké a potenciálne nebezpečné, preto im treba nechať priestor. Treba si tiež uvedomiť, že pachy lákajú medvede a inú divú zver, preto sa vyhýbajte prenášaniu alebo vareniu aromatických jedál a udržiavajte tábor čistý.
mt: Despite many of the park's animals being accustomed to the presence of people, wild animals remain wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park officials, you should stay at least 100 yards (meters) from bears and wolves and 25 yards (meters) from all other wildlife! Regardless of how docile they appear, bison, elk, deer, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Every year, dozens of visitors are injured because they fail to maintain adequate distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them space. You should also be aware that food odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking aromatic foods and keep your camp clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
